If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 70 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.fr: Si le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est Empoisonné, cette attaque inflige 70 dégâts supplémentaires.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.it: Se il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è avvelenato, questo attacco infligge 70 danni in più.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.pt-br: Se o Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente estiver Envenenado, este ataque causará 70 de dano a mais.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍寶可夢中毒，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 70 點。
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.es: Si el Pokémon Activo de tu rival está Envenenado, este ataque hace 70 puntos de daño más.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.de: Wenn das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners vergiftet ist, fügt dieser Angriff 70 weitere Schadenspunkte zu.

Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its.en:
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail
around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is
very bitter.
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its.pt-br:
Mal humorado, ele luta balançando sua cauda farpada
ao redor descontroladamente. A folha que cresce em sua cabeça é
muito amargo.
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its.fr:
De mauvaise humeur, il se bat en balançant sa queue barbelée
autour sauvagement. La feuille qui pousse sur sa tête est
très amer.
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its.es:
De mal genio, lucha moviendo su cola con púas.
alrededor salvajemente. La hoja que crece en su cabeza es
muy amargo.
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its.de:
Es ist schlecht gelaunt und kämpft, indem es seinen stacheligen Schwanz schwingt
wild umher. Das auf seinem Kopf wachsende Blatt ist
sehr bitter.
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its.it:
Di cattivo umore, combatte agitando la coda uncinata
in giro selvaggiamente. La foglia che cresce sulla sua testa lo è
molto amaro.
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its.zh-tw:
脾氣暴躁，會擺動帶刺的尾巴來戰鬥
瘋狂地四處走動。它頭上長的葉子是
很苦。

In homes illuminated by Chandelure inste.en:
In homes illuminated by Chandelure instead of
lights, funerals were a constant occurrence—
or so it's said.
In homes illuminated by Chandelure inste.fr:
Dans les maisons éclairées par Chandelure au lieu de
lumières, les funérailles étaient un événement constant -
ou c'est ce qu'on dit.
In homes illuminated by Chandelure inste.es:
En hogares iluminados por Chandelure en lugar de
luces, los funerales eran una ocurrencia constante—
o eso se dice.
In homes illuminated by Chandelure inste.pt-br:
Em casas iluminadas por Chandelure em vez de
luzes, funerais eram uma ocorrência constante -
ou assim é dito.
In homes illuminated by Chandelure inste.zh-tw:
在被枝形吊燈照亮的家中，而不是
燈光、葬禮時常發生——
至少是這麼說的。
In homes illuminated by Chandelure inste.it:
Nelle case illuminate da Chandelure invece
luci, i funerali erano un evento costante...
o almeno così si dice.
In homes illuminated by Chandelure inste.de:
In Häusern wird die Beleuchtung durch Kronleuchter ersetzt
Lichter, Beerdigungen waren an der Tagesordnung –
so heißt es zumindest.

In the distant past, it was somewhat str.en:
In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than
the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
In the distant past, it was somewhat str.fr:
Dans un passé lointain, il était un peu plus fort que
les descendants horriblement faibles qui existent aujourd’hui.
In the distant past, it was somewhat str.zh-tw:
在遙遠的過去，它比
今天存在的極其弱小的後代。
In the distant past, it was somewhat str.es:
En el pasado lejano, era algo más fuerte que
los descendientes horriblemente débiles que existen hoy.
In the distant past, it was somewhat str.pt-br:
No passado distante, era um pouco mais forte do que
os descendentes terrivelmente fracos que existem hoje.
In the distant past, it was somewhat str.it:
In un lontano passato, era un po 'più forte di
i discendenti orribilmente deboli che esistono oggi.
In the distant past, it was somewhat str.de:
In der fernen Vergangenheit war es etwas stärker als
die schrecklich schwachen Nachkommen, die es heute gibt.

In the past, noble families entrusted th.en:
In the past, noble families entrusted their vault
keys to a Klefki. They passed the Klefki down
through the generations, taking good care of it.
In the past, noble families entrusted th.it:
In passato le famiglie nobili affidavano la loro tomba
chiavi di un Klefki. Hanno passato il Klefki
attraverso le generazioni, prendendosene cura.
In the past, noble families entrusted th.fr:
Autrefois, les familles nobles confiaient leur caveau
les clés d'un Klefki. Ils ont transmis le Klefki
à travers les générations, en en prenant bien soin.
In the past, noble families entrusted th.es:
En el pasado, las familias nobles confiaban su bóveda
llaves de un Klefki. Pasaron el Klefki
a través de las generaciones, cuidándolo bien.
In the past, noble families entrusted th.de:
In der Vergangenheit vertrauten Adelsfamilien ihre Tresore an
Schlüssel zu einem Klefki. Sie reichten den Klefki weiter
über Generationen hinweg und sich gut darum gekümmert.
In the past, noble families entrusted th.pt-br:
No passado, as famílias nobres confiavam o seu cofre
chaves para um Klefki. Eles passaram o Klefki para baixo
através das gerações, cuidando bem dele.
In the past, noble families entrusted th.zh-tw:
過去，貴族家庭將他們的金庫託付給
Klefki 的鑰匙。他們將 Klefki 傳承了下來
代代相傳，精心呵護。

It appears whenever there is world confl.en:
It appears whenever there is world conflict,
burning down any place it travels through.
It appears whenever there is world confl.es:
Aparece cada vez que hay un conflicto mundial,
quemando cualquier lugar por el que pase.
It appears whenever there is world confl.zh-tw:
每當世界發生衝突時它就會出現，
燒毀它所經過的任何地方。
It appears whenever there is world confl.pt-br:
Aparece sempre que há conflito mundial,
queimando qualquer lugar por onde passa.
It appears whenever there is world confl.fr:
Il apparaît chaque fois qu'il y a un conflit mondial,
brûlant n'importe quel endroit qu'il traverse.
It appears whenever there is world confl.it:
Appare ogni volta che c'è un conflitto mondiale,
bruciando qualsiasi luogo attraversi.
It appears whenever there is world confl.de:
Es erscheint immer dann, wenn es einen Weltkonflikt gibt,
Es brennt jeden Ort nieder, durch den es reist.

It attaches itself to a tree branch usin.en:
It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of
its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
It attaches itself to a tree branch usin.es:
Se adhiere a la rama de un árbol usando la parte superior de
su cabeza. A veces, los fuertes vientos pueden provocar su caída.
It attaches itself to a tree branch usin.fr:
Il s'attache à une branche d'arbre en utilisant le sommet de
sa tête. Des vents violents peuvent parfois le faire tomber.
It attaches itself to a tree branch usin.pt-br:
Ele se prende a um galho de árvore usando a parte superior
sua cabeça. Ventos fortes às vezes podem fazê-lo cair.
It attaches itself to a tree branch usin.it:
Si attacca al ramo di un albero utilizzando la parte superiore
la sua testa. I forti venti a volte possono farlo cadere.
It attaches itself to a tree branch usin.zh-tw:
它利用頂部將自己附著在樹枝上
它的頭。強風有時會使其掉落。
It attaches itself to a tree branch usin.de:
Es befestigt sich mit der Spitze an einem Ast
sein Kopf. Starke Winde können manchmal zum Absturz führen.

It attacks using the claws on its tail..en:
It attacks using the claws on its tail. Once locked
in its grip, its prey is unable to move as this
Pokémon's poison seeps in.
It attacks using the claws on its tail..es:
Ataca usando las garras de su cola. Una vez bloqueado
en su agarre, su presa no puede moverse ya que esto
El veneno de Pokémon se filtra.
It attacks using the claws on its tail..fr:
Il attaque en utilisant les griffes de sa queue. Une fois verrouillé
sous son emprise, sa proie est incapable de bouger car cela
Le poison de Pokémon s'infiltre.
It attacks using the claws on its tail..zh-tw:
它使用尾巴上的爪子進行攻擊。一旦鎖定
在它的控制下，它的獵物無法移動
寶可夢的毒液滲入體內。
It attacks using the claws on its tail..de:
Es greift mit den Krallen an seinem Schwanz an. Einmal verschlossen
In seinem Griff kann sich seine Beute nicht so fortbewegen
Das Gift des Pokémon dringt ein.
It attacks using the claws on its tail..pt-br:
Ele ataca usando as garras da cauda. Uma vez bloqueado
em suas garras, sua presa é incapaz de se mover, pois isso
O veneno do Pokémon penetra.
It attacks using the claws on its tail..it:
Attacca usando gli artigli sulla coda. Una volta bloccato
nella sua presa, la sua preda non è in grado di muoversi
Il veleno dei Pokémon penetra.

It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.en:
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.
As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets
more and more pumped.
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.fr:
Il attaque avec des coups rapides de son bâton.
En frappant à une vitesse incroyable, il devient
de plus en plus pompé.
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.de:
Es greift mit schnellen Schlägen seines Stockes an.
Da es mit erstaunlicher Geschwindigkeit zuschlägt, wird es
immer mehr aufgepumpt.
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.es:
Ataca con rápidos golpes de su bastón.
Mientras golpea con una velocidad asombrosa, se vuelve
cada vez más bombeado.
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.zh-tw:
它用棍子快速擊打進行攻擊。
當它以驚人的速度撞擊時，它得到了
越來越抽。
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.it:
Attacca con rapidi colpi del bastone.
Mentre colpisce con una velocità sorprendente, ottiene
sempre più pompato.
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.pt-br:
Ele ataca com batidas rápidas de seu bastão.
À medida que ataca com uma velocidade incrível, fica
cada vez mais bombeado.

It brandishes its gaping mouth in a disp.en:
It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of
fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of
sand while attacking.
It brandishes its gaping mouth in a disp.es:
Blande su boca abierta en un alarde de
fuerza temible. Genera grandes cantidades de
arena mientras ataca.
It brandishes its gaping mouth in a disp.fr:
Il brandit sa gueule béante dans un étalage de
une force redoutable. Il lève de grandes quantités de
du sable en attaquant.
It brandishes its gaping mouth in a disp.pt-br:
Ele brande sua boca escancarada em uma exibição de
força temível. Ele levanta grandes quantidades de
areia enquanto ataca.
It brandishes its gaping mouth in a disp.de:
Es schwenkt sein aufgerissenes Maul zur Schau
furchterregende Stärke. Es werden große Mengen davon erzeugt
Sand beim Angriff.
It brandishes its gaping mouth in a disp.it:
Brandisce la bocca spalancata in segno di
forza temibile. Solleva grandi quantità di
sabbia durante l'attacco.
It brandishes its gaping mouth in a disp.zh-tw:
它揮舞著張開的嘴巴，展示著
可怕的力量。它籌集了大量
攻擊時撒沙。

It burrows into the ground to create its.en:
It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If
hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp
claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.
It burrows into the ground to create its.es:
Se esconde en el suelo para crear su nido. si
Las piedras duras impiden su excavación, utiliza su afilado
garras para romperlas y luego continúa cavando.
It burrows into the ground to create its.de:
Es gräbt sich in den Boden ein, um sein Nest zu bauen. Wenn
Harte Steine erschweren ihm den Tunnelbau, er nutzt seine Schärfe
Krallen, um sie zu zerschmettern, und gräbt dann weiter.
It burrows into the ground to create its.pt-br:
Ele se enterra no solo para criar seu ninho. Se
pedras duras impedem a sua construção de túneis, ele usa suas pontas afiadas
garras para quebrá-los e depois continua cavando.
It burrows into the ground to create its.it:
Scava nel terreno per creare il suo nido. Se
le pietre dure gli impediscono di scavare tunnel, usa il suo tagliente
artigli per frantumarli e poi continua a scavare.
It burrows into the ground to create its.fr:
Il s'enfouit dans le sol pour créer son nid. Si
les pierres dures entravent son creusement, il utilise ses pointes acérées
griffes pour les briser puis continue à creuser.
It burrows into the ground to create its.zh-tw:
它鑽入地下以築巢。如果
堅硬的石頭阻礙了它的隧道挖掘，它利用其鋒利的
用爪子把它們打碎，然後繼續挖掘。

It can learn and speak human words. If t.en:
It can learn and speak human words. If they gather,
they all learn the same saying.
It can learn and speak human words. If t.pt-br:
Ele pode aprender e falar palavras humanas. Se eles se reunirem,
todos eles aprendem o mesmo ditado.
It can learn and speak human words. If t.fr:
Il peut apprendre et prononcer des mots humains. S'ils se rassemblent,
ils apprennent tous le même dicton.
It can learn and speak human words. If t.it:
Può imparare e pronunciare parole umane. Se si riuniscono,
imparano tutti lo stesso detto.
It can learn and speak human words. If t.es:
Puede aprender y hablar palabras humanas. Si se reúnen,
todos aprenden el mismo dicho.
It can learn and speak human words. If t.zh-tw:
它可以學習並說出人類語言。如果他們聚集在一起，
他們都學著同樣的一句話。
It can learn and speak human words. If t.de:
Es kann menschliche Wörter lernen und sprechen. Wenn sie sich versammeln,
Sie alle lernen das gleiche Sprichwort.

It can lull people to sleep and make the.en:
It can lull people to sleep and make them dream.
It is active during nights of the new moon.
It can lull people to sleep and make the.es:
Puede adormecer a la gente y hacerles soñar.
Está activo durante las noches de luna nueva.
It can lull people to sleep and make the.fr:
Cela peut endormir les gens et les faire rêver.
Il est actif les nuits de nouvelle lune.
It can lull people to sleep and make the.de:
Es kann Menschen in den Schlaf wiegen und zum Träumen bringen.
Es ist in den Nächten des Neumondes aktiv.
It can lull people to sleep and make the.zh-tw:
它可以使人入睡並做夢。
它在新月的夜晚很活躍。
It can lull people to sleep and make the.pt-br:
Pode acalmar as pessoas para dormir e fazê-las sonhar.
Está ativo durante as noites de lua nova.
It can lull people to sleep and make the.it:
Può far addormentare le persone e farle sognare.
È attivo durante le notti di luna nuova.

It can't relax if it or its surroundings.en:
It can't relax if it or its surroundings are not clean.
It wipes off dirt with its wings.
It can't relax if it or its surroundings.es:
No puede relajarse si él o sus alrededores no están limpios.
Limpia la suciedad con sus alas.
It can't relax if it or its surroundings.fr:
Il ne peut pas se détendre si lui-même ou ses environs ne sont pas propres.
Il essuie la saleté avec ses ailes.
It can't relax if it or its surroundings.pt-br:
Ele não pode relaxar se ele ou seus arredores não estiverem limpos.
Ele limpa a sujeira com suas asas.
It can't relax if it or its surroundings.zh-tw:
如果它或它的周圍環境不干淨，它就不能放鬆。
它用翅膀擦去污垢。
It can't relax if it or its surroundings.it:
Non può rilassarsi se lui o i suoi dintorni non sono puliti.
Elimina lo sporco con le ali.
It can't relax if it or its surroundings.de:
Es kann sich nicht entspannen, wenn es oder seine Umgebung nicht sauber sind.
Mit seinen Flügeln wischt es Schmutz weg.

It climbs trees by hooking on with its s.en:
It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws.
Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping
them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.
It climbs trees by hooking on with its s.es:
Trepa a los árboles enganchándose con sus afiladas garras.
Sandslash comparte las bayas que recoge y las deja caer.
ellos hasta Sandshrew esperando debajo del árbol.
It climbs trees by hooking on with its s.fr:
Il grimpe aux arbres en s'accrochant avec ses griffes acérées.
Sandslash partage les baies qu'il cueille, les laissant tomber
descendez-les à Sandshrew qui les attend sous l'arbre.
It climbs trees by hooking on with its s.pt-br:
Ele sobe em árvores prendendo-se com suas garras afiadas.
Sandslash compartilha as frutas que coleta, deixando cair
eles até Sandshrew esperando embaixo da árvore.
It climbs trees by hooking on with its s.zh-tw:
它通過用鋒利的爪子鉤住樹木來爬樹。
Sandslash 分享它收集的漿果，掉落
他們來到樹下等候的山鼠那裡。
It climbs trees by hooking on with its s.de:
Es klettert auf Bäume, indem es sich mit seinen scharfen Krallen daran festhält.
Sandslash teilt die Beeren, die er sammelt, und lässt sie fallen
sie hinunter zu Sandshrew, der unter dem Baum wartete.
It climbs trees by hooking on with its s.it:
Si arrampica sugli alberi agganciandosi con i suoi artigli affilati.
Sandslash condivide le bacche che raccoglie, lasciandole cadere
li scesero a Sandshrew aspettando sotto l'albero.

It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward t.en:
It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward the peak
of a mountain. As soon as it reaches the summit,
it rolls back down the way it came.
It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward t.fr:
Il escalade les falaises en se dirigeant vers le sommet
d'une montagne. Dès qu'il atteint le sommet,
il redescend comme il est venu.
It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward t.es:
Sube acantilados mientras se dirige hacia la cima.
de una montaña. Tan pronto como llegue a la cumbre,
vuelve a rodar por donde vino.
It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward t.pt-br:
Ele sobe penhascos enquanto se dirige ao pico
de uma montanha. Assim que chegar ao cume,
ele rola de volta do jeito que veio.
It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward t.it:
Si arrampica sulle scogliere mentre si dirige verso la vetta
di una montagna. Non appena raggiunge la vetta,
rotola indietro nel modo in cui è venuto.
It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward t.zh-tw:
它爬上懸崖，走向頂峰
一座山的。當它到達山頂時，
它會沿著來時的方向滾回。
It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward t.de:
Auf dem Weg zum Gipfel klettert es Klippen hinauf
eines Berges. Sobald es den Gipfel erreicht,
es rollt wieder den Weg hinunter, den es gekommen ist.

It crosses the world, running over the s.en:
It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of
oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.
It crosses the world, running over the s.fr:
Il traverse le monde, parcourant les surfaces de
océans et rivières. Il apparaît sur les fronts de mer pittoresques.
It crosses the world, running over the s.es:
Atraviesa el mundo, corriendo sobre las superficies de
océanos y ríos. Aparece en muelles pintorescos.
It crosses the world, running over the s.zh-tw:
它穿越世界，跑遍世界的表面
海洋和河流。它出現在風景秀麗的海濱。
It crosses the world, running over the s.it:
Attraversa il mondo, correndo sulle superfici
oceani e fiumi. Appare sui lungomare panoramici.
It crosses the world, running over the s.de:
Es durchquert die Welt und läuft über die Oberflächen von
Ozeane und Flüsse. Es erscheint an malerischen Uferpromenaden.
It crosses the world, running over the s.pt-br:
Atravessa o mundo, percorrendo as superfícies de
oceanos e rios. Aparece em orlas pitorescas.

It darts around opponents with a flurry.en:
It darts around opponents with a flurry of quick
movements, slicing them up with its horns.
It darts around opponents with a flurry.es:
Se lanza alrededor de los oponentes con una ráfaga de movimientos rápidos.
movimientos, cortándolos con sus cuernos.
It darts around opponents with a flurry.fr:
Il fonce autour de ses adversaires avec une rafale de coups rapides.
mouvements, les tranchant avec ses cornes.
It darts around opponents with a flurry.pt-br:
Ele dispara em torno dos oponentes com uma onda de movimentos rápidos
movimentos, cortando-os com seus chifres.
It darts around opponents with a flurry.zh-tw:
它以一陣快速的速度繞過對手
動作，用角將它們切碎。
It darts around opponents with a flurry.it:
Sfreccia intorno agli avversari con una raffica di rapidità
movimenti, affettandoli con le sue corna.
It darts around opponents with a flurry.de:
Es schießt schnell um Gegner herum
Bewegungen und schneidet sie mit seinen Hörnern auf.

It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating.en:
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid
metal within its body is how it generates energy.
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating.fr:
Il dissout et mange le métal. Liquide en circulation
le métal dans son corps est la façon dont il génère de l'énergie.
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating.es:
Se disuelve y come metal. Líquido circulante
El metal dentro de su cuerpo es la forma en que genera energía.
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating.de:
Es löst sich auf und frisst Metall. Zirkulierende Flüssigkeit
Metall in seinem Körper erzeugt Energie.
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating.zh-tw:
它會溶解併吞噬金屬。循環液
它體內的金屬是它產生能量的方式。
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating.it:
Si dissolve e mangia il metallo. Liquido circolante
il metallo all'interno del suo corpo è il modo in cui genera energia.
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating.pt-br:
Ele se dissolve e come metal. Líquido circulante
metal dentro de seu corpo é como ele gera energia.

It drinks dew that collects on its silk.en:
It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for
evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
It drinks dew that collects on its silk.fr:
Il boit la rosée qui s'accumule sur sa soie et attend
évolution. Son cocon dur repousse les attaques.
It drinks dew that collects on its silk.es:
Bebe el rocío que se acumula en su seda y espera
evolución. Su duro capullo repele los ataques.
It drinks dew that collects on its silk.it:
Beve la rugiada che si raccoglie sulla sua seta e attende
evoluzione. Il suo duro bozzolo respinge gli attacchi.
It drinks dew that collects on its silk.pt-br:
Bebe o orvalho que se acumula na sua seda e espera
evolução. Seu casulo duro repele ataques.
It drinks dew that collects on its silk.de:
Es trinkt Tau, der sich auf seiner Seide sammelt und darauf wartet
Entwicklung. Sein harter Kokon wehrt Angriffe ab.
It drinks dew that collects on its silk.zh-tw:
它喝著絲上凝結的露水，等待著
進化。它的硬繭可以抵禦攻擊。

It electrifies its claws and tears its o.en:
It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents
apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack,
they'll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
It electrifies its claws and tears its o.es:
Electrifica sus garras y desgarra a sus oponentes.
aparte con ellos. Incluso si esquivan su ataque,
Serán electrocutados por las chispas voladoras.
It electrifies its claws and tears its o.fr:
Il électrise ses griffes et déchire ses adversaires
à part avec eux. Même s'ils esquivent son attaque,
ils seront électrocutés par les étincelles volantes.
It electrifies its claws and tears its o.de:
Es elektrisiert seine Krallen und zerreißt seine Gegner
getrennt von ihnen. Selbst wenn sie seinem Angriff ausweichen,
Sie werden durch die fliegenden Funken einen Stromschlag erleiden.
It electrifies its claws and tears its o.pt-br:
Eletrifica suas garras e rasga seus oponentes
além deles. Mesmo que eles evitem seu ataque,
eles serão eletrocutados pelas faíscas voadoras.
It electrifies its claws and tears its o.zh-tw:
它給它的爪子通電並撕裂它的對手
與他們分開。就算躲過了它的攻擊，
他們會被飛濺的火花觸電。
It electrifies its claws and tears its o.it:
Elettrizza i suoi artigli e dilania i suoi avversari
a parte loro. Anche se schivano il suo attacco,
saranno fulminati dalle scintille volanti.

It flings sand into the eyes of its prey.en:
It flings sand into the eyes of its prey and tries to
close in on them while they're blinded, but since
Sandygast is so slow, the prey tends to escape.
It flings sand into the eyes of its prey.es:
Arroja arena a los ojos de su presa y trata de
acercarse a ellos mientras están cegados, pero desde
Sandygast es tan lento que la presa tiende a escapar.
It flings sand into the eyes of its prey.fr:
Il jette du sable dans les yeux de sa proie et tente de
rapprochez-vous d'eux pendant qu'ils sont aveuglés, mais depuis
Sandygast est si lent que la proie a tendance à s'échapper.
It flings sand into the eyes of its prey.it:
Lancia la sabbia negli occhi della preda e ci prova
avvicinateli mentre sono accecati, ma da allora
Sandygast è così lento che la preda tende a scappare.
It flings sand into the eyes of its prey.de:
Es wirft Sand in die Augen seiner Beute und versucht es auch
Nähere dich ihnen, während sie geblendet sind, aber seitdem
Sandygast ist so langsam, dass die Beute dazu neigt, zu entkommen.
It flings sand into the eyes of its prey.zh-tw:
它把沙子扔進獵物的眼睛裡，並試圖
在他們失明的時候接近他們，但自從
桑迪加斯特行動緩慢，獵物往往會逃跑。
It flings sand into the eyes of its prey.pt-br:
Ele joga areia nos olhos de sua presa e tenta
aproxime-se deles enquanto estão cegos, mas desde
Sandygast é tão lento que a presa tende a escapar.

It gazes at the stars to predict the fut.en:
It gazes at the stars to predict the future. It acts
somewhat detached because it has seen the end
of all existence.
It gazes at the stars to predict the fut.fr:
Il regarde les étoiles pour prédire l’avenir. Il agit
un peu détaché car il a vu la fin
de toute existence.
It gazes at the stars to predict the fut.es:
Mira las estrellas para predecir el futuro. Actúa
algo desapegado porque ha visto el final
de toda existencia.
It gazes at the stars to predict the fut.de:
Es blickt in die Sterne, um die Zukunft vorherzusagen. Es wirkt
etwas distanziert, weil es das Ende gesehen hat
aller Existenz.
It gazes at the stars to predict the fut.it:
Guarda le stelle per predire il futuro. Agisce
un po’ distaccato perché ha visto la fine
di tutta l'esistenza.
It gazes at the stars to predict the fut.zh-tw:
它凝視星星來預測未來。它的作用
有點超然，因為它已經看到了結局
所有存在的。
It gazes at the stars to predict the fut.pt-br:
Ele olha para as estrelas para prever o futuro. Ele atua
um pouco desapegado porque viu o fim
de toda a existência.

It gets excited when it sees a dance it\.en:
It gets excited when it sees a dance it
doesn't know. This hard worker practices
diligently until it can learn that dance.
It gets excited when it sees a dance it\.fr:
Il s'excite quand il voit une danse
ne sait pas. Ce travailleur acharné pratique
avec diligence jusqu'à ce qu'il puisse apprendre cette danse.
It gets excited when it sees a dance it\.es:
Se emociona cuando ve un baile.
no lo sabe. Este trabajador practica
diligentemente hasta que pueda aprender ese baile.
It gets excited when it sees a dance it\.zh-tw:
當它看到舞蹈時它會興奮
不知道。這個勤奮的人練習
勤奮地練習，直到它能學會那種舞蹈。
It gets excited when it sees a dance it\.pt-br:
Fica animado quando vê uma dança
não sabe. Este trabalhador pratica
diligentemente até que possa aprender essa dança.
It gets excited when it sees a dance it\.de:
Es wird aufgeregt, wenn es jemanden tanzen sieht
weiß es nicht. Dieser harte Arbeiter übt
fleißig, bis es diesen Tanz lernen kann.
It gets excited when it sees a dance it\.it:
Si emoziona quando vede qualcuno ballarlo
non lo sa. Questa pratica del gran lavoratore
diligentemente finché non possa imparare quella danza.

It has a body and heart of steel. It wor.en:
It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its
allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.
It has a body and heart of steel. It wor.fr:
Il a un corps et un cœur en acier. Cela a fonctionné avec son
alliés pour punir les gens lorsqu'ils blessent des Pokémon.
It has a body and heart of steel. It wor.it:
Ha un corpo e un cuore d'acciaio. Ha funzionato con il suo
alleati per punire le persone quando feriscono i Pokémon.
It has a body and heart of steel. It wor.de:
Es hat einen Körper und ein Herz aus Stahl. Es hat mit seinem funktioniert
Verbündete, um Menschen zu bestrafen, wenn sie Pokémon verletzen.
It has a body and heart of steel. It wor.es:
Tiene cuerpo y corazón de acero. Funcionó con su
aliados para castigar a las personas cuando lastiman a Pokémon.
It has a body and heart of steel. It wor.pt-br:
Tem corpo e coração de aço. Funcionou com seu
aliados para punir as pessoas quando elas machucam Pokémon.
It has a body and heart of steel. It wor.zh-tw:
它有鋼鐵般的身體和鋼鐵般的心臟。它與它的
當人們傷害神奇寶貝時，盟友會懲罰他們。

It has an aggressive nature. It stabs pr.en:
It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its
long, narrow mouth to drain the prey's fluids.
It has an aggressive nature. It stabs pr.es:
Tiene un carácter agresivo. Apuñala a su presa con su
Boca larga y estrecha para drenar los fluidos de la presa.
It has an aggressive nature. It stabs pr.de:
Es hat eine aggressive Natur. Es ersticht die Beute damit
Langes, schmales Maul, um die Flüssigkeiten der Beute abzuleiten.
It has an aggressive nature. It stabs pr.it:
Ha una natura aggressiva. Trafigge la preda con il suo
bocca lunga e stretta per drenare i liquidi della preda.
It has an aggressive nature. It stabs pr.fr:
Il a un caractère agressif. Il poignarde ses proies avec son
bouche longue et étroite pour drainer les fluides de la proie.
It has an aggressive nature. It stabs pr.pt-br:
Tem uma natureza agressiva. Ele apunhala a presa com seu
boca longa e estreita para drenar os fluidos da presa.
It has an aggressive nature. It stabs pr.zh-tw:
它具有攻擊性。它用它的刺刺獵物
長而窄的嘴可以排出獵物的體液。

It has excellent regenerative capabiliti.en:
It has excellent regenerative capabilities. Legs
that a Mareanie has lost have a very bitter,
astringent flavor—they're not suitable as food.
It has excellent regenerative capabiliti.fr:
Il possède d’excellentes capacités de régénération. Jambes
qu'une Mareanie a perdu a un très amer,
saveur astringente – ils ne conviennent pas comme aliment.
It has excellent regenerative capabiliti.es:
Tiene excelentes capacidades regenerativas. Piernas
que una Mareanie ha perdido tiene una muy amarga,
sabor astringente: no son adecuados como alimento.
It has excellent regenerative capabiliti.zh-tw:
它具有出色的再生能力。腿
Mareanie 失去了一個非常痛苦的人，
味道澀，不適合作為食品。
It has excellent regenerative capabiliti.it:
Ha eccellenti capacità rigenerative. Gambe
che un Mareanie ha perso ha un sapore molto amaro,
sapore astringente: non sono adatti come cibo.
It has excellent regenerative capabiliti.pt-br:
Possui excelentes capacidades regenerativas. Pernas
que uma Mareanie perdeu é muito amarga,
sabor adstringente - eles não são adequados como alimento.
It has excellent regenerative capabiliti.de:
Es verfügt über hervorragende Regenerationsfähigkeiten. Beine
Dass eine Mareanie verloren hat, hat einen sehr bitteren,
adstringierender Geschmack – sie sind nicht als Lebensmittel geeignet.

It has phenomenal power. It will mercile.en:
It has phenomenal power. It will mercilessly crush
anyone or anything that bullies small Pokémon.
It has phenomenal power. It will mercile.fr:
Il a un pouvoir phénoménal. Il écrasera sans pitié
quiconque ou quoi que ce soit qui intimide les petits Pokémon.
It has phenomenal power. It will mercile.es:
Tiene un poder fenomenal. Aplastará sin piedad
cualquier persona o cosa que intimide a los Pokémon pequeños.
It has phenomenal power. It will mercile.pt-br:
Tem um poder fenomenal. Ele irá esmagar impiedosamente
qualquer pessoa ou qualquer coisa que intimide pequenos Pokémon.
It has phenomenal power. It will mercile.zh-tw:
它具有驚人的力量。它將無情地碾壓
任何欺負小神奇寶貝的人或事物。
It has phenomenal power. It will mercile.it:
Ha un potere fenomenale. Lo schiaccerà senza pietà
chiunque o qualunque cosa faccia il prepotente contro i Pokémon piccoli.
It has phenomenal power. It will mercile.de:
Es hat eine phänomenale Kraft. Es wird gnadenlos zermalmen
irgendjemand oder irgendetwas, das kleine Pokémon schikaniert.

It is born with a wondrous power that le.en:
It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond
with any kind of Pokémon.
It is born with a wondrous power that le.fr:
Il est né avec un pouvoir merveilleux qui lui permet de créer des liens
avec n'importe quel type de Pokémon.
It is born with a wondrous power that le.es:
Nace con un poder maravilloso que le permite unirse.
con cualquier tipo de Pokémon.
It is born with a wondrous power that le.zh-tw:
它與生俱來就有一種奇妙的力量，可以讓它結合在一起
與任何種類的神奇寶貝。
It is born with a wondrous power that le.it:
Nasce con un potere meraviglioso che gli consente di legarsi
con qualsiasi tipo di Pokémon.
It is born with a wondrous power that le.de:
Es wird mit einer wundersamen Kraft geboren, die es verbindet
mit jeder Art von Pokémon.
It is born with a wondrous power that le.pt-br:
Nasce com um poder maravilhoso que lhe permite unir-se
com qualquer tipo de Pokémon.

It is docile and prefers to avoid confli.en:
It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict.
If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
It is docile and prefers to avoid confli.fr:
Il est docile et préfère éviter les conflits.
Toutefois, s’il est dérangé, il peut riposter férocement.
It is docile and prefers to avoid confli.es:
Es dócil y prefiere evitar los conflictos.
Sin embargo, si se le molesta, puede devolver el golpe ferozmente.
It is docile and prefers to avoid confli.zh-tw:
它性格溫順，喜歡避免衝突。
然而，如果受到干擾，它可能會猛烈反擊。
It is docile and prefers to avoid confli.de:
Es ist fügsam und geht Konflikten lieber aus dem Weg.
Wenn es jedoch gestört wird, kann es heftig zurückschlagen.
It is docile and prefers to avoid confli.pt-br:
É dócil e prefere evitar conflitos.
Se perturbado, porém, pode contra-atacar ferozmente.
It is docile and prefers to avoid confli.it:
È docile e preferisce evitare i conflitti.
Se disturbato, tuttavia, può contrattaccare ferocemente.

It is highly popular among female Traine.en:
It is highly popular among female Trainers for its
sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
It is highly popular among female Traine.es:
Es muy popular entre las entrenadoras por su
pelaje sublime. No guarda nido.
It is highly popular among female Traine.fr:
Il est très populaire parmi les dresseuses pour son
fourrure sublime. Il ne garde pas de nid.
It is highly popular among female Traine.it:
È molto popolare tra le Allenatrici per il suo
pelliccia sublime. Non mantiene il nido.
It is highly popular among female Traine.zh-tw:
由於它的特點，深受女性訓練師的歡迎
高貴的皮毛。它不築巢。
It is highly popular among female Traine.pt-br:
É muito popular entre as treinadoras por seu
pele sublime. Não mantém ninho.
It is highly popular among female Traine.de:
Es erfreut sich bei weiblichen Trainern großer Beliebtheit
erhabenes Fell. Es hält kein Nest.

It is said to have the ability to grant.en:
It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for
just one week every thousand years.
It is said to have the ability to grant.es:
Se dice que tiene la capacidad de conceder cualquier deseo de
sólo una semana cada mil años.
It is said to have the ability to grant.fr:
On dit qu'il a la capacité d'exaucer n'importe quel souhait
juste une semaine tous les mille ans.
It is said to have the ability to grant.pt-br:
Diz-se que tem a capacidade de realizar qualquer desejo de
apenas uma semana a cada mil anos.
It is said to have the ability to grant.zh-tw:
據說有能力實現任何願望
每千年只有一周。
It is said to have the ability to grant.it:
Si dice che abbia la capacità di esaudire qualsiasi desiderio
solo una settimana ogni mille anni.
It is said to have the ability to grant.de:
Ihm wird die Fähigkeit nachgesagt, jeden Wunsch zu erfüllen
nur eine Woche alle tausend Jahre.

It lays traps of electrified threads nea.en:
It lays traps of electrified threads near the nests
of bird Pokémon, aiming to snare chicks that are
not yet good at flying.
It lays traps of electrified threads nea.es:
Pone trampas de hilos electrificados cerca de los nidos.
de Pokémon pájaro, con el objetivo de atrapar polluelos que son
Todavía no soy bueno volando.
It lays traps of electrified threads nea.fr:
Il pose des pièges de fils électrifiés à proximité des nids
de Pokémon oiseaux, visant à piéger les poussins qui sont
pas encore doué pour voler.
It lays traps of electrified threads nea.it:
Piazza trappole di fili elettrizzati vicino ai nidi
di Pokémon uccello, con l'obiettivo di intrappolare i pulcini che lo sono
non ancora bravo a volare.
It lays traps of electrified threads nea.de:
Es legt Fallen aus elektrifizierten Fäden in der Nähe der Nester
von Vogel-Pokémon, die darauf abzielen, Küken zu fangen
noch nicht gut im Fliegen.
It lays traps of electrified threads nea.pt-br:
Coloca armadilhas de fios eletrificados perto dos ninhos
de Pokémon pássaros, com o objetivo de capturar filhotes que estão
ainda não é bom em voar.
It lays traps of electrified threads nea.zh-tw:
它在巢穴附近放置帶電線陷阱
鳥類神奇寶貝，旨在誘捕小雞
還不擅長飛行。

It lives among the tall grass and in for.en:
It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels
attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.
It lives among the tall grass and in for.fr:
Il vit parmi les herbes hautes et dans les forêts. Il repousse
attaque en soulevant les pointes sur son arrière.
It lives among the tall grass and in for.es:
Vive entre la hierba alta y en los bosques. repele
ataca levantando las púas en su parte trasera.
It lives among the tall grass and in for.zh-tw:
它生活在高高的草叢和森林中。它排斥
通過抬起背部的尖刺進行攻擊。
It lives among the tall grass and in for.it:
Vive tra l'erba alta e nelle foreste. Respinge
attacca sollevando gli spuntoni sul retro.
It lives among the tall grass and in for.de:
Er lebt im hohen Gras und in Wäldern. Es stößt ab
Er greift an, indem er die Stacheln an seinem Rücken anhebt.
It lives among the tall grass and in for.pt-br:
Vive entre a grama alta e nas florestas. Isso repele
ataca levantando os espinhos em sua parte traseira.

It lives at the water's edge where it is.en:
It lives at the water's edge where it is sunny.
It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and
becomes active at night.
It lives at the water's edge where it is.fr:
Il vit au bord de l'eau où il fait beau.
Il dort sur un lit d'herbe aquatique le jour et
devient actif la nuit.
It lives at the water's edge where it is.es:
Vive a la orilla del agua donde hace sol.
Duerme sobre un lecho de hierba acuática durante el día y
se vuelve activo por la noche.
It lives at the water's edge where it is.it:
Vive in riva al mare dove c'è il sole.
Di giorno dorme su un letto d'erba acquatica e
diventa attivo di notte.
It lives at the water's edge where it is.de:
Es lebt am Wasser, wo es sonnig ist.
Tagsüber schläft es auf einem Bett aus Wassergras
wird nachts aktiv.
It lives at the water's edge where it is.zh-tw:
它生活在陽光充足的水邊。
白天它睡在水草床上，
晚上變得活躍。
It lives at the water's edge where it is.pt-br:
Vive à beira da água, onde faz sol.
Ele dorme em uma cama de grama aquática durante o dia e
torna-se ativo à noite.

It lives deep within the forest. Even af.en:
It lives deep within the forest. Even after evolving
into this splendid form, it hasn't given up on its
petty misdeeds and pranks.
It lives deep within the forest. Even af.fr:
Il vit au plus profond de la forêt. Même après avoir évolué
sous cette forme splendide, il n'a pas abandonné son
petits méfaits et farces.
It lives deep within the forest. Even af.es:
Vive en lo profundo del bosque. Incluso después de evolucionar
en esta espléndida forma, no ha renunciado a su
pequeñas fechorías y bromas.
It lives deep within the forest. Even af.it:
Vive nel profondo della foresta. Anche dopo l'evoluzione
in questa splendida forma, non ha rinunciato alla sua
piccoli misfatti e scherzi.
It lives deep within the forest. Even af.de:
Es lebt tief im Wald. Auch nach der Weiterentwicklung
in diese herrliche Form gebracht hat, hat es nicht aufgegeben
Kleinigkeiten und Streiche.
It lives deep within the forest. Even af.zh-tw:
它生活在森林深處。即使進化後
進入這個輝煌的形式，它並沒有放棄它的
輕微的錯誤行為和惡作劇。
It lives deep within the forest. Even af.pt-br:
Ele vive nas profundezas da floresta. Mesmo depois de evoluir
nesta forma esplêndida, não desistiu de sua
pequenos delitos e brincadeiras.

It lives quietly in the deep forest. It.en:
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to
create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It.fr:
Il vit tranquillement dans la forêt profonde. On dit de
Créez des vents froids d'hiver avec les ventilateurs qu'il contient.
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It.es:
Vive tranquilamente en lo profundo del bosque. se dice que
Crea vientos fríos de invierno con los ventiladores que sostiene.
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It.pt-br:
Ele vive tranquilamente nas profundezas da floresta. Diz-se que
crie ventos frios de inverno com os ventiladores que contém.
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It.zh-tw:
它安靜地生活在密林深處。據說
用它所持有的風扇製造寒冷的冬風。
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It.it:
Vive tranquillamente nella foresta profonda. Si dice
crea freddi venti invernali con i fan che contiene.
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It.de:
Es lebt ruhig im tiefen Wald. Es heißt
Erzeugen Sie mit den darin enthaltenen Ventilatoren kühle Winterwinde.

It loves to bite and yank people's hair.en:
It loves to bite and yank people's hair from
behind without warning, just to see their
shocked reactions.
It loves to bite and yank people's hair.es:
Le encanta morder y arrancarle el pelo a la gente.
detrás sin previo aviso, sólo para ver sus
reacciones de sorpresa.
It loves to bite and yank people's hair.pt-br:
Ele adora morder e arrancar o cabelo das pessoas
atrás sem avisar, só para ver seus
reações chocadas.
It loves to bite and yank people's hair.fr:
Il adore mordre et arracher les cheveux des gens.
derrière sans prévenir, juste pour voir leur
réactions choquées.
It loves to bite and yank people's hair.de:
Es liebt es, Menschen in die Haare zu beißen und auszureißen
ohne Vorwarnung zurück, nur um sie zu sehen
schockierte Reaktionen.
It loves to bite and yank people's hair.it:
Ama mordere e strappare i capelli alle persone
dietro senza preavviso, solo per vederli
reazioni scioccate.
It loves to bite and yank people's hair.zh-tw:
牠喜歡咬人並拉扯人的頭髮
毫無徵兆的落後，只是為了看到他們
震驚的反應。

It lurks in cities, pretending to be a l.en:
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp.
Once it finds someone whose death is near,
it will trail quietly after them.
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a l.es:
Acecha en las ciudades, haciéndose pasar por una lámpara.
Una vez que encuentra a alguien cuya muerte está cerca,
los seguirá silenciosamente.
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a l.fr:
Il rôde dans les villes, se faisant passer pour une lampe.
Une fois qu'il trouve quelqu'un dont la mort est proche,
il les suivra tranquillement.
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a l.zh-tw:
它潛伏在城市中，假裝是一盞燈。
一旦它發現某人快要死了，
它會悄悄地跟在他們後面。
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a l.it:
Si nasconde nelle città, fingendo di essere una lampada.
Una volta trovato qualcuno la cui morte è vicina,
li seguirà silenziosamente.
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a l.pt-br:
Espreita nas cidades, fingindo ser uma lâmpada.
Uma vez que encontra alguém cuja morte está próxima,
ele seguirá silenciosamente atrás deles.
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a l.de:
Es lauert in Städten und gibt vor, eine Lampe zu sein.
Sobald es jemanden findet, dessen Tod nahe ist,
es wird ihnen leise folgen.

It nests deep inside a cave. Food there.en:
It nests deep inside a cave. Food there is scarce,
so Deino will sink its teeth into anything that
moves and attempt to eat it.
It nests deep inside a cave. Food there.es:
Anida en lo profundo de una cueva. Allí la comida escasea,
por lo que Deino hundirá sus dientes en cualquier cosa que
se mueve e intenta comérselo.
It nests deep inside a cave. Food there.fr:
Il niche au fond d’une grotte. La nourriture y est rare,
donc Deino mordra à pleines dents dans tout ce qui
bouge et essaie de le manger.
It nests deep inside a cave. Food there.it:
Nidifica nel profondo di una grotta. Il cibo lì è scarso,
quindi Deino affonderà i denti in qualsiasi cosa
si muove e tenta di mangiarlo.
It nests deep inside a cave. Food there.de:
Es nistet tief in einer Höhle. Das Essen dort ist knapp,
also wird sich Deino in alles hineinbeißen
bewegt sich und versucht es zu essen.
It nests deep inside a cave. Food there.zh-tw:
它在洞穴深處築巢。那裡食物匱乏，
所以 Deino 會全力以赴做任何事
移動並嘗試吃掉它。
It nests deep inside a cave. Food there.pt-br:
Nidifica nas profundezas de uma caverna. A comida lá é escassa,
então Deino vai cravar os dentes em qualquer coisa que
se move e tenta comê-lo.

It never forgets any attack it endured w.en:
It never forgets any attack it endured while in the
cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
It never forgets any attack it endured w.es:
Nunca olvida ningún ataque que haya sufrido mientras estaba en el
capullo. Después de la evolución, busca venganza.
It never forgets any attack it endured w.it:
Non dimentica mai nessun attacco subito mentre si trovava nel
bozzolo. Dopo l'evoluzione, cerca la vendetta.
It never forgets any attack it endured w.de:
Es vergisst nie einen Angriff, den es während seiner Zeit erlitten hat
Kokon. Nach der Evolution strebt es nach Rache.
It never forgets any attack it endured w.fr:
Il n'oublie jamais les attaques qu'il a subies au cours de son séjour dans le pays.
cocon. Après évolution, il cherche à se venger.
It never forgets any attack it endured w.zh-tw:
它永遠不會忘記在戰場上所遭受的任何攻擊
繭。進化後，它尋求回報。
It never forgets any attack it endured w.pt-br:
Ele nunca esquece nenhum ataque que sofreu enquanto estava no
casulo. Após a evolução, busca vingança.

It prefers places with clean water. When.en:
It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs
low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with
its tail.
It prefers places with clean water. When.fr:
Il préfère les endroits avec de l'eau propre. Quand sa touffe coule
bas, il le reconstitue en siphonnant l'eau avec
sa queue.
It prefers places with clean water. When.pt-br:
Prefere locais com água limpa. Quando seu tufo corre
baixo, ele o reabastece sugando água com
sua cauda.
It prefers places with clean water. When.es:
Prefiere lugares con agua limpia. Cuando su penacho corre
baja, la repone extrayendo agua con
su cola.
It prefers places with clean water. When.zh-tw:
它更喜歡有乾淨水源的地方。當它的簇絨運行時
低，它通過吸水來補充它
它的尾巴。
It prefers places with clean water. When.it:
Preferisce luoghi con acqua pulita. Quando il suo ciuffo cola
basso, lo riempie aspirando l'acqua con
la sua coda.
It prefers places with clean water. When.de:
Es bevorzugt Orte mit sauberem Wasser. Wenn sein Büschel läuft
niedrig ist, füllt es ihn wieder auf, indem es Wasser mit ansaugt
sein Schwanz.

It protects its skin by covering its bod.en:
It protects its skin by covering its body in
delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air,
it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
It protects its skin by covering its bod.fr:
Il protège sa peau en recouvrant son corps de
bulles délicates. Sous ses airs joyeux,
il garde un œil vigilant sur son environnement.
It protects its skin by covering its bod.es:
Protege su piel cubriendo su cuerpo con
burbujas delicadas. Bajo su aire despreocupado,
vigila atentamente su entorno.
It protects its skin by covering its bod.zh-tw:
它通過覆蓋身體來保護皮膚
細膩的氣泡。在其無憂無慮的氣氛之下，
它密切關注周圍環境。
It protects its skin by covering its bod.it:
Protegge la sua pelle ricoprendone il corpo
bollicine delicate. Sotto la sua aria spensierata,
mantiene un occhio vigile su ciò che lo circonda.
It protects its skin by covering its bod.pt-br:
Ele protege sua pele cobrindo seu corpo com
bolhas delicadas. Sob seu ar despreocupado,
ele mantém um olhar atento ao seu entorno.
It protects its skin by covering its bod.de:
Es schützt seine Haut, indem es seinen Körper damit bedeckt
zarte Blasen. Unter seiner fröhlichen Atmosphäre,
Es behält seine Umgebung im Auge.

It remembers every dream it eats. It rar.en:
It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats
the dreams of adults because children's are much
tastier.
It remembers every dream it eats. It rar.es:
Recuerda cada sueño que come. rara vez come
los sueños de los adultos porque los de los niños son mucho
más sabroso.
It remembers every dream it eats. It rar.fr:
Il se souvient de chaque rêve qu'il mange. Il mange rarement
les rêves des adultes parce que ceux des enfants sont beaucoup
plus savoureux.
It remembers every dream it eats. It rar.pt-br:
Ele se lembra de cada sonho que come. Raramente come
os sonhos dos adultos porque os das crianças são muito
mais saboroso.
It remembers every dream it eats. It rar.de:
Es erinnert sich an jeden Traum, den es isst. Es frisst selten
Es gibt viele Träume von Erwachsenen, weil es Kinderträume gibt
schmackhafter.
It remembers every dream it eats. It rar.zh-tw:
它記得牠吃下的每一個夢。它很少吃東西
成年人的夢想，因為孩子們的夢想很多
更美味。
It remembers every dream it eats. It rar.it:
Ricorda ogni sogno che mangia. Mangia raramente
i sogni degli adulti perché quelli dei bambini sono tanti
più gustoso.

It searches for prey from the tops of tr.en:
It searches for prey from the tops of trees.
When it spots its favorite food, Bounsweet,
Aipom gets excited and pounces.
It searches for prey from the tops of tr.es:
Busca presas en las copas de los árboles.
Cuando ve su comida favorita, Bounsweet,
Aipom se emociona y salta.
It searches for prey from the tops of tr.de:
Es sucht in den Baumwipfeln nach Beute.
Wenn es sein Lieblingsessen, Bounsweet, entdeckt,
Aipom wird aufgeregt und stürzt sich.
It searches for prey from the tops of tr.it:
Cerca la preda dalle cime degli alberi.
Quando individua il suo cibo preferito, Bounsweet,
Aipom si eccita e si avventa.
It searches for prey from the tops of tr.zh-tw:
它從樹頂尋找獵物。
當它發現它最喜歡的食物 Bounsweet 時，
Aipom 興奮起來並猛撲過去。
It searches for prey from the tops of tr.fr:
Il recherche ses proies à la cime des arbres.
Lorsqu'il repère son aliment préféré, le Bounsweet,
Aipom s'excite et bondit.
It searches for prey from the tops of tr.pt-br:
Ele procura presas no topo das árvores.
Quando avista sua comida favorita, Bounsweet,
Aipom fica animado e ataca.

It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and.en:
It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them
into its empty body. What happens inside is
a mystery.
It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and.fr:
Il cherche les feux follets à la dérive et les suce
dans son corps vide. Ce qui se passe à l'intérieur est
un mystère.
It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and.es:
Busca fuegos fatuos a la deriva y los chupa.
en su cuerpo vacío. Lo que pasa dentro es
un misterio.
It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and.zh-tw:
它尋找漂浮的鬼火併吸走它們
進入它空虛的身體。裡面發生的事情是
一個謎。
It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and.de:
Es sucht nach treibenden Irrlichtern und saugt sie aus
in seinen leeren Körper. Was im Inneren passiert, ist
ein Geheimnis.
It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and.it:
Cerca i fuochi fatui alla deriva e li succhia
nel suo corpo vuoto. Quello che succede dentro è
un mistero.
It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and.pt-br:
Ele procura fogos-fátuos à deriva e os suga
em seu corpo vazio. O que acontece lá dentro é
um mistério.

It sends electricity through its legs to.en:
It sends electricity through its legs to boost their
strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks
50 mph.
It sends electricity through its legs to.es:
Envía electricidad a través de sus piernas para aumentar su
fuerza. Al correr a máxima velocidad, se rompe fácilmente.
50 mph.
It sends electricity through its legs to.fr:
Il envoie de l'électricité à travers ses pattes pour stimuler leur
force. Fonctionnant à toute vitesse, il se casse facilement
50 mph.
It sends electricity through its legs to.zh-tw:
它通過腿部發送電力來增強其力量
力量。高速跑很容易壞
50 英里/小時。
It sends electricity through its legs to.it:
Invia elettricità attraverso le gambe per potenziarle
forza. Correndo alla massima velocità si rompe facilmente
50 miglia all'ora.
It sends electricity through its legs to.pt-br:
Ele envia eletricidade pelas pernas para aumentar seu
força. Correndo em alta velocidade, ele quebra facilmente
50 mph.
It sends electricity through its legs to.de:
Es sendet Elektrizität durch seine Beine, um sie anzukurbeln
Stärke. Bei Höchstgeschwindigkeit geht es leicht kaputt
50 Meilen pro Stunde.

It sends its feathers, which are as shar.en:
It sends its feathers, which are as sharp
as blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong,
so its kicks are also formidable.
It sends its feathers, which are as shar.es:
Envía sus plumas, que son tan afiladas
como espadas, volando en ataque. Sus piernas son fuertes
por eso sus patadas también son formidables.
It sends its feathers, which are as shar.fr:
Il envoie ses plumes aussi pointues
comme des lames, volant en attaque. Ses jambes sont fortes,
donc ses coups de pied sont également redoutables.
It sends its feathers, which are as shar.pt-br:
Ele envia suas penas, que são tão afiadas
como lâminas, voando em ataque. Suas pernas são fortes,
então seus chutes também são formidáveis.
It sends its feathers, which are as shar.it:
Manda le sue piume, che sono altrettanto affilate
come lame, volando in attacco. Le sue gambe sono forti,
quindi anche i suoi calci sono formidabili.
It sends its feathers, which are as shar.de:
Es schickt seine Federn, die ebenso scharf sind
als Klingen, die im Angriff fliegen. Seine Beine sind stark,
Daher sind auch seine Tritte beeindruckend.
It sends its feathers, which are as shar.zh-tw:
它發出它的羽毛，這些羽毛同樣鋒利
如同刀鋒，飛行攻擊。它的腿很強壯，
所以它的踢力也很強大。

It shoots cotton from its body to protec.en:
It shoots cotton from its body to protect itself.
If it gets caught up in hurricane-strength winds,
it can get sent to the other side of the Earth.
It shoots cotton from its body to protec.fr:
Il tire du coton de son corps pour se protéger.
S'il est emporté par des vents violents d'ouragan,
il peut être envoyé à l’autre bout de la Terre.
It shoots cotton from its body to protec.es:
Lanza algodón de su cuerpo para protegerse.
Si queda atrapado en vientos huracanados,
puede ser enviado al otro lado de la Tierra.
It shoots cotton from its body to protec.zh-tw:
它從體內射出棉花來保護自己。
如果遭遇颶風強度的大風，
它可以被發送到地球的另一邊。
It shoots cotton from its body to protec.it:
Spara cotone dal corpo per proteggersi.
Se viene travolto da venti forti come un uragano,
può essere inviato dall'altra parte della Terra.
It shoots cotton from its body to protec.de:
Um sich zu schützen, schießt es Baumwolle von seinem Körper.
Wenn es von orkanstarken Winden erfasst wird,
es kann auf die andere Seite der Erde geschickt werden.
It shoots cotton from its body to protec.pt-br:
Ele atira algodão de seu corpo para se proteger.
Se for apanhado por ventos com força de furacão,
ele pode ser enviado para o outro lado da Terra.

It shows its cute side by chasing its ow.en:
It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail
until it gets dizzy.
It shows its cute side by chasing its ow.es:
Muestra su lado lindo persiguiéndose su propia cola.
hasta marearse.
It shows its cute side by chasing its ow.de:
Es zeigt seine süße Seite, indem es seinem eigenen Schwanz nachjagt
bis es schwindelig wird.
It shows its cute side by chasing its ow.it:
Mostra il suo lato carino rincorrendosi la coda
fino ad avere le vertigini.
It shows its cute side by chasing its ow.fr:
Il montre son côté mignon en poursuivant sa propre queue
jusqu'à ce qu'il ait le vertige.
It shows its cute side by chasing its ow.zh-tw:
它追逐自己的尾巴，展現可愛的一面
直到頭暈。
It shows its cute side by chasing its ow.pt-br:
Ele mostra seu lado fofo perseguindo o próprio rabo
até ficar tonto.

It shrouds itself in sand to ward off ge.en:
It shrouds itself in sand to ward off germs.
It travels easily through the sands of the desert.
It shrouds itself in sand to ward off ge.fr:
Il s'enveloppe de sable pour éloigner les microbes.
Il se déplace facilement à travers les sables du désert.
It shrouds itself in sand to ward off ge.de:
Zur Abwehr von Keimen hüllt es sich in Sand.
Es bewegt sich problemlos durch den Sand der Wüste.
It shrouds itself in sand to ward off ge.pt-br:
Ele se envolve em areia para afastar os germes.
Ele viaja facilmente pelas areias do deserto.
It shrouds itself in sand to ward off ge.zh-tw:
它用沙子包裹自己以抵禦細菌。
它可以輕鬆地穿過沙漠的沙子。
It shrouds itself in sand to ward off ge.es:
Se envuelve en arena para protegerse de los gérmenes.
Viaja fácilmente por las arenas del desierto.
It shrouds itself in sand to ward off ge.it:
Si avvolge nella sabbia per allontanare i germi.
Viaggia facilmente attraverso le sabbie del deserto.

It spins its tail fins to propel itself,.en:
It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging
forward at speeds of over 100 knots before
ramming prey and spearing into them.
It spins its tail fins to propel itself,.fr:
Il fait tourner ses nageoires caudales pour se propulser, s'élevant
avancer à une vitesse supérieure à 100 nœuds avant
éperonner ses proies et les transpercer.
It spins its tail fins to propel itself,.es:
Gira sus aletas caudales para impulsarse, surgiendo
avance a velocidades de más de 100 nudos antes
embistiendo a sus presas y atravesándolas con lanzas.
It spins its tail fins to propel itself,.it:
Ruota le pinne caudali per spingersi, impennandosi
avanti a velocità superiori a 100 nodi prima
speronando la preda e trafiggendola.
It spins its tail fins to propel itself,.zh-tw:
它旋轉尾鰭來推動自己，洶湧澎湃
之前以超過100節的速度前進
撞擊獵物並用矛刺入其中。
It spins its tail fins to propel itself,.de:
Es dreht seine Schwanzflossen, um sich fortzubewegen
Vorwärts mit Geschwindigkeiten von über 100 Knoten
Beute rammen und in sie hineinspießen.
It spins its tail fins to propel itself,.pt-br:
Ele gira suas barbatanas caudais para se impulsionar, surgindo
avançar a velocidades superiores a 100 nós antes
atacando as presas e atacando-as.

It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to.en:
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate
enemies. It races through the skies at
Mach-2 speed.
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to.fr:
Il déploie largement ses magnifiques ailes pour intimider
ennemis. Il court dans les cieux à
Vitesse Mach-2.
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to.it:
Allarga ampiamente le sue splendide ali per intimidire
nemici. Corre attraverso i cieli a
Velocità Mach-2.
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to.zh-tw:
它張開華麗的翅膀來恐嚇
敵人。它在天空中奔跑
2 馬赫速度。
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to.es:
Extiende ampliamente sus hermosas alas para intimidar.
enemigos. Corre por los cielos en
Velocidad Mach-2.
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to.de:
Es breitet seine prächtigen Flügel weit aus, um einzuschüchtern
Feinde. Es rast durch die Lüfte
Mach-2-Geschwindigkeit.
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to.pt-br:
Ele abre amplamente suas lindas asas para intimidar
inimigos. Ele corre pelos céus em
Velocidade Mach-2.

It stomps on the ground to build power.\.en:
It stomps on the ground to build power.
It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a
straight-arm punch.
It stomps on the ground to build power.\.es:
Pisotea el suelo para generar poder.
Puede hacer volar un camión de 10 toneladas con un
golpe con el brazo recto.
It stomps on the ground to build power.\.fr:
Il piétine le sol pour construire son pouvoir.
Il peut envoyer voler un camion de 10 tonnes avec un
coup de poing à bras droit.
It stomps on the ground to build power.\.de:
Es stampft auf den Boden, um Kraft aufzubauen.
Es kann einen 10-Tonnen-Lkw mit einem fliegen lassen
Schlag mit geradem Arm.
It stomps on the ground to build power.\.it:
Calpesta il terreno per costruire potere.
Può far volare un camion da 10 tonnellate con a
pugno a braccio teso.
It stomps on the ground to build power.\.zh-tw:
它踩踏地面來產生能量。
它可以讓一輛10噸重的卡車帶著
直臂拳。
It stomps on the ground to build power.\.pt-br:
Ele pisa no chão para construir poder.
Ele pode enviar um caminhão de 10 toneladas voando com um
soco com o braço reto.

It swims gracefully along on the quiet,.en:
It swims gracefully along on the quiet, slow-
moving rivers and lakes of which it is so fond.
It swims gracefully along on the quiet,.fr:
Il nage gracieusement sur le courant calme et lent.
rivières et lacs mouvants dont il est si friand.
It swims gracefully along on the quiet,.es:
Nada con gracia en las tranquilas y lentas aguas.
ríos y lagos en movimiento que tanto le gustan.
It swims gracefully along on the quiet,.zh-tw:
它在安靜、緩慢的水面上優雅地游動——
它如此喜愛的流動的河流和湖泊。
It swims gracefully along on the quiet,.pt-br:
Ele nada graciosamente na calma e lenta
mover rios e lagos de que tanto gosta.
It swims gracefully along on the quiet,.it:
Nuota con grazia nella quiete, lentamente
commovente fiumi e laghi di cui è così affezionato.
It swims gracefully along on the quiet,.de:
Es schwimmt anmutig auf dem ruhigen, langsamen Weg dahin.
fließende Flüsse und Seen, die es so liebt.

It takes down prey by charging into them.en:
It takes down prey by charging into them with
its hard, pointed jaw. But Arrokuda's eyesight is
poor, so this tactic has a low success rate.
It takes down prey by charging into them.es:
Derriba a sus presas cargando contra ellas con
su mandíbula dura y puntiaguda. Pero la vista de Arrokuda es
pobre, por lo que esta táctica tiene una baja tasa de éxito.
It takes down prey by charging into them.pt-br:
Ele derruba as presas atacando-as com
sua mandíbula dura e pontiaguda. Mas a visão de Arrokuda é
pobre, então essa tática tem uma baixa taxa de sucesso.
It takes down prey by charging into them.fr:
Il abat ses proies en les chargeant avec
sa mâchoire dure et pointue. Mais la vue d'Arrokuda est
médiocre, cette tactique a donc un faible taux de réussite.
It takes down prey by charging into them.it:
Abbatte le prede caricandole con
la sua mascella dura e appuntita. Ma la vista di Arrokuda lo è
poveri, quindi questa tattica ha un basso tasso di successo.
It takes down prey by charging into them.zh-tw:
它通過沖向獵物來擊倒獵物
它的下巴堅硬而尖。但阿羅庫達的視力是
差，所以這個戰術成功率很低。
It takes down prey by charging into them.de:
Es erlegt seine Beute, indem es in sie hineinstürmt
sein harter, spitzer Kiefer. Aber Arrokudas Sehvermögen ist es
schlecht, daher hat diese Taktik eine geringe Erfolgsquote.

It toughens up by slamming into thick tr.en:
It toughens up by slamming into thick trees
over and over. It gains a sturdy body and
dauntless spirit.
It toughens up by slamming into thick tr.fr:
Il se durcit en s'écrasant contre des arbres épais
encore et encore. Il acquiert un corps robuste et
esprit intrépide.
It toughens up by slamming into thick tr.it:
Si irrigidisce sbattendo contro alberi spessi
ancora e ancora. Acquisisce un corpo robusto e
spirito intrepido.
It toughens up by slamming into thick tr.es:
Se endurece al chocar contra árboles gruesos.
una y otra vez. Gana un cuerpo robusto y
espíritu intrépido.
It toughens up by slamming into thick tr.zh-tw:
它通過撞擊茂密的樹木而變得堅強
一遍又一遍。它獲得了強健的身體和
大無畏的精神。
It toughens up by slamming into thick tr.de:
Es wird härter, wenn es gegen dicke Bäume prallt
immer und immer wieder. Es erhält einen robusten Körper und
unerschrockener Geist.
It toughens up by slamming into thick tr.pt-br:
Ele se fortalece ao bater em árvores grossas
repetidamente. Ganha um corpo robusto e
espírito destemido.

It uses its explosive speed and razor-sh.en:
It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws
to bring down prey. Running along winding
paths is not its strong suit.
It uses its explosive speed and razor-sh.fr:
Il utilise sa vitesse explosive et ses griffes acérées comme des rasoirs
pour abattre une proie. Courir le long de l'enroulement
les chemins ne sont pas son point fort.
It uses its explosive speed and razor-sh.es:
Utiliza su velocidad explosiva y sus garras afiladas.
para derribar presas. Corriendo sinuoso
caminos no es su fuerte.
It uses its explosive speed and razor-sh.zh-tw:
它利用爆炸性的速度和鋒利的爪子
打倒獵物。沿著蜿蜒的道路奔跑
路徑不是它的強項。
It uses its explosive speed and razor-sh.pt-br:
Ele usa sua velocidade explosiva e garras afiadas
para derrubar a presa. Correndo ao longo do sinuoso
paths não é seu forte.
It uses its explosive speed and razor-sh.de:
Es nutzt seine explosive Geschwindigkeit und seine messerscharfen Krallen
Beute erlegen. Kurvenreich entlanglaufen
Wege sind nicht seine Stärke.
It uses its explosive speed and razor-sh.it:
Usa la sua velocità esplosiva e gli artigli affilati come rasoi
per abbattere la preda. Correndo lungo un percorso tortuoso
i percorsi non sono il suo punto forte.

It uses its tails for everything. If it.en:
It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both
of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze,
that's proof it really likes you.
It uses its tails for everything. If it.fr:
Il utilise sa queue pour tout. Si ça enveloppe les deux
de ses queues autour de vous et vous serre,
c'est la preuve qu'il t'aime vraiment.
It uses its tails for everything. If it.es:
Utiliza sus colas para todo. Si envuelve a ambos
de sus colas te rodea y te da un apretón,
Esa es la prueba de que realmente le gustas.
It uses its tails for everything. If it.zh-tw:
它用尾巴做一切事情。如果它包住了兩個

Das ist der Beweis, dass es dich wirklich mag.

It uses sound waves to communicate with\.en:
It uses sound waves to communicate with
others of its kind. People and other Pokémon
species can't hear its cries of warning.
It uses sound waves to communicate with\.es:
Utiliza ondas sonoras para comunicarse con
otros de su tipo. Personas y otros Pokémon
las especies no pueden escuchar sus gritos de advertencia.
It uses sound waves to communicate with\.fr:
Il utilise des ondes sonores pour communiquer avec
d'autres du genre. Les gens et autres Pokémon
les espèces ne peuvent pas entendre ses cris d’avertissement.
It uses sound waves to communicate with\.it:
Utilizza le onde sonore per comunicare
altri del suo genere. Persone e altri Pokémon
la specie non può sentire le sue grida di avvertimento.
It uses sound waves to communicate with\.de:
Zur Kommunikation nutzt es Schallwellen
andere seiner Art. Menschen und andere Pokémon
Arten können ihre Warnrufe nicht hören.
It uses sound waves to communicate with\.pt-br:
Ele usa ondas sonoras para se comunicar com
outros de seu tipo. Pessoas e outros Pokémon

It uses sound waves to communicate with\.zh-tw:
它利用聲波與

It violently flutters its wings to scatt.en:
It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust
when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
It violently flutters its wings to scatt.fr:
Il bat violemment des ailes pour disperser la poussière toxique
lorsqu'il est attaqué. Il devient actif après le coucher du soleil.
It violently flutters its wings to scatt.es:
Agita violentamente sus alas para esparcir polvo tóxico.
cuando es atacado. Se vuelve activo después del atardecer.
It violently flutters its wings to scatt.de:
Es schlägt heftig mit den Flügeln, um giftigen Staub zu verstreuen
wenn angegriffen. Es wird nach Sonnenuntergang aktiv.
It violently flutters its wings to scatt.it:
Sbatte violentemente le ali per disperdere polvere tossica
quando attaccato. Diventa attivo dopo il tramonto.
It violently flutters its wings to scatt.zh-tw:
它猛烈地扇動翅膀，驅散有毒的粉塵
當受到攻擊時。日落後它變得活躍。
It violently flutters its wings to scatt.pt-br:
Ele bate as asas violentamente para espalhar poeira tóxica
quando atacado. Torna-se ativo após o pôr do sol.

It was originally a Pokémon from afar th.en:
It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped
to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
It was originally a Pokémon from afar th.es:
Originalmente era un Pokémon de lejos que escapó.
a lo salvaje. Puede adaptarse al río más sucio.
It was originally a Pokémon from afar th.fr:
C'était à l'origine un Pokémon venu de loin qui s'est échappé
à la nature. Il peut s'adapter à la rivière la plus sale.
It was originally a Pokémon from afar th.it:
In origine era un Pokémon venuto da lontano che fuggì
allo stato selvatico. Può adattarsi al fiume più sporco.
It was originally a Pokémon from afar th.de:
Ursprünglich war es ein Pokémon aus der Ferne, das entkam
in die Wildnis. Es kann sich an den schmutzigsten Fluss anpassen.
It was originally a Pokémon from afar th.pt-br:
Era originalmente um Pokémon de longe que escapou
para a natureza. Pode se adaptar ao rio mais sujo.
It was originally a Pokémon from afar th.zh-tw:
原本是一隻從遠處逃走的神奇寶貝

It will reveal itself before a pure-hear.en:
It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted Trainer by
shining its bright, rainbow-colored wings.
It will reveal itself before a pure-hear.fr:
Il se révélera devant un entraîneur au cœur pur en
brillant de ses ailes brillantes aux couleurs de l'arc-en-ciel.

It will reveal itself before a pure-hear.it:
Si rivelerà davanti ad un Allenatore dal cuore puro

It will reveal itself before a pure-hear.es:

It will reveal itself before a pure-hear.pt-br:
Ele se revelará diante de um Treinador de coração puro ao
brilhando suas asas brilhantes da cor do arco-íris.

It's gentle usually but fearsome when an.en:

With a body that burns at over 2,700 degrees
Fahrenheit, it crushes foes and turns them to ash.

Fahrenheit, ele esmaga os inimigos e os transforma em cinzas.

Mit einem Körper, der bei über 2.700 Grad brennt
Fahrenheit zermalmt Feinde und verwandelt sie in Asche.

Generalmente es gentil pero temible cuando se enoja.
Con un cuerpo que arde a más de 2.700 grados
Fahrenheit, aplasta a los enemigos y los convierte en cenizas.
It's gentle usually but fearsome when an.fr:

Fahrenheit, il écrase les ennemis et les réduit en cendres.

Di solito è gentile ma spaventoso quando è arrabbiato.
Con un corpo che brucia a oltre 2.700 gradi
Fahrenheit, schiaccia i nemici e li riduce in cenere.
It's gentle usually but fearsome when an.zh-tw:
平時很溫柔，但生氣時卻很可怕。
身體燃燒溫度超過 2,700 度
華氏度，它粉碎敵人並將他們化為灰燼。

It's good at finding berries and gathers.en:
It's good at finding berries and gathers them from
all over. It's kind enough to share them
with friends.
It's good at finding berries and gathers.es:
Es bueno para encontrar bayas y recogerlas de
por todas partes. Es tan amable de compartirlos.
con amigos.
It's good at finding berries and gathers.zh-tw:
它擅長尋找漿果並從中收集它們
一切都結束了。很高興分享它們

Il est doué pour trouver des baies et les récolter

It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon..en:
It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon. When
Moltres flaps its flaming wings, they glimmer with

It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon..es:
Es uno de los Pokémon pájaro legendarios. cuando
Moltres bate sus alas llameantes, brillan con

It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon..zh-tw:
是傳說中的鳥神奇寶貝之一。當

It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon..fr:

It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon..de:

Moltres schlägt mit seinen flammenden Flügeln, sie schimmern

It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon..pt-br:

Moltres bate suas asas flamejantes, elas brilham com

It's said that Hydreigon grew ferocious.en:
It's said that Hydreigon grew ferocious because

It's said that Hydreigon grew ferocious.es:
Se dice que Hydreigon se volvió feroz porque
la gente de tiempos pasados lo detestaba, considerando
es el mal encarnado y lo ataca implacablemente.
It's said that Hydreigon grew ferocious.fr:
On dit que Hydreigon est devenu féroce parce que
autrefois, les gens le détestaient, considérant

It's said that Hydreigon grew ferocious.it:
Si dice che Hydreigon sia diventato feroce perché

It's said that Hydreigon grew ferocious.zh-tw:

It's said that Hydreigon grew ferocious.de:
Man sagt, Hydreigon sei wild geworden, weil
Die Menschen in längst vergangenen Zeiten verabscheuten es, wenn man bedenkt

It's said that Hydreigon grew ferocious.pt-br:
Dizem que Hydreigon ficou feroz porque
as pessoas em tempos passados ​​odiavam isso, considerando
é o mal encarnado e ataca-o implacavelmente.

It's said that somewhere in the world, t.en:
It's said that somewhere in the world, there's
a mineral vein housing a large pack of slumbering

una veta mineral que alberga un gran paquete de durmientes

una vena minerale che ospita un grande branco di dormienti

une veine minérale abritant un gros paquet de

It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful.en:
It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful blue wings
are made of ice. Articuno flies over snowy
mountains, its long tail fluttering along behind it.
It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful.es:
Se dice que las hermosas alas azules de este Pokémon
están hechos de hielo. Articuno sobrevuela nevado
montañas, su larga cola revoloteando detrás de él.
It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful.fr:
On dit que les belles ailes bleues de ce Pokémon
sont faits de glace. Articuno survole la neige

It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful.it:
Si dice che le bellissime ali blu di questo Pokémon
sono fatti di ghiaccio. Articuno vola sopra la neve

It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful.de:

It's so vicious that it's called the San.en:
It's so vicious that it's called the Sand Demon.
Yet when confronted by Hippowdon, Drapion
keeps a low profile and will never pick a fight.
It's so vicious that it's called the San.fr:
C'est tellement vicieux qu'on l'appelle le Démon des Sables.
Pourtant, confronté à Hippodocus, Drapion
fait profil bas et ne se battra jamais.
It's so vicious that it's called the San.es:
Es tan cruel que se llama Sand Demon.
Sin embargo, cuando se enfrenta a Hippowdon, Drapion
mantiene un perfil bajo y nunca buscará pelea.
It's so vicious that it's called the San.zh-tw:
它的兇惡程度如此之高，以至於被稱為“沙魔”。
然而，當面對希波頓時，德拉皮恩

It's so vicious that it's called the San.de:

Doch als er mit Hippowdon konfrontiert wurde, Drapion

It's so vicious that it's called the San.pt-br:
É tão cruel que é chamado de Demônio da Areia.
No entanto, quando confrontado por Hippowdon, Drapion
mantém um perfil discreto e nunca vai brigar.
It's so vicious that it's called the San.it:
È così feroce che viene chiamato il Demone della Sabbia.
Tuttavia, quando viene affrontato da Hippowdon, Drapion
mantiene un profilo basso e non litigherà mai.

It's very friendly and faithful to peopl.en:

to repel enemies by barking and biting.

Es muy amigable y fiel con la gente. Lo intentará
para repeler a los enemigos ladrando y mordiendo.

It's very friendly and faithful to peopl.zh-tw:
它對人非常友好和忠誠。它會嘗試

It's very friendly and faithful to peopl.it:
È molto amichevole e fedele alle persone. Ci proverà
per respingere i nemici abbaiando e mordendo.
It's very friendly and faithful to peopl.pt-br:
É muito amigável e fiel às pessoas. Ele vai tentar
para repelir os inimigos latindo e mordendo.

Its body is solid muscle. When swimming.en:

Its body is solid muscle. When swimming.fr:
Son corps est solidement musclé. En nageant à travers
mers froides, Poliwrath utilise ses bras impressionnants pour

Its body is solid muscle. When swimming.es:
Su cuerpo es músculo sólido. Al nadar a través

Atraviesa el hielo a la deriva y avanza.

Its body is solid muscle. When swimming.de:
Sein Körper besteht aus soliden Muskeln. Beim Durchschwimmen

Schlagen Sie durch Treibeis und pflügen Sie vorwärts.

Its cries sound like incantations to tor.en:

Sus gritos suenan como encantamientos para atormentar al

inimigo. Aparece onde você menos espera.
Its cries sound like incantations to tor.it:
Le sue grida sembrano incantesimi per tormentare i
nemico. Appare dove meno te lo aspetti.
Its cries sound like incantations to tor.de:
Seine Schreie klingen wie Beschwörungsformeln zur Qual
Feind. Es erscheint dort, wo Sie es am wenigsten erwarten.
Its cries sound like incantations to tor.zh-tw:
它的叫聲聽起來就像是在折磨人的咒語

Its fleece grows continually. In the sum.en:

the fleece is fully shed, but it grows back in

una semana.
Its fleece grows continually. In the sum.pt-br:

Its fleece grows continually. In the sum.zh-tw:

Das Vlies ist vollständig abgeworfen, wächst aber wieder nach

Its leaf grew too large for it to live o.en:
Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land.
That is how it began to live floating in the water.
Its leaf grew too large for it to live o.fr:
Sa feuille est devenue trop grande pour qu'il puisse vivre sur terre.
C’est ainsi qu’il a commencé à vivre en flottant dans l’eau.
Its leaf grew too large for it to live o.es:
Su hoja creció demasiado para poder vivir en la tierra.
Así empezó a vivir flotando en el agua.
Its leaf grew too large for it to live o.pt-br:

Foi assim que começou a viver flutuando na água.
Its leaf grew too large for it to live o.it:

Its leaf grew too large for it to live o.de:

Its leaf grew too large for it to live o.zh-tw:

Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of.en:
Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of majesty.
Anyone hearing it can't help but grovel before it.
Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of.fr:
Sa magnifique écorce transmet un sentiment de majesté.
Quiconque l’entend ne peut s’empêcher de ramper devant lui.
Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of.pt-br:

Qualquer um que ouça isso não pode deixar de rastejar diante disso.
Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of.zh-tw:
其雄偉的樹皮給人一種威嚴的感覺。
任誰聽了都會忍不住跪拜。
Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of.de:
Seine prächtige Rinde vermittelt ein Gefühl von Majestät.
Wer es hört, kann nicht anders, als davor zu kriechen.
Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of.it:

Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of.es:

Its majestic horns are meant only to imp.en:
Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the
opposite gender. They never see use in battle.

Ses cornes majestueuses ne sont destinées qu'à impressionner le

Its majestic horns are meant only to imp.pt-br:

sexo oposto. Eles nunca veem uso em batalha.

Its mane shines when it discharges elect.en:

Its mane shines when it discharges elect.es:
Su melena brilla cuando descarga electricidad.
Usan la frecuencia y el ritmo de estos destellos.
para comunicarse.

Sa crinière brille lorsqu'elle décharge de l'électricité.
Ils utilisent la fréquence et le rythme de ces flashs

Its mane shines when it discharges elect.pt-br:
Sua juba brilha quando descarrega eletricidade.
Eles usam a frequência e o ritmo desses flashes

Its mane shines when it discharges elect.it:
La sua criniera brilla quando scarica elettricità.
Usano la frequenza e il ritmo di questi lampi

Seine Mähne glänzt, wenn er Elektrizität abgibt.
Sie nutzen die Frequenz und den Rhythmus dieser Blitze

Its spikes are harder than steel. This P.en:
Its spikes are harder than steel. This Pokémon
crawls across rock walls by stabbing the spikes

Its spikes are harder than steel. This P.es:
Sus púas son más duras que el acero. este pokemon
se arrastra a través de paredes de roca apuñalando las púas
con sus antenas en la piedra.

Seine Spitzen sind härter als Stahl. Dieses Pokémon

它可以攀爬更多的塔

Seine Schnelligkeit ist beispiellos.

La sua rapidità non ha eguali.
Può scalare una torre di più

Its unique faculty of sight can detect s.en:
Its unique faculty of sight can detect small prey
more than 30 miles away, even in the midst of
a sandstorm.
Its unique faculty of sight can detect s.es:
Su facultad de visión única puede detectar presas pequeñas.
a más de 30 millas de distancia, incluso en medio de
una tormenta de arena.
Its unique faculty of sight can detect s.fr:
Sa faculté de vue unique permet de détecter de petites proies
à plus de 30 milles, même en plein milieu de
une tempête de sable.
Its unique faculty of sight can detect s.pt-br:
Sua faculdade única de visão pode detectar pequenas presas

uma tempestade de areia.
Its unique faculty of sight can detect s.zh-tw:
它獨特的視覺能力可以發現小型獵物
即使在 30 多英里之外，
沙塵暴。

La sua capacità di vista unica può individuare piccole prede
