Wanting to make sure it's taken seriously,
Pancham's always giving others a glare.
But if it's not focusing, it ends up smiling.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.fr:
Voulant être sûr que cela soit pris au sérieux,
Pancham jette toujours un regard noir aux autres.
Mais s'il ne se concentre pas, il finit par sourire.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.pt-br:
Querendo ter certeza de que isso será levado a sério,
Pancham está sempre olhando para os outros.
Mas se não estiver focando, acaba sorrindo.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.es:
Queriendo asegurarse de que se tome en serio,
Pancham siempre mira fijamente a los demás.
Pero si no se concentra, acaba sonriendo.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.it:
Volendo assicurarmi che venga preso sul serio,
Pancham lancia sempre un'occhiataccia agli altri.
Ma se non mette a fuoco, finisce per sorridere.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.zh-tw:
想要確保它得到認真對待，
潘查姆總是瞪別人一眼。
但如果它不集中註意力，它就會微笑。
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.de:
Ich möchte sicherstellen, dass es ernst genommen wird,
Pancham wirft anderen immer einen bösen Blick zu.
Aber wenn es nicht fokussiert ist, lächelt es am Ende.

When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.en:
When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from
its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear
over buildings.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.fr:
Face à un ennemi coriace, il perd des flammes
ses poignets. Ses pattes puissantes lui permettent de sauter clairement
sur les bâtiments.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.it:
Quando affronta un nemico duro, sprigiona fiamme
i suoi polsi. Le sue zampe potenti gli permettono di saltare
sopra gli edifici.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.es:
Cuando se enfrenta a un enemigo duro, suelta llamas de
sus muñecas. Sus poderosas patas le permiten saltar con claridad.
sobre edificios.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.de:
Wenn es einem harten Gegner gegenübersteht, löst es Flammen aus
seine Handgelenke. Seine kräftigen Beine lassen ihn klar springen
über Gebäuden.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.pt-br:
Ao enfrentar um inimigo difícil, ele solta chamas
seus pulsos. Suas pernas poderosas permitem que ele salte
sobre edifícios.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.zh-tw:
當面對強敵時，它會釋放火焰
它的手腕。它有力的腿讓它跳躍得更清楚
建築物上方。

When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.en:
When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from
its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over
buildings.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.fr:
Face à un ennemi coriace, il perd des flammes
ses poignets. Ses pattes puissantes lui permettent de sauter au-dessus
bâtiments.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.es:
Cuando se enfrenta a un enemigo duro, suelta llamas de
sus muñecas. Sus poderosas patas le permiten saltar
edificios.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.pt-br:
Ao enfrentar um inimigo difícil, ele solta chamas
seus pulsos. Suas pernas poderosas permitem que ele salte
edifícios.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.de:
Wenn es einem harten Gegner gegenübersteht, löst es Flammen aus
seine Handgelenke. Mit seinen kräftigen Beinen kann er problemlos hinüberspringen
Gebäude.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.it:
Quando affronta un nemico duro, sprigiona fiamme
i suoi polsi. Le sue zampe potenti gli permettono di saltare oltre
edifici.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.zh-tw:
當面對強敵時，它會釋放火焰
它的手腕。它有力的腿使它能夠跳過
建築物。

When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.en:
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their
shells. Those that have lived a long, long time
have shells green with moss.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.fr:
Quand les Golem vieillissent, ils arrêtent de perdre leurs
coquilles. Ceux qui ont vécu très, très longtemps
ont des coquilles vertes avec de la mousse.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.es:
Cuando los Golem envejecen, dejan de perder su
conchas. Aquellos que han vivido mucho, mucho tiempo.
tienen conchas verdes con musgo.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.de:
Wenn Golems älter werden, hören sie auf, ihre Haare zu verlieren
Muscheln. Diejenigen, die schon sehr lange gelebt haben
haben Muscheln, die grün mit Moos sind.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.pt-br:
Quando o Golem envelhece, ele para de se livrar de seus
conchas. Aqueles que viveram muito, muito tempo
têm conchas verdes com musgo.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.it:
Quando i Golem invecchiano, smettono di perdere i loro
conchiglie. Quelli che hanno vissuto molto, molto tempo
hanno conchiglie verdi di muschio.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.zh-tw:
當傀儡變老時，他們會停止脫落
貝殼。那些活了很久很久的人
貝殼綠色，長滿青苔。

When it gets dark, the light from its br.en:
When it gets dark, the light from its bright,
shiny tail can be seen from far away on the
ocean's surface.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.fr:
Quand il fait sombre, la lumière de sa lumière,
la queue brillante est visible de loin sur le
la surface de l'océan.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.es:
Cuando oscurece, la luz de su brillante,
La cola brillante se puede ver desde lejos en el
la superficie del océano.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.it:
Quando fa buio, la luce è brillante,
la coda lucida può essere vista da lontano sul
superficie dell'oceano.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.de:
Wenn es dunkel wird, geht das Licht aus seinem hellen,
Der glänzende Schwanz ist schon von weitem zu sehen
Meeresoberfläche.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.zh-tw:
當天黑時，燈光從明亮處發出，
從遠處就可以看到閃亮的尾巴
海洋表面。
When it gets dark, the light from its br.pt-br:
Quando escurece, a luz brilha,
cauda brilhante pode ser vista de longe no
superfície do oceano.

When it gets excited, embers rise from i.en:
When it gets excited, embers rise from its head
and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it
loves sweets.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.es:
Cuando se excita, le salen brasas de la cabeza.
y cola y se calienta. Por alguna razón,
le encantan los dulces.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.fr:
Quand il s'excite, des braises sortent de sa tête
et la queue et il fait chaud. Pour une raison ou une autre,
aime les sucreries.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.it:
Quando si eccita, le braci si alzano dalla sua testa
e la coda e fa caldo. Per qualche ragione, esso
ama i dolci.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.zh-tw:
當它興奮時，餘燼會從頭頂升起
和尾巴，它會變熱。由於某種原因，它
喜歡甜食。
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.pt-br:
Quando fica excitado, brasas sobem de sua cabeça
e cauda e fica quente. Por alguma razão,
adora doces.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.de:
Wenn es aufgeregt ist, steigt Glut aus seinem Kopf
und Schwanz und es wird heiß. Aus irgendeinem Grund ist es
liebt Süßigkeiten.

When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.en:
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use
a mix of psi moves, such as Hypnosis and
Confusion.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.fr:
Lorsqu'il croise les yeux d'un ennemi, il utilisera
un mélange de mouvements psi, tels que l'hypnose et
Confusion.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.es:
Cuando mira a un enemigo a los ojos, usará
una mezcla de movimientos psi, como hipnosis y
Confusión.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.zh-tw:
當它鎖定敵人時，它會使用
混合了 psi 動作，例如催眠和
混亂。
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.de:
Wenn es einen Feind ansieht, wird es ihn benutzen
eine Mischung aus Psi-Bewegungen wie Hypnose und
Verwirrung.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.it:
Quando fissa gli occhi con un nemico, utilizzerà
un mix di mosse psichiche, come Ipnosi e
Confusione.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.pt-br:
Quando ele encarar um inimigo, ele usará
uma mistura de movimentos psi, como hipnose e
Confusão.

When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.en:
When it sucks in a large volume of seawater,
it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton
of food daily.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.fr:
Lorsqu'il aspire un grand volume d'eau de mer,
cela devient comme une grosse balle rebondissante. Ça mange une tonne
de nourriture quotidiennement.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.de:
Wenn es eine große Menge Meerwasser ansaugt,
es wird wie ein großer, hüpfender Ball. Es frisst eine Tonne
Essen täglich.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.es:
Cuando aspira un gran volumen de agua de mar,
se vuelve como una pelota grande que rebota. come una tonelada
de comida diariamente.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.it:
Quando aspira un grande volume di acqua di mare,
diventa come una grande palla rimbalzante. Ne mangia una tonnellata
di cibo ogni giorno.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.zh-tw:
當它吸入大量海水時，
它變得像一個大的有彈性的球。牠吃了一噸
每天的食物。
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.pt-br:
Quando suga um grande volume de água do mar,
torna-se como uma bola grande e saltitante. Come uma tonelada
de comida diariamente.

When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.en:
When it's drumming out rapid beats in battle, it
gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won't even
notice that it's already knocked out its opponent.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.fr:
Quand il bat des rythmes rapides au combat, il
est tellement pris par le rythme qu'il ne peut même pas
remarquez qu'il a déjà assommé son adversaire.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.es:
Cuando toca ritmos rápidos en la batalla,
queda tan atrapado en el ritmo que ni siquiera
Observa que ya ha noqueado a su oponente.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.zh-tw:
當它在戰鬥中敲出急促的節拍時，
完全陷入節奏以至於無法
請注意，它已經擊敗了對手。
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.pt-br:
Quando está tocando batidas rápidas na batalha,
fica tão preso no ritmo que nem consegue
observe que ele já nocauteou seu oponente.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.de:
Wenn es im Kampf schnelle Beats trommelt, ist es
verfängt sich so sehr im Rhythmus, dass es gar nicht mehr funktioniert
Beachten Sie, dass es seinen Gegner bereits KO geschlagen hat.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.it:
Quando suona ritmi rapidi in battaglia, esso
rimane così preso dal ritmo che non lo farà nemmeno
nota che ha già messo KO il suo avversario.

When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.en:
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus coating
its entire body becomes more concentrated—
it'll dissolve anything.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.fr:
Lorsque Sliggoo sent un danger, la couche de mucus
son corps tout entier devient plus concentré—
ça va dissoudre n'importe quoi.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.pt-br:
Quando Sliggoo sente o perigo, a camada de muco
todo o seu corpo fica mais concentrado -
isso dissolverá qualquer coisa.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.it:
Quando Sliggoo avverte il pericolo, si ricopre di muco
il suo intero corpo diventa più concentrato—
dissolverà qualsiasi cosa.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.zh-tw:
當 Sligoo 感覺到危險時，粘液塗層
整個身體變得更加集中——
它會溶解任何東西。
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.es:
Cuando Sliggoo siente peligro, la capa de moco
todo su cuerpo se vuelve más concentrado—
disolverá cualquier cosa.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.de:
Wenn Sliggoo eine Gefahr spürt, bildet sich eine Schleimschicht
sein ganzer Körper wird konzentrierter –
es wird alles auflösen.

When they see an enemy, their tails stan.en:
When they see an enemy, their tails stand high,
and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their
cheek pouches.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.es:
Cuando ven un enemigo, levantan la cola,
y escupen las semillas de las bayas almacenadas en sus
bolsas en las mejillas.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.fr:
Quand ils voient un ennemi, ils ont la queue haute,
et ils crachent les graines des baies stockées dans leur
poches pour les joues.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.it:
Quando vedono un nemico, tengono alta la coda,
e sputano i semi delle bacche conservate nelle loro
tasche per le guance.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.de:
Wenn sie einen Feind sehen, strecken sie ihren Schwanz hoch,
und sie spucken die Samen der in ihnen gelagerten Beeren aus
Backentaschen.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.zh-tw:
當它們看到敵人時，它們的尾巴會高高豎起，
他們吐出儲存在他們的漿果中的種子
頰袋。
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.pt-br:
Quando eles veem um inimigo, suas caudas ficam erguidas,
e cuspiram as sementes das frutas armazenadas em seus
bolsas nas bochechas.

When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.en: When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't get any points for it.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.fr: Lorsque ce Pokémon est mis KO, lancez une pièce. Si c'est face, votre adversaire ne peut obtenir aucun point.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.es: Cuando este Pokémon quede fuera de combate, lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, tu oponente no podrá obtener ningún punto por ello.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.it: Quando questo Pokémon viene messo KO, lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, il tuo avversario non potrà ottenere alcun punto.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.zh-tw: 當這只神奇寶貝被擊倒時，擲硬幣。如果出現正面，您的對手將無法獲得任何分數。
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.pt-br: Quando este Pokémon for nocauteado, jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, seu oponente não poderá ganhar nenhum ponto por isso.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.de: Wenn dieses Pokémon kampfunfähig ist, wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ kann Ihr Gegner dafür keine Punkte bekommen.

When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.en:
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own voice
startles it, making the Pokémon cry even louder.
It cries until it's exhausted, then it falls asleep.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.es:
Cuando Whismur llora, el sonido de su propia voz
lo sobresalta, haciendo que el Pokémon llore aún más fuerte.
Llora hasta agotarse y luego se queda dormido.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.fr:
Quand Whismur pleure, le son de sa propre voix
le fait sursauter, faisant pleurer le Pokémon encore plus fort.
Il pleure jusqu'à épuisement, puis il s'endort.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.pt-br:
Quando Whismur chora, o som de sua própria voz
assusta, fazendo o Pokémon chorar ainda mais alto.
Ele chora até ficar exausto e depois adormece.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.zh-tw:
當威斯莫哭泣時，是它自己的聲音
嚇到了它，讓神奇寶貝哭得更大聲。
它會哭到筋疲力盡，然後就睡著了。
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.it:
Quando Whismur piange, il suono della sua stessa voce
lo spaventa, facendo piangere il Pokémon ancora più forte.
Piange fino allo sfinimento, poi si addormenta.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.de:
Wenn Whismur weint, erklingt seine eigene Stimme
erschreckt es und lässt das Pokémon noch lauter weinen.
Es weint, bis es erschöpft ist, dann schläft es ein.

Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.en:
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night sky,
schools of Jellicent gather near the surface of
the sea, waiting for their prey to appear.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.fr:
Chaque fois qu'une pleine lune apparaît dans le ciel nocturne,
des bancs de Jellicent se rassemblent près de la surface de
la mer, attendant que leurs proies apparaissent.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.es:
Cada vez que hay luna llena en el cielo nocturno,
Las escuelas de Jellicent se reúnen cerca de la superficie de
el mar, esperando que aparezca su presa.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.pt-br:
Sempre que uma lua cheia paira no céu noturno,
cardumes de Jellicent se reúnem perto da superfície de
o mar, esperando que suas presas apareçam.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.zh-tw:
每當一輪滿月掛在夜空中時，
傑利森特學校聚集在地表附近
大海裡，等待著獵物的出現。
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.de:
Immer wenn ein Vollmond am Nachthimmel hängt,
Schulen von Jellicent versammeln sich nahe der Oberfläche von
das Meer und wartet auf das Erscheinen ihrer Beute.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.it:
Ogni volta che la luna piena è sospesa nel cielo notturno,
le scuole di Jellicent si riuniscono vicino alla superficie di
il mare, in attesa che appaia la loro preda.

Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.en: Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack used by the Pokémon this card is attached to, draw a card.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.fr: Chaque fois que le Pokémon de votre adversaire est mis KO par les dégâts d'une attaque utilisée par le Pokémon auquel cette carte est attachée, piochez une carte.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.es: Siempre que el Pokémon de tu rival quede Fuera de combate por el daño de un ataque utilizado por el Pokémon al que está unida esta carta, roba una carta.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.pt-br: Sempre que o Pokémon do seu oponente for Nocauteado pelo dano de um ataque usado pelo Pokémon ao qual esta carta está ligada, compre uma carta.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.zh-tw: 每當對手的寶可夢因這張卡所附著的寶可夢的攻擊而被擊倒時，抽一張卡。
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.it: Ogni volta che il Pokémon del tuo avversario viene messo KO dai danni di un attacco utilizzato dal Pokémon a cui è assegnata questa carta, pesca una carta.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.de: Immer wenn das Pokémon deines Gegners durch Schaden durch einen Angriff des Pokémon, an das diese Karte angelegt ist, kampfunfähig wird, ziehe eine Karte.

With a voice like a human child's, it cr.en:
With a voice like a human child's, it cries out to
lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost
among the trees.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.fr:
Avec une voix semblable à celle d'un enfant humain, il crie
attirer les adultes au plus profond de la forêt et les perdre
parmi les arbres.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.es:
Con una voz como la de un niño humano, clama a
atraer a los adultos hacia las profundidades del bosque, haciéndolos perderse
entre los árboles.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.it:
Con una voce simile a quella di un bambino umano, grida
attira gli adulti nel profondo della foresta, facendoli perdere
tra gli alberi.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.zh-tw:
它用像人類孩子一樣的聲音呼喊著
引誘成年人進入森林深處，讓他們迷路
樹木之間。
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.de:
Mit einer Stimme wie die eines Menschenkindes schreit es
locken Erwachsene tief in den Wald und verirren sie
zwischen den Bäumen.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.pt-br:
Com uma voz como a de uma criança humana, clama para
atrair adultos para as profundezas da floresta, fazendo com que eles se percam
entre as árvores.

With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.en:
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its
prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also
consumes berries, it's a carnivore at heart.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.fr:
Avec ses griffes acérées, ce Pokémon lui transperce
proie, puis il les picote. Même si c'est aussi
consomme des baies, c'est un carnivore dans l'âme.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.es:
Con sus afiladas garras, este Pokémon perfora su
presa, y luego los picotea. Aunque también
consume bayas, es un carnívoro de corazón.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.it:
Con i suoi artigli affilati, questo Pokémon lo trafigge
preda, e poi li becca. Anche se anche
consuma bacche, è un carnivoro in fondo.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.de:
Mit seinen scharfen Krallen durchbohrt dieses Pokémon seine
Beute, und dann pickt es nach ihnen. Obwohl es auch
isst Beeren, ist im Herzen ein Fleischfresser.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝用鋒利的爪子刺穿自己的身體
獵物，然後啄食它們。雖然這也
以漿果為食，本質上是肉食動物。
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.pt-br:
Com suas garras afiadas, este Pokémon perfura seus
presa, e então ele os bica. Embora também
consome frutas vermelhas, é um carnívoro de coração.

With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.en:
With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is
more agile and active than it appears.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.es:
Con nervios de acero, nada puede perturbarlo. es
más ágil y activo de lo que parece.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.fr:
Avec des nerfs d’acier, rien ne peut la perturber. C'est
plus agile et actif qu’il n’y paraît.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.zh-tw:
有著鋼鐵般的意志，沒有什麼可以擾亂它。它是
比看上去更加敏捷和活躍。
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.it:
Con nervi d’acciaio, nulla può turbarlo. Lo è
più agile e attivo di quanto sembri.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.pt-br:
Com nervos de aço, nada pode perturbá-lo. É
mais ágil e ativo do que parece.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.de:
Mit Nerven aus Stahl kann es nichts aus der Ruhe bringen. Es ist
agiler und aktiver als es scheint.

With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.en:
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir swallows its
target whole. The soul is the only thing eaten—
Dusknoir disgorges the body before departing.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.es:
Con la boca sobre su vientre, Dusknoir se traga su
objetivo completo. El alma es lo único que se come.
Dusknoir arroja el cuerpo antes de partir.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.fr:
La bouche sur le ventre, Dusknoir avale son
cibler l'ensemble. L'âme est la seule chose mangée—
Dusknoir dégorge le corps avant de partir.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.it:
Con la bocca sulla pancia, Dusknoir lo ingoia
obiettivo intero. L'anima è l'unica cosa che si mangia—
Dusknoir vomita il corpo prima di partire.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.zh-tw:
黑夜將嘴放在腹部，將其吞下
目標整體。靈魂是唯一被吃掉的東西——
暮色在離開前吐出了屍體。
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.pt-br:
Com a boca na barriga, Dusknoir engole
alvo inteiro. A alma é a única coisa comida -
Dusknoir despeja o corpo antes de partir.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.de:
Mit dem Mund auf dem Bauch schluckt Dusknoir es
Ziel ganz. Die Seele ist das Einzige, was gegessen wird –
Dusknoir spuckt den Körper aus, bevor er geht.

Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.en: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a Supporter card you find there and discard it.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.pt-br: Seu oponente revela sua mão. Escolha uma carta de Apoiador que encontrar lá e descarte-a.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.fr: Votre adversaire révèle sa main. Choisissez une carte Supporter que vous y trouvez et défaussez-la.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.es: Tu oponente revela su mano. Elige una carta de Partidario que encuentres allí y deséchala.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.it: Il tuo avversario rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta Aiuto che trovi lì e scartala.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.de: Ihr Gegner deckt seine Hand auf. Wähle eine Unterstützerkarte, die du dort findest, und wirf sie ab.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.zh-tw: 你的對手亮出了他們的牌。選擇您在那裡找到的一張支持者卡並將其丟棄。

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora está Dormido.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Endormi.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.pt-br: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente agora está Adormecido.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.zh-tw: 你對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在處於睡眠狀態。
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è addormentato.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.de: Das aktive Pokémon deines Gegners schläft jetzt.

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Brûlé.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora está Quemado.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.de: Das aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ist jetzt verbrannt.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.zh-tw: 你對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在被燒毀了。
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è ora bruciato.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.pt-br: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente agora está Queimado.

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora está Confundido.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.de: Das aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ist jetzt verwirrt.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è ora confuso.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.pt-br: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente agora está Confuso.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.zh-tw: 你對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在處於混亂狀態。
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Confus.

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora está Envenenado.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.pt-br: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente agora está Envenenado.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.zh-tw: 你對手的主動神奇寶貝現在中毒了。
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Empoisonné.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario ora è avvelenato.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.de: Das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ist jetzt vergiftet.

1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.en: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.zh-tw: 隨機選擇 1 只對手的神奇寶貝 4 次。每次選擇一隻神奇寶貝，對其造成 50 點傷害。

A body made up of nothing but muscle mak.en: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.
A body made up of nothing but muscle mak.zh-tw: 僅由肌肉組成的身體使得這只神奇寶貝用觸手進行的格鬥動作非常強大。

A common sight in forests and woods. It.en: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
A common sight in forests and woods. It.zh-tw: 森林和樹林中常見的景象。它在地面上拍打翅膀，揚起令人眼花繚亂的沙子。

A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glid.en: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.
A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glid.zh-tw: 聰明又善良的神奇寶貝，它在海面上滑行，周圍迴響著優美的歌聲。

A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely see.en: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely see.zh-tw: 罕見的膽怯的精靈寶可夢，一旦感覺到有人就會逃跑並躲起來。

A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered.en: A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.
A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered.zh-tw: 由於突變而被發現的雙頭寶可夢。它的運行速度超過每小時 60 英里。

All it does is sleep during the daytime..en: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.
All it does is sleep during the daytime..zh-tw: 它所做的就是在白天睡覺。晚上，它眼睛會發光，在自己的領地巡邏。

Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon.en: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon.zh-tw: 這種神奇寶貝幾乎無法移動，只有在遇到危險時才能硬化外殼來保護自己。

Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.en: Although it's carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.
Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.zh-tw: 儘管袋鼠肚子上懷著孩子，但袋鼠的腳步卻很快。它通過快速刺擊來恐嚇對手。

Although its fur has many admirers, it i.en: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
Although its fur has many admirers, it i.zh-tw: 雖然它的皮毛有很多崇拜者，但由於它反复無常的卑鄙行為，很難作為寵物飼養。

An ancient picture scroll shows that peo.en: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were captivated by its movement as it ran through prairies.
An ancient picture scroll shows that peo.zh-tw: 一幅古老的畫卷顯示，人們被它奔跑穿過草原的動作所吸引。

An enemy that takes its eyes off any of.en: An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads—even for a second—will get pecked severely.
An enemy that takes its eyes off any of.zh-tw: 敵人如果將目光從三個頭中的任何一個身上移開——哪怕只是一秒鐘——都會被狠狠地啄一下。

An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.en: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.zh-tw: 力量不足、可憐的神奇寶貝。在極少數情況下，它可能會跳得很高，但永遠不會超過七英尺。

Artillery platforms built into the walls.en: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.
Artillery platforms built into the walls.zh-tw: 建在古城堡城牆上的砲台是古魯克可以發射能量束的棲息地。

As it digs through the ground, it absorb.en: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
As it digs through the ground, it absorb.zh-tw: 當它挖掘地面時，它會吸收許多堅硬的物體。這就是它的身體如此堅固的原因。

As long as this Pokémon is in the Active.en: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand.
As long as this Pokémon is in the Active.zh-tw: 只要這只神奇寶貝在活動區域​​，對手就不能使用手牌中的任何支持者卡。

At the end of its life-span, Melmetal wi.en: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.
At the end of its life-span, Melmetal wi.zh-tw: 在其使用壽命結束時，美錄金屬會生鏽並分崩離析。留下的小碎片最終將重生為美錄坦。

Because it can use all kinds of moves, m.en: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.
Because it can use all kinds of moves, m.zh-tw: 因為它可以使用各種招式，許多科學家認為喵是神奇寶貝的祖先。

Because some Omanyte manage to escape af.en: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem.
Because some Omanyte manage to escape af.zh-tw: 由於一些阿曼人在被恢復後設法逃脫或被人類釋放到野外，這個物種正在成為一個問題。

Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gath.en: Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gather in polluted places and increase the bacteria in their bodies.
Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gath.zh-tw: 這些神奇寶貝從污泥中誕生，現在聚集在污染的地方並增加了體內的細菌。

By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow p.en: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.
By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow p.zh-tw: 通過使下巴脫臼，它可以吞下比自己大的獵物。吃完飯後，它會蜷縮起來休息。

Carrying food through Fearow's territory.en: Carrying food through Fearow's territory is dangerous. It will snatch the food away from you in a flash!
Carrying food through Fearow's territory.zh-tw: 通過費羅領地運送食物是很危險的。它會瞬間把你的食物搶走！

Choose 1 of your {W} Pokémon, and flip a.en: Choose 1 of your {W} Pokémon, and flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.
Choose 1 of your {W} Pokémon, and flip a.zh-tw: 選擇你的 1 個 {W} 神奇寶貝，然後擲硬幣，直到出現反面。對於每個頭，從你的能量區取出一個 {W} 能量並將其附加到該神奇寶貝上。

Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon’s at.en: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon’s attacks and use it as this attack. If this Pokémon doesn’t have the necessary Energy to use that attack, this attack does nothing.
Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon’s at.zh-tw: 選擇對手寶可夢的1只攻擊，作為這次攻擊。如果該神奇寶貝沒有使用該攻擊所需的能量，則該攻擊不會執行任何操作。

Cloyster that live in seas with harsh ti.en: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.
Cloyster that live in seas with harsh ti.zh-tw: 生活在潮汐洶湧的海洋中的蛤蚌，其貝殼上長有又大又尖的尖刺。

Despite their elegant appearance, they c.en: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
Despite their elegant appearance, they c.zh-tw: 儘管外表優雅，但它們卻能有力地扇動翅膀，飛翔千里。

Discard 1 {R} Energy from this Pokémon..zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的 1 個 {R} 能量。

Discard 2 {P} Energy from this Pokémon..zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的 2 個 {P} 能量。

Discard a random Energy from your oppone.en: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.zh-tw: 丟棄對手的活躍神奇寶貝中的隨機能量。
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.fr: Défaussez une Énergie aléatoire du Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.es: Descarta una Energía aleatoria del Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.pt-br: Descarte uma Energia aleatória do Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.de: Lege eine zufällige Energie vom Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners ab.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.it: Scarta un'Energia casuale dal Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.

During this turn, attacks used by your N.en: During this turn, attacks used by your Ninetales, Rapidash, or Magmar do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
During this turn, attacks used by your N.zh-tw: 這個回合中，你的九尾、急流或熔岩使用的攻擊對對手的活躍寶可夢造成 +30 點傷害。

During this turn, attacks used by your P.en: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.zh-tw: 這個回合中，自己的寶可夢的攻擊對對手的活躍寶可夢造成+10點傷害。

During your opponent’s next turn, attack.en: During your opponent’s next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage.
During your opponent’s next turn, attack.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，防御神奇寶貝使用的攻擊造成−20點傷害。

During your opponent's next turn, the De.en: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't attack.
During your opponent's next turn, the De.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，守方寶可夢不能攻擊。

During your opponent's next turn, this P.en: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.
During your opponent's next turn, this P.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，這只神奇寶貝受到的攻擊傷害為-20。

Each of Exeggutor's three heads is think.en: Each of Exeggutor's three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don't seem to be very interested in one another.
Each of Exeggutor's three heads is think.zh-tw: 椰蛋樹的三個腦袋分別在思考著不同的想法。三人似乎對彼此都不太感興趣。

Emitting powerful sound waves tires it o.en: Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out. Afterward, it won't be able to fly for a little while.
Emitting powerful sound waves tires it o.zh-tw: 發出強大的聲波使其疲憊不堪。之後，它將會有一段時間無法飛翔。

Even though its body is extremely skinny.en: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.
Even though its body is extremely skinny.zh-tw: 儘管它的身體極其瘦弱，但捕捉獵物的速度卻快得驚人。

Females are more sensitive to smells tha.en: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they'll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.
Females are more sensitive to smells tha.zh-tw: 女性比男性對氣味更敏感。覓食時，它們會用鬍鬚檢查風向並保持在捕食者的下風處。

Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads,.en: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 80 more damage.
Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads,.zh-tw: 翻轉 2 個硬幣。如果兩人都是正面，則這次攻擊會造成 80 點額外傷害。

Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damag.en: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damag.zh-tw: 翻轉 2 個硬幣。此攻擊對每個頭造成 100 點傷害。

Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage.en: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 2 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 30 點傷害。
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage.es: Lanza 2 monedas. Este ataque hace 30 daños por cada cabeza.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage.fr: Lancez 2 pièces. Cette attaque inflige 30 dégâts pour chaque tête.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage.pt-br: Jogue 2 moedas. Este ataque causa 30 de dano para cada cabeça.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage.de: Wirf 2 Münzen. Dieser Angriff verursacht 30 Schaden pro Kopf.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage.it: Lancia 2 monete. Questo attacco infligge 30 danni per ogni testa.

Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage.en: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 2 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 50 點傷害。

Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage.en: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 2 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 80 點傷害。

Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Ener.en: Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Energy from your Energy Zone equal to the number of heads and attach it to your Benched {R} Pokémon in any way you like.
Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Ener.zh-tw: 翻轉 3 個硬幣。從你的能量區取出相當於頭部數量的 {R} 能量，並以你喜歡的任何方式將其附加到你的後備 {R} 神奇寶貝上。

Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage.en: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 4 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 40 點傷害。

Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage.en: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 4 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 50 點傷害。

Flip a coin until you get tails. This at.en: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.
Flip a coin until you get tails. This at.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣，直到出現反面。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 60 點傷害。

Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random.en: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果出現正面，則丟棄對手的活躍神奇寶貝中的隨機能量。

Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.en: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面朝上，則在對手的下一個回合中，阻止對該神奇寶貝造成的所有攻擊造成的傷害和效果。

Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok.en: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面朝上，則防守寶可夢在對手的下一個回合中不能攻擊。

Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.en: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面，此攻擊會造成 40 點額外傷害。如果是反面，這只神奇寶貝也會對自己造成 20 點傷害。
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, este ataque hace 40 puntos de daño más. Si sale cruz, este Pokémon también se hace 20 puntos de daño a sí mismo.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c’est face, cette attaque inflige 40 dégâts supplémentaires. Si c'est pile, ce Pokémon s'inflige également 20 dégâts.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, questo attacco infligge 40 danni in più. Se esce croce, questo Pokémon infligge anche 20 danni a se stesso.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, este ataque causa 40 de dano a mais. Se sair coroa, este Pokémon também causa 20 de dano a si mesmo.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ fügt dieser Angriff 40 Schadenspunkte mehr zu. Bei „Zahl“ fügt sich dieses Pokémon außerdem selbst 20 Schadenspunkte zu.

Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent shu.en: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent shuffles their Active Pokémon into their deck.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent shu.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果出現正面，對手將其活躍神奇寶貝洗入牌組。

For Poliwag, swimming is easier than wal.en: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokémon's innards showing through the skin.
For Poliwag, swimming is easier than wal.zh-tw: 對於 Poliwag 來說，游泳比走路更容易。它腹部的漩渦圖案實際上是神奇寶貝通過皮膚顯現出來的內臟的一部分。

For protection, it releases a horrible s.en: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
For protection, it releases a horrible s.zh-tw: 為了保護自己，它會從頭上的天線釋放出可怕的惡臭來驅趕敵人。

Frosmoth senses air currents with its an.en: Frosmoth senses air currents with its antennae. It sends its scales drifting on frigid air, making them fall like snow.
Frosmoth senses air currents with its an.zh-tw: 霜蛾用觸角感知氣流。它的鱗片在寒冷的空氣中飄浮，使它們像雪一樣落下。

Geodude that have lived a long life have.en: Geodude that have lived a long life have had all their edges smoothed out until they're totally round. They also have a calm, quiet disposition.
Geodude that have lived a long life have.zh-tw: 壽命很長的晶石的所有邊緣都被磨平，直到完全變圓。他們的性格也很沉穩、安靜。

Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon..zh-tw: 治療該神奇寶貝造成的 10 點傷害。
Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon..es: Cura 10 puntos de daño de este Pokémon.
Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon..pt-br: Cure 10 pontos de dano deste Pokémon.

Heal 50 damage from 1 of your {G} Pokémo.en: Heal 50 damage from 1 of your {G} Pokémon.
Heal 50 damage from 1 of your {G} Pokémo.zh-tw: 治療你的 1 只 {G} 神奇寶貝造成的 50 點傷害。

Heal from this Pokémon the same amount o.en: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Heal from this Pokémon the same amount o.zh-tw: 該神奇寶貝所造成的傷害與你對對手的活躍神奇寶貝造成的傷害相同。

Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that gr.en: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon's true appearance remains a mystery.
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that gr.zh-tw: 隱藏在纏結的藤蔓之下，即使藤蔓被扯斷，藤蔓也會不停地生長，這只神奇寶貝的真實面貌仍然是個謎。

Horsea makes its home in oceans with gen.en: Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits out pitch-black ink and escapes.
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gen.zh-tw: 馬鞭草棲息在水流平緩的海洋中。如果這只神奇寶貝受到攻擊，它會吐出漆黑的墨水並逃跑。

If exposed to moonlight, it starts to mo.en: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to mo.zh-tw: 如果暴露在月光下，它就會開始移動。它在夜間四處遊蕩以傳播種子。

If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the.en: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the.zh-tw: 如果雙胞胎 Koffing 中的一個膨脹，另一個就會收縮。它不斷地混合有毒氣體。

If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {W}.en: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {W} Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {W}.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝附加了至少 2 個額外的 {W} 能量，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。

If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {W}.en: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {W} Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.
If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {W}.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝附加了至少 3 個額外的 {W} 能量，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 70 點。

If this Pokémon's sticky saliva gets on.en: If this Pokémon's sticky saliva gets on you and you don't clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won't go away, either.
If this Pokémon's sticky saliva gets on.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝粘稠的唾液沾到你身上而你又不把它清理掉，就會出現強烈的瘙癢感。而且瘙癢感也不會消失。

If you visit a beach at the end of summe.en: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you'll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.
If you visit a beach at the end of summe.zh-tw: 如果您在夏末訪問海灘，您將能夠看到成群的 Staryu 以穩定的節奏發光。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon has da.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon has da.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍寶可夢受到傷害，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 50 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍寶可夢中毒，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 50 點。

In autumn, its body becomes more fatty i.en: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.
In autumn, its body becomes more fatty i.zh-tw: 到了秋天，它的身體會變得更加肥胖，準備向伴侶求婚。它呈現出美麗的色彩。

In battle, it flaps its wings at great s.en: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
In battle, it flaps its wings at great s.zh-tw: 在戰鬥中，它會以極快的速度拍打翅膀，將劇毒粉塵釋放到空氣中。

In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo ca.en: In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop with its arms more than 100 times.
In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo ca.zh-tw: 一分鐘內，訓練有素的Mienfoo可以用手臂砍100多次。

Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,.en: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,.zh-tw: 吸入的空氣被帶到其火囊中，被加熱，並以高達 3,000 華氏度以上的火焰的形式呼出。

It becomes wildly furious if it even sen.en: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.
It becomes wildly furious if it even sen.zh-tw: 如果它感覺到有人在看它，它就會變得非常憤怒。它會追逐任何遇到它目光的人。

It begins walking on its hind legs after.en: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
It begins walking on its hind legs after.zh-tw: 進化後，它開始用後腿行走。它可以用角在巨石上打孔。

It can be found near the sea. The large.en: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
It can be found near the sea. The large.zh-tw: 它可以在海邊附近找到。如果將大鉗子從插座中拔出，它們就會重新長出來。

It can sense the feelings of others by t.en: It can sense the feelings of others by touching them with its horns. This species has assisted people with their work since 5,000 years ago.
It can sense the feelings of others by t.zh-tw: 它可以通過用角觸碰他人來感知他人的感受。自 5000 年前以來，這個物種就一直在幫助人們工作。

It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with.en: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with.zh-tw: 它可以通過精確控制投擲覆蓋著氣泡的鵝卵石，將空罐子擊中最遠一百英尺。

It can't run properly when it's newly bo.en: It can't run properly when it's newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.
It can't run properly when it's newly bo.zh-tw: 剛出生的時候是不能正常運行的。當它與其他同類賽跑時，它的腿會變得更加強壯。

It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward t.en: It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward the peak of a mountain. As soon as it reaches the summit, it rolls back down the way it came.
It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward t.zh-tw: 它爬上懸崖，朝山頂走去。一旦到達山頂，它就會按原路滾落。

It concentrates the weak electric charge.en: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.
It concentrates the weak electric charge.zh-tw: 它集中細胞發出的微弱電荷並發射邪惡的閃電。

It creates throwing stars out of compres.en: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
It creates throwing stars out of compres.zh-tw: 它用壓縮水製造出飛濺的星星。當它旋轉並高速拋出它們時，這些恆星可以將金屬分成兩半。

It crushes its foe under its heavy body.en: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
It crushes its foe under its heavy body.zh-tw: 它用沉重的身體壓碎敵人，使其昏厥。在緊要關頭，它會縮回殼內。

It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating.en: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating.zh-tw: 它會溶解併吞噬金屬。它通過在體內循環液態金屬來產生能量。

It eats snow that has accumulated on the.en: It eats snow that has accumulated on the ground. It prefers soft, freshly fallen snow, so it will eat its way up a mountain, aiming for the peak.
It eats snow that has accumulated on the.zh-tw: 牠吃地上積雪。牠喜歡柔軟的、剛落下的雪，所以它會吃著爬上山的路，瞄準山頂。

It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth.en: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth.zh-tw: 它從嘴裡發射超聲波來檢查周圍的情況。即使在狹窄的洞穴中，祖巴特也能熟練地飛行。

It grinds its teeth with great force to.en: It grinds its teeth with great force to stimulate its brain. It fires the psychic energy created by this process from the protuberance on its head.
It grinds its teeth with great force to.zh-tw: 它用很大的力氣磨牙，刺激大腦。它從頭上的突起發射出這一過程中產生的精神能量。

It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it.en: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it.zh-tw: 它具有野蠻的本質。在戰鬥中，它會揮舞著火焰般的尾巴，並用鋒利的爪子進行砍殺。

It has a brave and trustworthy nature. I.en: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
It has a brave and trustworthy nature. I.zh-tw: 它具有勇敢和值得信賴的本性。它無所畏懼地對抗更大更強的敵人。

It has a preference for hot things. When.en: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
It has a preference for hot things. When.zh-tw: 它對熱的東西有偏愛。據說下雨時，蒸汽會從它的尾尖噴出。

It has a psychic power that enables it t.en: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
It has a psychic power that enables it t.zh-tw: 它擁有一種精神力量，能夠扭曲周圍的空間並預見未來。

It has a very fine fur. Take care not to.en: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.
It has a very fine fur. Take care not to.zh-tw: 它有非常細膩的皮毛。注意不要讓它生氣，否則它可能會不斷膨脹並用身體猛烈撞擊。

It has an incredibly high level of intel.en: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.
It has an incredibly high level of intel.zh-tw: 它具有令人難以置信的高水平智力。有人說阿拉卡扎姆記得發生在它身上的一切，從出生到死亡。

It has the world's largest petals. With.en: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
It has the world's largest petals. With.zh-tw: 它擁有世界上最大的花瓣。每走一步，花瓣就會抖落出大量有毒花粉。

It has three poisonous stingers on its f.en: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
It has three poisonous stingers on its f.zh-tw: 它的前腿和尾巴上有三根毒刺。它們被用來反复刺傷敵人。

It is constantly wracked by a headache..en: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
It is constantly wracked by a headache..zh-tw: 它經常被頭痛所折磨。當頭痛變得劇烈時，它就會開始使用神秘的力量。

It is encased in a shell that is harder.en: It is encased in a shell that is harder than diamond. Inside, however, it is surprisingly tender.
It is encased in a shell that is harder.zh-tw: 它被包裹在比鑽石還硬的殼裡。然而，它的內部卻出奇的柔軟。

It is incredibly slow and dopey. It take.en: It is incredibly slow and dopey. It takes five seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It take.zh-tw: 它非常緩慢且愚蠢。當受到攻擊時，它需要五秒鐘的時間才會感到疼痛。

It is not satisfied unless it eats over.en: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
It is not satisfied unless it eats over.zh-tw: 它每天不吃超過880磅的食物就不會滿足。當牠吃完飯後，它會立即睡覺。

It is recognized as a symbol of longevit.en: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.
It is recognized as a symbol of longevit.zh-tw: 它被認為是長壽的象徵。如果它的殼上有藻類，那麼疣龜就很老了。

It is said that happiness will come to t.en: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
It is said that happiness will come to t.zh-tw: 據說，看到Clefairy在滿月下跳舞的人會得到幸福。

It is said that somewhere in the ocean l.en: It is said that somewhere in the ocean lies an island where these gather. Only they live there.
It is said that somewhere in the ocean l.zh-tw: 據說在海洋的某個地方有一座島嶼，這些島嶼就聚集在那裡。只有他們住在那裡。

It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.en: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.zh-tw: 據說它的壽命有1000歲，每條尾巴都充滿了超自然的力量。

It is waiting for the moment to evolve..en: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
It is waiting for the moment to evolve..zh-tw: 它正在等待進化的時刻。在這個階段，它只能變硬，所以它保持不動以避免攻擊。

It likes to lurk in the dark and tap sho.en: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.
It likes to lurk in the dark and tap sho.zh-tw: 牠喜歡潛伏在黑暗中，用氣態的手輕拍肩膀。它的觸碰引起無盡的顫抖。

It lives about one yard underground, whe.en: It lives about one yard underground, where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.
It lives about one yard underground, whe.zh-tw: 它生活在地下約一碼處，以植物根部為食。它有時出現在地面上。

It lives close to water. Its long tail i.en: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.zh-tw: 它生活在靠近水的地方。它的長尾巴上有脊狀鰭，經常被誤認為是美人魚的尾巴。

It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.en: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.zh-tw: 它成群生活在樹頂。如果它看不到自己的群體，它就會因為孤獨而被激怒。

It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it.en: It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means to punch them.
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it.zh-tw: 它生活在溫暖的淺水中。如果遇到敵人，它會吐出內臟來攻擊敵人。

It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sa.en: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.
It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sa.zh-tw: 牠喜歡在乾燥的沙地的沙礫中沐浴。通過沙浴，神奇寶貝可以去除附著在身體上的污垢和水分。

It loves to drink other creatures' blood.en: It loves to drink other creatures' blood. It's said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it's gathered.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.zh-tw: 牠喜歡喝其他生物的血。據說，如果它發現其他同類挨餓，有時它會分享它收集的血液。

It quickly swings its four arms to rock.en: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
It quickly swings its four arms to rock.zh-tw: 它迅速揮動四隻手臂，從各個角度不斷地出拳和砍擊，震撼對手。

It remembers every dream it eats. It rar.en: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children's are much tastier.
It remembers every dream it eats. It rar.zh-tw: 它記得牠吃下的每一個夢。它很少吃掉成年人的夢想，因為孩子們的夢想更美味。

It rolls to move. If the ground is uneve.en: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.
It rolls to move. If the ground is uneve.zh-tw: 它滾動移動。如果地面不平坦，撞擊到凸塊時突然的震動可能會導致爆炸。

It scatters cotton all over the place as.en: It scatters cotton all over the place as a prank. If it gets wet, it'll become too heavy to move and have no choice but to answer for its mischief.
It scatters cotton all over the place as.zh-tw: 它像惡作劇一樣把棉花撒得到處都是。如果它被弄濕了，它就會變得太重而無法移動，並且別無選擇，只能為它的惡作劇負責。

It secretes flexible bubbles from its ch.en: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
It secretes flexible bubbles from its ch.zh-tw: 它從胸部和背部分泌出靈活的氣泡。氣泡可以減少受到攻擊時受到的傷害。

It sheds many layers of skin as it grows.en: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.
It sheds many layers of skin as it grows.zh-tw: 隨著它變大，它會脫落多層皮膚。在此過程中，它受到急流瀑布的保護。

It shoots cotton from its body to protec.en: It shoots cotton from its body to protect itself. If it gets caught up in hurricane-strength winds, it can get sent to the other side of the Earth.
It shoots cotton from its body to protec.zh-tw: 它從體內射出棉花來保護自己。如果它遇到颶風強度的風，它可能會被送到地球的另一邊。

It slashes through grass with its sharp.en: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.
It slashes through grass with its sharp.zh-tw: 它用鋒利的鐮刀砍伐草地，移動速度太快，人眼無法追踪。

It spits fire that is hot enough to melt.en: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.
It spits fire that is hot enough to melt.zh-tw: 它噴出的火熱得足以融化巨石。它可能會因噴出火焰而引起森林火災。

It stores flammable gas in its body and.en: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.
It stores flammable gas in its body and.zh-tw: 它在體內儲存可燃氣體並用它來產生熱量。它腹部的黃色部分變得特別熱。

It sunbathes on the beach after meals. T.en: It sunbathes on the beach after meals. The rise in its body temperature helps its digestion.
It sunbathes on the beach after meals. T.zh-tw: 飯後在海灘上曬日光浴。體溫升高有助於消化。

It taunts its prey and lures them into n.en: It taunts its prey and lures them into narrow, rocky areas where it then sprays them with toxic gas to make them dizzy and take them down.
It taunts its prey and lures them into n.zh-tw: 它會嘲弄獵物，將它們引誘到狹窄的岩石區域，然後向它們噴灑有毒氣體，使它們頭暈並把它們打倒。

It uses its docile-looking face to lull.en: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
It uses its docile-looking face to lull.zh-tw: 它用它看起來溫順的臉來讓敵人陷入自滿，然後用它巨大的、無情的下巴撕咬。

It was created by a scientist after year.en: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.
It was created by a scientist after year.zh-tw: 它是由一位科學家經過多年可怕的基因剪接和 DNA 工程實驗而創造出來的。

It wraps its opponent in its gas-like bo.en: It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.
It wraps its opponent in its gas-like bo.zh-tw: 它將對手包裹在氣體般的身體中，通過皮膚毒害獵物，慢慢削弱獵物的力量。

It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon..en: It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon. When Moltres flaps its flaming wings, they glimmer with a dazzling red glow.
It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon..zh-tw: 是傳說中的鳥神奇寶貝之一。當莫爾特雷斯拍動它的火焰翅膀時，它們會閃爍出耀眼的紅光。

It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful.en: It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful blue wings are made of ice. Articuno flies over snowy mountains, its long tail fluttering along behind it.
It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful.zh-tw: 據說這只神奇寶貝美麗的藍色翅膀是由冰製成的。急蟲飛過雪山，長長的尾巴在身後飄揚。

It's the males that raise the offspring..en: It's the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.
It's the males that raise the offspring..zh-tw: 養育後代的是雄性。當海德拉撫養幼崽時，它們背上的刺會分泌出更濃烈的毒液。

It's thickly covered with a filthy, vile.en: It's thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
It's thickly covered with a filthy, vile.zh-tw: 它厚厚地覆蓋著骯髒、邪惡的污泥。它的毒性如此之大，連它的腳印都含有毒。

It's very curious, but its means of inve.en: It's very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.
It's very curious, but its means of inve.zh-tw: 它很好奇，但它調查事物的手段是嘗試用觸手猛擊它們。對食物的尋找是將其帶到陸地上的原因。

Its ability to evolve into many forms al.en: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.
Its ability to evolve into many forms al.zh-tw: 它進化成多種形態的能力使其能夠順利、完美地適應任何環境。

Its body is full of poisonous gas. It fl.en: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.
Its body is full of poisonous gas. It fl.zh-tw: 它的身體裡充滿了毒氣。它漂浮在垃圾堆中，尋找未加工的腐爛垃圾的煙霧。

Its body is solid muscle. When swimming.en: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.
Its body is solid muscle. When swimming.zh-tw: 它的身體是堅實的肌肉。當在寒冷的海洋中游泳時，波利瓦斯會用其令人印象深刻的手臂擊碎流冰並向前推進。

Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon.en: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.
Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon.zh-tw: 它的身體會分泌油脂，這種神奇寶貝會將油脂塗在巢穴上作為塗層，以保護巢穴免受灰塵侵害。辛奇諾連一丁點都不能容忍。

Its curly fleece is such an effective cu.en: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.
Its curly fleece is such an effective cu.zh-tw: 它的捲曲羊毛是一種非常有效的緩衝墊，即使這只神奇寶貝從懸崖上掉下來，也能毫髮無傷地重新站到底部。

Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave.en: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.
Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave.zh-tw: 它的背鰭、胸鰭和尾鰭在水中優雅地波動。這就是為什麼它被稱為水舞者。

Its incisors grow continuously throughou.en: Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life. If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.
Its incisors grow continuously throughou.zh-tw: 它的門牙在其一生中不斷生長。如果門牙太長，這只神奇寶貝就會無法進食，最終會餓死。

Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-hor.en: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-hor.zh-tw: 其大而堅硬的鉗子具有萬馬力的力量。但由於體型太大，移動起來很不便。

Its muscular body is so powerful, it mus.en: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
Its muscular body is so powerful, it mus.zh-tw: 它肌肉發達的身體如此強大，必須佩戴節能帶才能調節其動作。

Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odo.en: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.
Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odo.zh-tw: 它的雌蕊散發著令人難以置信的惡臭。可怕的惡臭可導致 1.25 英里外的人暈厥。

Its plant blooms when it is absorbing so.en: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
Its plant blooms when it is absorbing so.zh-tw: 它的植物在吸收太陽能時就會開花。它不斷移動以尋找陽光。

Its punches slice the air. They are laun.en: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.
Its punches slice the air. They are laun.zh-tw: 它的拳頭劃破空氣。它們以如此高的速度發射，即使是輕微的擦傷也可能導致燒傷。

Its reckless nature leads it to stand up.en: Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect its territory.
Its reckless nature leads it to stand up.zh-tw: 它魯莽的本性導致它在必須保護自己的領地時敢於對抗其他神奇寶貝，甚至是大型神奇寶貝。

Its strange cries sound like human langu.en: Its strange cries sound like human language. There are some musicians who compose songs for Jynx to sing.
Its strange cries sound like human langu.zh-tw: 它奇怪的叫聲聽起來像人類的語言。有一些音樂家為 Jynx 創作歌曲供其演唱。

Its tail discharges electricity into the.en: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
Its tail discharges electricity into the.zh-tw: 它的尾巴會向地面釋放電流，以保護它免受電擊。

Its three heads bob separately up and do.en: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.
Its three heads bob separately up and do.zh-tw: 它的三個頭分別上下擺動，以鬆動附近的土壤，使其更容易挖洞。

Its transformation ability is perfect. H.en: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if made to laugh, it can't maintain its disguise.
Its transformation ability is perfect. H.zh-tw: 其變形能力堪稱完美。然而，如果讓它笑，它就無法保持其偽裝。

Its whole body is composed of muscles. E.en: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it's the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
Its whole body is composed of muscles. E.zh-tw: 它的整個身體都是由肌肉組成的。儘管它只有人類兒童那麼大，但它可以將 100 個成年人拋擲出去。

Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks.en: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokémon.
Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks.zh-tw: Kabutops 將獵物切成薄片並吸出液體。丟棄的身體部位成為其他神奇寶貝的食物。

Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. Bu.en: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.
Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. Bu.zh-tw: 瑪格瑪用火消滅獵物。但一旦它意識到自己已經把它想要的獵物燒成了焦脆的東西，它就會後悔這個習慣。

Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokém.en: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.
Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokém.zh-tw: 許多發電廠都飼養著地面型神奇寶貝，以防御前來尋求電力的電擊獸。

Move all {L} Energy from your Benched Po.en: Move all {L} Energy from your Benched Pokémon to your Raichu, Electrode, or Electabuzz in the Active Spot.
Move all {L} Energy from your Benched Po.zh-tw: 將所有 {L} 能量從你的後備神奇寶貝轉移到活動地點的雷丘、電極或電擊獸上。

Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.en: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.zh-tw: 尼多女王更擅長防守而不是進攻。這款神奇寶貝擁有像盔甲一樣的鱗片，可以保護它的孩子免受任何類型的攻擊。

Often found in forests and grasslands. I.en: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.
Often found in forests and grasslands. I.zh-tw: 常見於森林和草原。它的頭頂上有一個約兩英寸長的鋒利有毒倒刺。

Once during your turn, if this Pokémon i.en: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Poisoned.
Once during your turn, if this Pokémon i.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，如果這只神奇寶貝位於活躍位置，你可以使對手的活躍神奇寶貝中毒。

Once during your turn, you may do 20 dam.en: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may do 20 dam.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以對對手的 1 只神奇寶貝造成 20 點傷害。

Once during your turn, you may heal 20 d.en: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may heal 20 d.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以治療每隻神奇寶貝造成的 20 點傷害。

Once during your turn, you may look at t.en: Once during your turn, you may look at the top card of your deck.
Once during your turn, you may look at t.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以查看你牌組頂牌的一次。

Once during your turn, you may switch ou.en: Once during your turn, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)
Once during your turn, you may switch ou.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以將對手的活躍神奇寶貝切換到替補席上。 （你的對手選擇新的活躍神奇寶貝。）

Once during your turn, you may take 1 {P.en: Once during your turn, you may take 1 {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to the {P} Pokémon in the Active Spot.
Once during your turn, you may take 1 {P.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以從你的能量區取出 1 個 {P} 能量並將其附加到活動地點的 {P} 神奇寶貝上。

Once during your turn, you may take a {L.en: Once during your turn, you may take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may take a {L.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以從你的能量區取出一個{L}能量並將其附加到這只神奇寶貝身上。
Once during your turn, you may take a {L.es: Una vez durante tu turno, puedes tomar una Energía {L} de tu Zona de Energía y unirla a este Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may take a {L.it: Una sola volta durante il tuo turno, puoi prendere un'Energia {L} dalla tua Zona Energetica e assegnarla a questo Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may take a {L.fr: Une fois pendant votre tour, vous pouvez prendre une Énergie {L} de votre Zone d'Énergie et l'attacher à ce Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may take a {L.pt-br: Uma vez durante o seu turno, você pode pegar uma Energia {L} da sua Zona de Energia e associá-la a este Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may take a {L.de: Einmal während deines Zuges kannst du eine {L}-Energie aus deiner Energiezone nehmen und sie an dieses Pokémon anlegen.

Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. I.en: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. I.zh-tw: 一旦出現，就會橫衝直撞。它會一直憤怒，直到摧毀周圍的一切。

One Heliolisk basking in the sun with it.en: One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill outspread is all it would take to produce enough electricity to power a city.
One Heliolisk basking in the sun with it.zh-tw: 只要一隻日光蟲在陽光下伸展開來，就可以產生足夠的電力來為一座城市供電。

Pawniard will fearlessly challenge even.en: Pawniard will fearlessly challenge even powerful foes. In a pinch, it will cling to opponents and pierce them with the blades all over its body.
Pawniard will fearlessly challenge even.zh-tw: 即使是強大的敵人，Pawniard 也會無所畏懼地挑戰。緊要關頭，它會緊貼對手，用全身的刀刃刺穿他們。

People say that it fled from its enemies.en: People say that it fled from its enemies by using its small webbed hind feet to swim from island to island in Alola.
People say that it fled from its enemies.zh-tw: 人們說它是為了躲避敵人而用後足的小蹼在阿羅拉的一個島嶼之間游動。

Poison oozes from all over its body. It.en: Poison oozes from all over its body. It catches small bug Pokémon at night that are attracted by light.
Poison oozes from all over its body. It.zh-tw: 毒液從它的全身散發出來。在夜間捕捉被光吸引的小蟲子寶可夢。

Put 1 random {G} Pokémon from your deck.en: Put 1 random {G} Pokémon from your deck into your hand.
Put 1 random {G} Pokémon from your deck.zh-tw: 從你的卡組中隨機將 1 只 {G} 神奇寶貝加入你的手牌。

Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck ont.en: Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck onto your Bench.
Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck ont.zh-tw: 從你的牌組中隨機將 1 張 Nidoran♂ 放到你的替補席上。
Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck ont.es: Coloca 1 Nidoran♂ aleatorio de tu mazo en tu Banca.
Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck ont.fr: Mettez 1 Nidoran♂ aléatoire de votre deck sur votre banc.
Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck ont.de: Lege 1 zufälligen Nidoran♂ aus deinem Deck auf deine Bank.
Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck ont.pt-br: Coloque 1 Nidoran♂ aleatório do seu deck no seu Banco.
Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck ont.it: Metti 1 Nidoran♂ casuale dal tuo mazzo nella tua panchina.

Put your Muk or Weezing in the Active Sp.en: Put your Muk or Weezing in the Active Spot into your hand.
Put your Muk or Weezing in the Active Sp.zh-tw: 將活躍點中的 Muk 或 Weez 放入手上。

Said to live in huge colonies deep in ju.en: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
Said to live in huge colonies deep in ju.zh-tw: 據說它們生活在叢林深處的巨大聚居地，儘管沒有人從那裡回來過。

Salazzle makes its opponents light-heade.en: Salazzle makes its opponents light-headed with poisonous gas, then captivates them with alluring movements to turn them into loyal servants.
Salazzle makes its opponents light-heade.zh-tw: 薩拉茲用毒氣讓對手頭暈目眩，然後用誘人的動作迷惑他們，將他們變成忠誠的僕人。

Staring at the swirl on its belly causes.en: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl's has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.
Staring at the swirl on its belly causes.zh-tw: 盯著腹部的漩渦會讓人昏昏欲睡。波利維爾的這一特徵已被用來代替搖籃曲來讓孩子們入睡。

State-of-the-art technology was used to.en: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be created via computer programming.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.zh-tw: Porygon 的製造採用了最先進的技術。它是第一個通過計算機編程創建的人造神奇寶貝。

Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon.en: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.
Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon.zh-tw: 強大但不太聰明，這只神奇寶貝甚至可以用它的衝鋒鏟粉碎摩天大樓。

Switch out your opponent’s Active Pokémo.en: Switch out your opponent’s Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)
Switch out your opponent’s Active Pokémo.zh-tw: 將對手的活躍神奇寶貝移至替補席。 （你的對手選擇新的活躍神奇寶貝。）

Take 1 {F} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take 1 {F} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to your Golem or Onix.
Take 1 {F} Energy from your Energy Zone.zh-tw: 從你的能量區獲取 1 個 {F} 能量並將其附加到你的魔像或 Onix 上。

Take 1 {M} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take 1 {M} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.
Take 1 {M} Energy from your Energy Zone.zh-tw: 從你的能量區取出 1 {M} 能量並將其附加到這只神奇寶貝身上。

Take a {G} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take a {G} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched {G} Pokémon.
Take a {G} Energy from your Energy Zone.zh-tw: 從你的能量區取出一個 {G} 能量並將其附加到你後備的 1 只 {G} 神奇寶貝上。

Tentacool is not a particularly strong s.en: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.
Tentacool is not a particularly strong s.zh-tw: Tentacool 並不是一個特別擅長游泳的人。當它尋找獵物時，它會在淺海表面漂流。

Thanks to its thick fat, cold seas don't.en: Thanks to its thick fat, cold seas don't bother it at all, but it gets tired pretty easily in warm waters.
Thanks to its thick fat, cold seas don't.zh-tw: 由於其脂肪很厚，寒冷的海水根本不會打擾它，但在溫暖的海水中它很容易感到疲倦。

The broadness of its hands may be no coi.en: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.
The broadness of its hands may be no coi.zh-tw: 它的手如此寬大可能並非巧合——許多科學家認為它的手掌變大是為了表演啞劇。

The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroo.en: The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroom on its back having become the main body. If the mushroom comes off, the bug stops moving.
The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroo.zh-tw: 蟲子已經死得差不多了，背上的蘑菇成了主體。如果蘑菇脫落，蟲子就會停止移動。

The claws on its feet are well developed.en: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.
The claws on its feet are well developed.zh-tw: 它腳上的爪子很發達。它可以將 Exeggcute 等獵物帶到 60 英里外的巢穴。

The drier the area Sandslash lives in, t.en: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon's spikes will feel when touched.
The drier the area Sandslash lives in, t.zh-tw: 沙斬生活的地區越乾燥，觸摸時神奇寶貝的尖刺就越堅硬、越光滑。

The electromagnetic waves emitted by the.en: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the.zh-tw: 其頭部兩側的裝置發射的電磁波會排出反重力，使其能夠漂浮。

The fragrance of the garland on its head.en: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.
The fragrance of the garland on its head.zh-tw: 它頭上的花環散發出的香味有放鬆的作用，但照顧它卻很困難。

The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.en: The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokémon, always straining its large ears.
The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.zh-tw: 雄性尼多蘭額頭上的角含有劇毒。這是一隻非常謹慎的神奇寶貝，總是拉緊它的大耳朵。

The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.en: The horn on its head has atrophied. It's thought that this happens so Nidorina's children won't get poked while their mother is feeding them.
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.zh-tw: 它頭上的角已經萎縮了。人們認為，這樣做是為了讓尼多麗娜的孩子們在母親餵奶時不會被戳到。

The horns on its head provide a strong p.en: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people's emotions.
The horns on its head provide a strong p.zh-tw: 它頭上的角具有強大的力量，能夠感知人們的情緒。

The latest research has determined that.en: The latest research has determined that there are over 20 possible arrangements of the patterns on its stomach.
The latest research has determined that.zh-tw: 最新研究確定，它胃部的圖案有20多種可能的排列方式。

The leafy parts act as cutters for slash.en: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.
The leafy parts act as cutters for slash.zh-tw: 葉狀部分充當切割敵人的刀具。它噴出一種可以溶解一切的液體。

The leaves on its head grow right back e.en: The leaves on its head grow right back even if they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.
The leaves on its head grow right back e.zh-tw: 它頭上的葉子即使掉下來也會重新長出來。這些苦澀的葉子讓吃它們的人感到清爽。

The more energy it charges up, the faste.en: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.
The more energy it charges up, the faste.zh-tw: 它充電的能量越多，速度就越快。但這也使得它更容易爆炸。

The mushrooms, known as tochukaso, are c.en: The mushrooms, known as tochukaso, are controlling the bug. Even if the bug bugs the mushrooms, they tell it to bug off.
The mushrooms, known as tochukaso, are c.zh-tw: 這種被稱為“tochukaso”的蘑菇正在控制這種細菌。即使蟲子騷擾了蘑菇，蘑菇也會叫它趕緊走開。

The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wi.en: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.
The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wi.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝翅膀上的莖可以作為劍來砍倒對手。在嚴峻的情況下，莖也可以作為食物。

The way it brushes away grime with its t.en: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.
The way it brushes away grime with its t.zh-tw: 它用尾巴刷掉污垢的方式在清潔時很有幫助。但它對一塵不染的關注可能會讓清潔變得更加麻煩。

The wings are covered with dustlike scal.en: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.
The wings are covered with dustlike scal.zh-tw: 翅膀上覆蓋著塵埃般的鱗片。它每次拍打翅膀時都會釋放出劇毒粉塵。

There is a plant seed on its back right.en: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
There is a plant seed on its back right.zh-tw: 從這只神奇寶貝出生的那天起，它的背上就有一顆植物種子。種子慢慢長大。

There's a hole in its tail that allows i.en: There's a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.
There's a hole in its tail that allows i.zh-tw: 它的尾巴上有一個洞，可以讓它吸入保持火焰燃燒所需的空氣。如果洞被堵住，這只神奇寶貝就會生病。

These Pokémon judge one another based on.en: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.zh-tw: 這些神奇寶貝通過鉗子來判斷彼此。更厚、更令人印象深刻的鉗子更受異性歡迎。

They coil around foes and shock them wit.en: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.
They coil around foes and shock them wit.zh-tw: 它們盤旋在敵人周圍，用看似簡單的圓形圖案的發電器官對他們進行電擊。

They crawl out of the ocean using their.en: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
They crawl out of the ocean using their.zh-tw: 他們用手臂從海裡爬出來。它們會攻擊岸上的獵物，然後立即將其拖入大海。

They say that if it emits an aura from i.en: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly.
They say that if it emits an aura from i.zh-tw: 據說，如果它全身散發出氣息，天氣就會瞬間開始變化。

They were sculpted from clay in ancient.en: They were sculpted from clay in ancient times. No one knows why, but some of them are driven to continually line up boulders.
They were sculpted from clay in ancient.zh-tw: 它們在古代是用粘土雕刻而成的。沒有人知道為什麼，但其中一些人被迫不斷地排列巨石。

This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sens.en: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sens.zh-tw: 這個神奇的神奇寶貝具有令人敬畏的平衡感。它可以從任何位置連續踢球。

This attack also does 10 damage to each.en: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
This attack also does 10 damage to each.zh-tw: 這次攻擊還會對對手的後備神奇寶貝各造成 10 點傷害。

This attack does 20 more damage for each.en: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
This attack does 20 more damage for each.zh-tw: 對手的活躍寶可夢身上每附加一個能量，此攻擊就會造成 20 點額外傷害。

This attack does 30 damage for each of y.en: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched {L} Pokémon.
This attack does 30 damage for each of y.zh-tw: 此攻擊對你的每個後備 {L} 神奇寶貝造成 30 點傷害。

This attack does 30 damage for each of y.en: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.
This attack does 30 damage for each of y.zh-tw: 這次攻擊對你的每隻後備神奇寶貝造成 30 點傷害。

This attack does 50 more damage for each.en: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your Benched Nidoking.
This attack does 50 more damage for each.zh-tw: 此攻擊對你的每個後備尼多王造成 50 點額外傷害。
This attack does 50 more damage for each.es: Este ataque hace 50 daños más por cada uno de tus Nidoking en banca.
This attack does 50 more damage for each.de: Dieser Angriff verursacht 50 weitere Schadenspunkte für jeden deiner Nidokings auf der Bank.
This attack does 50 more damage for each.fr: Cette attaque inflige 50 dégâts supplémentaires pour chacun de vos Nidoking de banc.
This attack does 50 more damage for each.it: Questo attacco infligge 50 danni in più per ciascuno dei tuoi Nidoking in panchina.
This attack does 50 more damage for each.pt-br: Este ataque causa 50 de dano a mais para cada um dos seus Nidoking no Banco.

This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient.en: This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient times. Apparently even modern technology is incapable of producing a perfectly restored specimen.
This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient.zh-tw: 這是自古以來兇猛的寶可夢。顯然，即使是現代技術也無法生產出完美修復的標本。

This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.en: This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.zh-tw: 這種善良的神奇寶貝會產下營養豐富的蛋，並與受傷的神奇寶貝或人類分享。

This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itse.en: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.
This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itse.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝也會對自身造成 50 點傷害。

This Pokémon can be seen galloping throu.en: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.
This Pokémon can be seen galloping throu.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝以高達 150 英里/小時的速度在田野中奔跑，火熱的鬃毛在風中飄揚。
