This Pokémon commands a group of several.en: This Pokémon commands a group of several Pawniard. Groups that are defeated in territorial disputes are absorbed by the winning side.
This Pokémon commands a group of several.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝指揮著一群由數名典當者組成的隊伍。在領土爭端中失敗的群體會被獲勝方吸收。

This Pokémon generates electricity when.en: This Pokémon generates electricity when it digests food. It uses its five hard teeth to scrape seaweed off surfaces and eat it.
This Pokémon generates electricity when.zh-tw: 該神奇寶貝在消化食物時會產生電力。它用五顆堅硬的牙齒刮掉表面的海藻並吃掉它。

This Pokémon has an organ known as its c.en: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.
This Pokémon has an organ known as its c.zh-tw: 該神奇寶貝有一個被稱為核心的器官。當海星釋放其強大的心靈力量時，該器官會發出七種顏色的光。

This Pokémon has complete control over e.en: This Pokémon has complete control over electricity. There are tales of Zapdos nesting in the dark depths of pitch-black thunderclouds.
This Pokémon has complete control over e.zh-tw: 該寶可夢完全掌控電力。有關於閃電鳥在漆黑的雷雲深處築巢的傳說。

This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evol.en: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.
This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evol.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝克服了悲傷，進化出堅固的新身體。馬羅瓦克以骨頭為武器，勇敢地面對對手。

This Pokémon takes -10 damage from attac.en: This Pokémon takes -10 damage from attacks.
This Pokémon takes -10 damage from attac.zh-tw: 該神奇寶貝受到的攻擊傷害為 -10。

This Pokémon takes -20 damage from attac.en: This Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.
This Pokémon takes -20 damage from attac.zh-tw: 該神奇寶貝受到的攻擊傷害為 -20。

This Pokémon uses its psychic powers whi.en: This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra's dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.
This Pokémon uses its psychic powers whi.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝在睡覺時會使用其心靈力量。阿布拉的夢的內容會影響神奇寶貝所使用的力量。

This species is almost entirely extinct..en: This species is almost entirely extinct. Kabuto molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder.
This species is almost entirely extinct..zh-tw: 這個物種幾乎完全滅絕了。 Kabuto 每三天蛻皮一次，使它們的外殼變得越來越硬。

Though it may look like it's just a bunc.en: Though it may look like it's just a bunch of eggs, it's a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.
Though it may look like it's just a bunc.zh-tw: 雖然它看起來只是一堆雞蛋，但它是一隻真正的神奇寶貝。顯然，Exeggcute 是通過心靈感應與其他同類進行交流的。

Three Magnemite are linked by a strong m.en: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.
Three Magnemite are linked by a strong m.zh-tw: 三個磁鐵礦通過強大的磁力連接在一起。如果距離太近，就會出現耳痛。

To protect its Trainer, it will expend a.en: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
To protect its Trainer, it will expend a.zh-tw: 為了保護它的訓練家，它會消耗所有的精神力來創造一個小黑洞。

To steal the life of its target, it slip.en: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.
To steal the life of its target, it slip.zh-tw: 為了竊取目標的生命，它會潛入獵物的陰影中，靜靜地等待機會。

Until recently, people living in the mou.en: Until recently, people living in the mountains would ride on the backs of these Pokémon to traverse the mountain paths.
Until recently, people living in the mou.zh-tw: 直到最近，生活在山里的人們都會騎在這些神奇寶貝的背上穿越山路。

Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitat.en: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.
Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitat.zh-tw: 卡達布拉利用其精神力量在睡眠時懸浮。它用有彈性的尾巴作為枕頭。

Weave a carpet from its springy wool, an.en: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You'll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.
Weave a carpet from its springy wool, an.zh-tw: 用有彈性的羊毛編織地毯，最終會得到更接近蹦床的東西。當你踏上它的那一刻，你就會開始彈跳。

Weighed down by a large and heavy shell,.en: Weighed down by a large and heavy shell, Omastar couldn't move very fast. Some say it went extinct because it was unable to catch food.
Weighed down by a large and heavy shell,.zh-tw: 由於受到又大又重的砲彈的壓迫，奧馬斯塔無法快速移動。有人說它滅絕是因為它無法捕捉食物。

When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea,.en: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.
When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea,.zh-tw: 當呆呆獸在海裡狩獵時，它的尾巴被剝殼者咬住了。這使得它演變成 Slowbro。

When attacked, it uses its feathers to s.en: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
When attacked, it uses its feathers to s.zh-tw: 當受到攻擊時，它會用羽毛濺起水花，在水花的掩護下逃脫。

When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.en: When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their shells. Those that have lived a long, long time have shells green with moss.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.zh-tw: 當魔像變老時，它們就會停止脫落外殼。那些活了很久很久的，貝殼上長滿了青苔。

When hunting, it skims the surface of wa.en: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.
When hunting, it skims the surface of wa.zh-tw: 捕獵時，它會高速掠過水面，捕捉鯉魚等粗心的獵物。

When it goes on a rampage, it's impossib.en: When it goes on a rampage, it's impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it's lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.
When it goes on a rampage, it's impossib.zh-tw: 一旦爆發，就無法控制。但在與它生活了很長時間的尼多女王面前，尼多金平靜了下來。

When it heats up, its body temperature r.en: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.
When it heats up, its body temperature r.zh-tw: 當它升溫時，它的體溫達到約 1,500 華氏度。它像鞭子一樣抽打身體並向敵人發起攻擊。

When it is angered, it immediately disch.en: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.
When it is angered, it immediately disch.zh-tw: 當它被激怒時，它會立即釋放臉頰眼袋中儲存的能量。

When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.en: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of psi moves, such as Hypnosis and Confusion.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.zh-tw: 當它鎖定敵人時，它會使用多種 psi 動作，例如催眠和混亂。

When it retracts its long neck into its.en: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
When it retracts its long neck into its.zh-tw: 當它把長長的脖子縮進殼裡時，就會用力噴出水。

When it swims at full speed using its lo.en: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow.
When it swims at full speed using its lo.zh-tw: 當它用長長的帶蹼的四肢全速游泳時，它的前額不知何故開始發光。

When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mys.en: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mys.zh-tw: 當它巨大的眼睛晃動時，它會唱出神秘舒緩的旋律，讓敵人入睡。

When Mienshao comes across a truly chall.en: When Mienshao comes across a truly challenging opponent, it will lighten itself by biting off the fur on its arms.
When Mienshao comes across a truly chall.zh-tw: 當面哨遇到真正有挑戰性的對手時，它會咬掉手臂上的毛來減輕自己的重量。

When spread, the frills on its head act.en: When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokémon's electric moves.
When spread, the frills on its head act.zh-tw: 當展開時，它頭上的褶邊就像太陽能電池板一樣，為神奇寶貝的電動動作提供動力。

When Tauros begins whipping itself with.en: When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails, it's a warning that the Pokémon is about to charge with astounding speed.
When Tauros begins whipping itself with.zh-tw: 當金牛座開始用尾巴抽打自己時，這是一個警告，神奇寶貝即將以驚人的速度衝鋒。

When the bulb on its back grows large, i.en: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
When the bulb on its back grows large, i.zh-tw: 當它背上的球莖變大時，它似乎就失去了後腿站立的能力。

When the memory of its departed mother b.en: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.
When the memory of its departed mother b.zh-tw: 當它想起死去的母親時，它會流下眼淚，它的哭聲會在頭戴的頭骨中悲傷地迴響。

When the red orbs on Tentacruel's head g.en: When the red orbs on Tentacruel's head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.
When the red orbs on Tentacruel's head g.zh-tw: 當刺傷獸頭上的紅色球體發出明亮的光芒時，請小心。神奇寶貝即將發射出一陣超聲波。

When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild.en: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild.zh-tw: 當這只脾氣暴躁的神奇寶貝狂奔時，它會從鬃毛中向四面八方射出閃電。

When thunderclouds cover the sky, it wil.en: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.
When thunderclouds cover the sky, it wil.zh-tw: 當雷雲遮蓋天空時，它就會出現。它可以用鬃毛捕捉閃電並儲存電力。

While inside a cave, if you look up and.en: While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it's evidence that Woobat live there.
While inside a cave, if you look up and.zh-tw: 在洞穴內，如果您抬頭看到牆壁上排列著許多心形標記，則證明 Woobat 居住在那裡。

While one alone doesn't have much power,.en: While one alone doesn't have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
While one alone doesn't have much power,.zh-tw: 雖然單個 Tynamo 的力量並不大，但許多 Tynamo 的鏈條可以像閃電一樣強大。

While young, it has six gorgeous tails..en: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.
While young, it has six gorgeous tails..zh-tw: 年輕時，它有六條華麗的尾巴。當它長大時，會長出幾條新的尾巴。

With a horn that's harder than diamond,.en: With a horn that's harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.
With a horn that's harder than diamond,.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝擁有比鑽石還硬的角，在尋找月光石時會繞過破碎的巨石。

Your opponent can't use any Supporter ca.en: Your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand during their next turn.
Your opponent can't use any Supporter ca.zh-tw: 你的對手在下回合中不能使用手上的任何支持者卡。

Your opponent reveals their hand..zh-tw: 你的對手亮出了他們的牌。

According to the legends of Sinnoh, this.en: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.
According to the legends of Sinnoh, this.zh-tw: 根據神奧傳說，這只神奇寶貝從蛋中誕生，塑造了這個世界的一切。

After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cher.en: After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes this form. It's full of energy while it's like this, and its liveliness will go on until sundown.
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cher.zh-tw: 吸收了充足的陽光後，櫻桃就呈現出這種形態。這樣一來就充滿了活力，這種熱鬧會一直持續到日落。

Although it always pretends to be a tree.en: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.
Although it always pretends to be a tree.zh-tw: 雖然它總是假裝是一棵樹，但它的構成看起來更像岩石而不是植被。

Ancient people believed that the pattern.en: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.
Ancient people believed that the pattern.zh-tw: 古人相信青銅佐背上的圖案蘊含著神秘的力量。

As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still.en: As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly waiting for sunlight to appear.
As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still.zh-tw: 作為一個花蕾，它幾乎不動。它靜靜地坐著，平靜地等待陽光的出現。

As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémo.en: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.
As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémo.zh-tw: 當它在天空中疾馳時，這只神奇寶貝似乎在接收來歷不明的信號，同時發射目的不明的信號。

As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench.en: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Basic Pokémon's Retreat Cost is 1 less.
As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench.zh-tw: 只要這只神奇寶貝在你的替補席上，你的活躍基礎神奇寶貝的撤退成本就會減少 1。

At night, Combee sleep in a group of abo.en: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.
At night, Combee sleep in a group of abo.zh-tw: 晚上，科比大約有一百隻，緊密地擠在一起睡覺。

Born deep underground, this Pokémon beco.en: Born deep underground, this Pokémon becomes a pupa after eating enough dirt to make a mountain.
Born deep underground, this Pokémon beco.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝出生在地下深處，在吃掉足夠建造一座山的泥土後變成了蛹。

Both of its legs have turned into wings..en: Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a sound, Crobat flies swiftly toward its prey and sinks its fangs into the nape of its target's neck.
Both of its legs have turned into wings..zh-tw: 它的兩條腿都變成了翅膀。鱷魚無聲地迅速飛向獵物，並將尖牙咬入目標的頸背。

Discard 2 random Energy from this Pokémo.en: Discard 2 random Energy from this Pokémon.
Discard 2 random Energy from this Pokémo.zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的 2 個隨機能量。

Discard a random Energy from this Pokémo.en: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.
Discard a random Energy from this Pokémo.zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的隨機能量。
Discard a random Energy from this Pokémo.fr: Défaussez une Énergie aléatoire de ce Pokémon.
Discard a random Energy from this Pokémo.es: Descarta una Energía aleatoria de este Pokémon.
Discard a random Energy from this Pokémo.pt-br: Descarte uma Energia aleatória deste Pokémon.
Discard a random Energy from this Pokémo.it: Scarta un'Energia casuale da questo Pokémon.
Discard a random Energy from this Pokémo.de: Lege eine zufällige Energie von diesem Pokémon ab.

Donphan is covered in tough hide, so eve.en: Donphan is covered in tough hide, so even being hit by a car won't faze this Pokémon. However, it is extremely susceptible to rain.
Donphan is covered in tough hide, so eve.zh-tw: 唐凡全身覆蓋著堅韌的皮革，因此即使被車撞也不會困擾這只神奇寶貝。然而，它極易受雨影響。

During cold seasons, it migrates to the.en: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.
During cold seasons, it migrates to the.zh-tw: 在寒冷的季節，它會遷徙到山的下游。春天，它又回到了白雪覆蓋的山頂。

During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon.en: During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, do 10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon.zh-tw: 寶可夢檢查時，如果該寶可夢位於活躍位置，則對對手的活躍寶可夢造成 10 點傷害。
During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon.es: Durante el Chequeo de Pokémon, si este Pokémon está en el Punto Activo, haz 10 puntos de daño al Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon.fr: Lors du Checkup Pokémon, si ce Pokémon est dans le Spot Actif, infligez 10 dégâts au Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon.de: Wenn sich dieses Pokémon während des Pokémon-Checkups an der aktiven Stelle befindet, füge dem aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners 10 Schadenspunkte zu.
During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon.pt-br: Durante o Pokémon Checkup, se este Pokémon estiver no Active Spot, cause 10 pontos de dano ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.
During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon.it: Durante il Controllo Pokémon, se questo Pokémon è in posizione attiva, infliggi 10 danni al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.

During this turn, attacks used by your S.en: During this turn, attacks used by your Snorlax, Heracross, and Staraptor cost 2 less {C} Energy.
During this turn, attacks used by your S.zh-tw: 在這個回合中，你的斯諾拉克斯、赫拉克羅斯和星盜龍使用的攻擊消耗 2 點較少的 {C} 能量。

During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ro.en: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Rolling Spin attack does +60 damage.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ro.zh-tw: 在你的下一個回合中，這只神奇寶貝的滾動旋轉攻擊造成 +60 點傷害。

During your opponent's next turn, all of.en: During your opponent's next turn, all of your {M} Pokémon take −20 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.
During your opponent's next turn, all of.zh-tw: 在你對手的下一個回合中，你所有的 {M} 個神奇寶貝因對手神奇寶貝的攻擊而受到 -20 點傷害。

During your opponent's next turn, attack.en: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −30 damage.
During your opponent's next turn, attack.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，防御神奇寶貝使用的攻擊造成-30點傷害。

Extremely strong, it can change the land.en: Extremely strong, it can change the landscape. It is so insolent that it doesn't care about others.
Extremely strong, it can change the land.zh-tw: 極其強大，可以改變地貌。它太囂張了，根本不關心別人。

Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads,.en: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 70 more damage.
Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads,.zh-tw: 翻轉 2 個硬幣。如果兩人都是正面，則這次攻擊會造成 70 點額外傷害。

Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.en: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面，此攻擊會造成 60 點額外傷害。

Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.en: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面，此攻擊會造成 60 點額外傷害。如果是反面，這只神奇寶貝也會對自己造成 20 點傷害。

Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent rev.en: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent rev.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果出現正面，則對手從手中隨機展示一張牌並將其洗入牌庫。
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent rev.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c'est face, votre adversaire révèle une carte aléatoire de sa main et la mélange dans son deck.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent rev.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, tu oponente revela una carta aleatoria de su mano y la baraja en su mazo.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent rev.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, seu oponente revela uma carta aleatória de sua mão e a embaralha em seu baralho.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent rev.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, il tuo avversario rivela una carta casuale dalla sua mano e la mescola nel suo mazzo.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent rev.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ deckt dein Gegner eine zufällige Karte aus seiner Hand auf und mischt sie in sein Deck.

Heal 40 damage from each of your Pokémon.en: Heal 40 damage from each of your Pokémon that has any {W} Energy attached.
Heal 40 damage from each of your Pokémon.zh-tw: 每隻帶有 {W} 能量的神奇寶貝可治療 40 點傷害。

If this Pokémon has damage on it, this a.en: If this Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.
If this Pokémon has damage on it, this a.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝受到傷害，則這次攻擊會造成額外 40 點傷害。

If you are burned by the flames it shoot.en: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.
If you are burned by the flames it shoot.zh-tw: 如果你被它嘴裡噴出的火焰燒傷，疼痛將永遠不會消失。

If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play,.en: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon cost 1 less {C} Energy.
If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play,.zh-tw: 如果你場上有阿爾宙斯或阿爾宙斯 ex，該神奇寶貝使用的攻擊會減少 1 點 {C} 能量。

If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play,.en: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play,.zh-tw: 如果你場上有阿爾宙斯或阿爾宙斯 ex，該神奇寶貝使用的攻擊會對對手的活躍神奇寶貝造成 +30 點傷害。

If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play,.en: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.
If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play,.zh-tw: 如果你場上有阿爾宙斯或阿爾宙斯 ex，則該神奇寶貝沒有撤退成本。

If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play,.en: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.
If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play,.zh-tw: 如果你場上有阿爾宙斯或阿爾宙斯 ex，這只神奇寶貝受到的攻擊傷害為 -30。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {M} Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍神奇寶貝是{M}神奇寶貝，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 30 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon {ex}, this attack does 30 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍神奇寶貝是神奇寶貝 {ex}，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 30 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 30 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.zh-tw: 如果對手的現役神奇寶貝是前神奇寶貝，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 30 點。

In ages past, this Pokémon was revered a.en: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
In ages past, this Pokémon was revered a.zh-tw: 在過去的時代，這只神奇寶貝被尊為帶來雨水的使者。被發現埋在地下。

In rare cases, it molts and sheds its sc.en: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.
In rare cases, it molts and sheds its sc.zh-tw: 在極少數情況下，它會蛻皮並脫落鱗片。含有其鱗片的藥物可以使疲倦的身體感到精神振奮。

Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the.en: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.
Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the.zh-tw: 它會膨脹毒囊，使整個區域充滿奇怪的聲音，並用毒刺攻擊畏縮的對手。

It always stands on one foot. It changes.en: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
It always stands on one foot. It changes.zh-tw: 它總是用一隻腳站立。它換腳的速度如此之快，幾乎看不到動作。

It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling.en: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling.zh-tw: 它用帶有甜味的唾液吸引獵物，然後將其咀嚼下來。吃掉獵物需要一整天的時間。

It can dissolve toxins in the air to ins.en: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
It can dissolve toxins in the air to ins.zh-tw: 它可以溶解空氣中的毒素，讓荒蕪的土地瞬間變成茂盛的花田。

It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in.en: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in.zh-tw: 它棲息在火山洞穴中。它用十字形的腳挖洞，在天花板和牆壁上爬行。

It houses its colony in cells in its bod.en: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
It houses its colony in cells in its bod.zh-tw: 它把自己的群體安置在體內的細胞中，並釋放各種信息素，讓這些幼蟲聽從它的命令。

It is extremely protective of its territ.en: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
It is extremely protective of its territ.zh-tw: 它非常保護自己的領土。如果有任何敵人接近，它會使用惡毒的震動進行攻擊。

It is said that several Snorunt gather u.en: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
It is said that several Snorunt gather u.zh-tw: 據說，幾隻雪諾龍聚集在巨大的樹葉下，和諧地生活在一起。

It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.en: It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a variety of cries for communicating with others.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.zh-tw: 它足夠聰明，可以成群狩獵。它使用各種叫聲與他人交流。

It lives a quiet life on mountains that.en: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.
It lives a quiet life on mountains that.zh-tw: 它在終年積雪的山上過著平靜的生活。它通過掀起暴風雪來隱藏自己。

It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.en: It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the nectar to itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.zh-tw: 牠喜歡甜甜的花蜜。為了獨享所有花蜜，它用珍貴的角將競爭對手趕走。

It loves the honey of flowers and steals.en: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
It loves the honey of flowers and steals.zh-tw: 牠喜愛花蜜，並偷取Combee採集的蜂蜜。

It moves less than an inch a year, but w.en: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it's in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.
It moves less than an inch a year, but w.zh-tw: 它每年移動不到一英寸，但當它遇到堵塞時，它會瞬間旋轉並鑽入地面。

It never skips its daily yoga training..en: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation.
It never skips its daily yoga training..zh-tw: 它從不跳過日常瑜伽訓練。它通過冥想增強其內在力量。

It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.en: It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked by bird Pokémon that would love to make off with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.zh-tw: 它敏捷地衝來衝去，以避免被鳥類神奇寶貝啄食，這些神奇寶貝會喜歡用它營養豐富的小存儲球偷走。

It skulks in caves, and when prey or an.en: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.
It skulks in caves, and when prey or an.zh-tw: 它潛伏在洞穴裡，當獵物或敵人經過時，它會跳出來咬掉它們。它的攻擊力有時會碎掉牙齒。

It soars across the sky in a form that g.en: It soars across the sky in a form that greatly resembles the creator of all things. Perhaps this imitation of appearance is Palkia's strategy for gaining Arceus's powers.
It soars across the sky in a form that g.zh-tw: 它翱翔在天空，其形態酷似萬物的創造者。也許這種模仿外表的行為就是帕路奇犽為了獲得阿爾宙斯力量而採取的策略。

It stimulates its own muscles with elect.en: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.
It stimulates its own muscles with elect.zh-tw: 它用電流刺激自己的肌肉，因此可以快速移動。它還可以通過電來緩解疼痛，因此也可以很快恢復。

It stores static electricity in its fur.en: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
It stores static electricity in its fur.zh-tw: 它在皮毛中儲存靜電以進行放電。如果暴風雨來臨，它會發出火花。

Its electricity-like body can enter some.en: Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.
Its electricity-like body can enter some.zh-tw: 其電力般的身體可以進入某些機器並進行控制以進行惡作劇。

Its eyes are specially developed to enab.en: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.
Its eyes are specially developed to enab.zh-tw: 它的眼睛經過特殊發育，即使在昏暗的黑暗和微弱的光線下也能看得清楚。

Its flat, thin body is always stuck on w.en: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
Its flat, thin body is always stuck on w.zh-tw: 它扁平、薄薄的身體總是貼在牆上。它的形狀似乎有某種含義。

Its long ears are superb sensors. It can.en: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of things in water and tell what they are.
Its long ears are superb sensors. It can.zh-tw: 它的長耳朵是極好的傳感器。它可以辨別水中物體的運動並說出它們是什麼。

Its shell is as hard as bedrock, and it.en: Its shell is as hard as bedrock, and it is also very strong. Its thrashing can topple a mountain.
Its shell is as hard as bedrock, and it.zh-tw: 它的外殼堅硬如基岩，而且也非常堅固。其一擊可推山倒。

Its two whiskers provide a sensitive rad.en: Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey's location.
Its two whiskers provide a sensitive rad.zh-tw: 它的兩根鬍鬚提供了靈敏的雷達。即使在渾水中，它也能探測到獵物的位置。

Once during your turn, if this Pokémon i.en: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may take a {G} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your {G} Pokémon.
Once during your turn, if this Pokémon i.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，如果這只神奇寶貝位於活動位置，你可以從你的能量區取出一個 {G} 能量並將其附加到你的 1 只 {G} 神奇寶貝上。
Once during your turn, if this Pokémon i.it: Una sola volta durante il tuo turno, se questo Pokémon è in posizione attiva, puoi prendere un'Energia {G} dalla tua Zona Energetica e assegnarla a 1 dei tuoi Pokémon {G}.
Once during your turn, if this Pokémon i.pt-br: Uma vez durante o seu turno, se este Pokémon estiver no Ponto Ativo, você poderá pegar uma Energia {G} da sua Zona de Energia e ligá-la a 1 dos seus {G} Pokémon.
Once during your turn, if this Pokémon i.es: Una vez durante tu turno, si este Pokémon está en el Punto Activo, puedes tomar una Energía {G} de tu Zona de Energía y unirla a 1 de tus Pokémon {G}.
Once during your turn, if this Pokémon i.fr: Une fois pendant votre tour, si ce Pokémon est dans le Point Actif, vous pouvez prendre une Énergie {G} de votre Zone d'Énergie et l'attacher à 1 de vos Pokémon {G}.
Once during your turn, if this Pokémon i.de: Wenn sich dieses Pokémon einmal während deines Zuges an der aktiven Stelle befindet, kannst du eine {G}-Energie aus deiner Energiezone nehmen und sie an 1 deiner {G}-Pokémon anlegen.

Once during your turn, if you have Arceu.en: Once during your turn, if you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, you may do 30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Once during your turn, if you have Arceu.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，如果你有阿爾宙斯或阿爾宙斯 ex 在場，你可以對對手的活躍神奇寶貝造成 30 點傷害。

Once during your turn, you may choose ei.en: Once during your turn, you may choose either player. Look at the top card of that player's deck.
Once during your turn, you may choose ei.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以選擇任一玩家。查看該玩家牌組頂牌。

Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your dis.en: Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.
Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your dis.zh-tw: 從你的棄牌堆中隨機選擇 1 只基礎寶可夢加入你的手牌。

Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a.en: Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a form bearing a striking resemblance to the creator Pokémon. Dialga now wields such colossal strength that one must conclude this is its true form.
Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a.zh-tw: 光芒使帝牙盧卡呈現出與創造者神奇寶貝驚人相似的形態。帝牙盧卡現在擁有如此巨大的力量，人們必須斷定這就是它的真實形態。

Recognizing their own weakness, they alw.en: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.
Recognizing their own weakness, they alw.zh-tw: 認識到自己的弱點，他們總是生活在一個群體中。獨自一人時，Staravia 會大聲哭泣。

Swaying and dodging the attacks of its f.en: Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.
Swaying and dodging the attacks of its f.zh-tw: 它搖擺著躲避敵人的攻擊，將靈活的身體緊緊地纏繞在一起，然後用有毒的爪子猛扑出去。

The fur on its body naturally repels wat.en: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry even when it plays in the water.
The fur on its body naturally repels wat.zh-tw: 它身上的皮毛天然具有防水功能。即使在水中玩耍也能保持乾燥。

They flock around mountains and fields,.en: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.
They flock around mountains and fields,.zh-tw: 它們成群結隊地在山脈和田野周圍追逐蟲子神奇寶貝。他們的歌聲吵鬧而煩人。

This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of.en: This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of.zh-tw: 這次攻擊也會對對手後備的 1 只神奇寶貝造成 10 點傷害。

This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itse.en: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.
This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itse.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝也會對自身造成 30 點傷害。

This Pokémon is now Asleep..zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝現在已經睡著了。

This Pokémon is said to live in a world.en: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.
This Pokémon is said to live in a world.zh-tw: 據說這只神奇寶貝生活在與我們相反的世界，那裡的常識被扭曲和奇怪。

This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverb.en: This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank. After playing in the mud, it won't be able to settle down unless it washes its body.
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverb.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝在河岸上生活和築巢。玩完泥巴之後，不洗身就無法安定下來。

Through yoga training, it gained the psy.en: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe's next move.
Through yoga training, it gained the psy.zh-tw: 通過瑜伽訓練，它獲得了預測敵人下一步行動的心靈力量。

To shelter itself from cold, wintry wind.en:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers
itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
To shelter itself from cold, wintry wind.zh-tw:
為了躲避寒冷的冬風，它覆蓋了
它本身穿著一件由樹枝和樹葉製成的斗篷。

When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes.en: When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes, it freezes them and takes them to its chilly den, where they become decorations.
When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes.zh-tw: 當它發現人類或牠喜歡的神奇寶貝時，它會將它們冷凍起來，並將它們帶到寒冷的巢穴，在那裡它們成為裝飾品。

When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, the.en: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, the.zh-tw: 當 Staravia 進化成 Staraptor 時，它們會離開羊群獨自生活。它們有堅固的翅膀。

When the water warms, they inflate the f.en: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.
When the water warms, they inflate the f.zh-tw: 當水溫變暖時，它們將頭上的浮囊充氣，成群結隊地在海面上慵懶地漂流。

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Do 20 damage to this Pokémon instead of the usual amount for this Special Condition.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.zh-tw: 你對手的主動神奇寶貝現在中毒了。對該神奇寶貝造成 20 點傷害，而不是此特殊條件下的通常傷害。

1 other Pokémon (either yours or your op.en: 1 other Pokémon (either yours or your opponent's) is chosen at random 3 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.
1 other Pokémon (either yours or your op.es: Se elige 1 Pokémon más (ya sea tuyo o de tu oponente) al azar 3 veces. Por cada vez que se elija un Pokémon, hazle 50 daños.
1 other Pokémon (either yours or your op.pt-br: 1 outro Pokémon (seu ou do seu oponente) é escolhido aleatoriamente 3 vezes. Para cada vez que um Pokémon for escolhido, cause 50 de dano a ele.
1 other Pokémon (either yours or your op.de: 1 anderes Pokémon (entweder deins oder das deines Gegners) wird dreimal zufällig ausgewählt. Füge ihm jedes Mal, wenn ein Pokémon ausgewählt wurde, 50 Schadenspunkte zu.
1 other Pokémon (either yours or your op.it: 1 altro Pokémon (tuo o del tuo avversario) viene scelto a caso 3 volte. Per ogni volta che viene scelto un Pokémon, infliggigli 50 danni.
1 other Pokémon (either yours or your op.zh-tw: 隨機選擇 1 個其他神奇寶貝（無論是你的還是你對手的）3 次。每次選擇一隻神奇寶貝，對其造成 50 點傷害。
1 other Pokémon (either yours or your op.fr: 1 autre Pokémon (le vôtre ou celui de votre adversaire) est choisi au hasard 3 fois. À chaque fois qu'un Pokémon est choisi, infligez-lui 50 dégâts.

A common sight in volcanic areas, it slo.en:
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers
around in a constant search for warm places.
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slo.es:
Una vista común en áreas volcánicas, se desliza lentamente
alrededor en una búsqueda constante de lugares cálidos.
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slo.de:
Es ist ein häufiger Anblick in vulkanischen Gebieten und gleitet langsam dahin
auf der ständigen Suche nach warmen Orten.
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slo.fr:
Un spectacle courant dans les zones volcaniques, il glisse lentement
dans une recherche constante d'endroits chauds.
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slo.it:
Uno spettacolo comune nelle aree vulcaniche, scivola lentamente
in giro alla costante ricerca di luoghi caldi.
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slo.zh-tw:
它在火山地區很常見，它緩慢地滑行
不斷地尋找溫暖的地方。
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slo.pt-br:
Uma visão comum em áreas vulcânicas, desliza lentamente
em busca constante de lugares quentes.

A Pokémon that races across the land. It.en:
A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said
that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
A Pokémon that races across the land. It.es:
Un Pokémon que corre por la tierra. se dice
ese nace cada vez que aparece un nuevo volcán.
A Pokémon that races across the land. It.fr:
Un Pokémon qui court à travers le pays. On dit
celui-là naît à chaque fois qu'un nouveau volcan apparaît.
A Pokémon that races across the land. It.it:
Un Pokémon che corre per tutto il territorio. Si dice
quello nasce ogni volta che appare un nuovo vulcano.
A Pokémon that races across the land. It.de:
Ein Pokémon, das durch das Land rast. Es heißt
dass man jedes Mal geboren wird, wenn ein neuer Vulkan auftaucht.
A Pokémon that races across the land. It.zh-tw:
在陸地上奔跑的寶可夢。據說
每當一座新火山出現時，這個火山就會誕生。
A Pokémon that races across the land. It.pt-br:
Um Pokémon que corre pela terra. É dito
aquele nasce toda vez que surge um novo vulcão.

A rough customer that wildly flails its.en:
A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws.
It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
A rough customer that wildly flails its.es:
Un cliente rudo que agita salvajemente sus garras gigantes.
Se dice que es extremadamente difícil de criar.
A rough customer that wildly flails its.fr:
Un client brutal qui agite sauvagement ses griffes géantes.
On dit que c'est extrêmement difficile à élever.
A rough customer that wildly flails its.it:
Un cliente rude che agita selvaggiamente i suoi artigli giganti.
Si dice che sia estremamente difficile da allevare.
A rough customer that wildly flails its.zh-tw:
一個粗魯的顧客，瘋狂地揮舞著巨大的爪子。
據說飼養起來極其困難。
A rough customer that wildly flails its.de:
Ein rauer Kunde, der wild mit seinen riesigen Krallen um sich schlägt.
Es soll extrem schwierig sein, es aufzubringen.
A rough customer that wildly flails its.pt-br:
Um cliente rude que agita descontroladamente suas garras gigantes.
Diz-se que é extremamente difícil de aumentar.

A spicy aroma emanates from around its n.en:
A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck.
The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.
A spicy aroma emanates from around its n.fr:
Un arôme épicé émane de son cou.
L'arôme agit comme un stimulant pour restaurer la santé.
A spicy aroma emanates from around its n.es:
Un aroma especiado emana alrededor de su cuello.
El aroma actúa como estimulante para restaurar la salud.
A spicy aroma emanates from around its n.de:
Um seinen Hals strömt ein würziger Duft.
Das Aroma wirkt als Stimulans zur Wiederherstellung der Gesundheit.
A spicy aroma emanates from around its n.zh-tw:
一股辛辣的香氣從它的脖頸處散發出來。
香氣可以作為恢復健康的興奮劑。
A spicy aroma emanates from around its n.it:
Dal collo emana un profumo speziato.
L'aroma agisce come uno stimolante per ripristinare la salute.
A spicy aroma emanates from around its n.pt-br:
Um aroma picante emana de seu pescoço.
O aroma atua como estimulante para restaurar a saúde.

A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf.en:
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its
head. It is docile and loves to soak up sun rays.
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf.fr:
Un doux arôme s'échappe doucement de la feuille sur son
tête. Il est docile et adore profiter des rayons du soleil.
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf.es:
Un dulce aroma flota suavemente desde la hoja en su
cabeza. Es dócil y le encanta tomar los rayos del sol.
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf.de:
Ein süßer Duft weht sanft aus dem Blatt
Kopf. Er ist fügsam und liebt es, Sonnenstrahlen aufzusaugen.
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf.pt-br:
Um aroma doce emana suavemente da folha em seu
cabeça. É dócil e adora absorver os raios solares.
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf.zh-tw:
一股甜甜的香氣從它的葉子上輕輕地飄來
頭。它性格溫順，喜歡吸收陽光。
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf.it:
Un dolce aroma si diffonde delicatamente dalle foglie
testa. È docile e ama prendere i raggi del sole.

According to local rumors, Cleffa are of.en:
According to local rumors, Cleffa are often seen
in places where shooting stars have fallen.
According to local rumors, Cleffa are of.fr:
Selon les rumeurs locales, on voit souvent des Cleffa
dans les endroits où des étoiles filantes sont tombées.
According to local rumors, Cleffa are of.de:
Lokalen Gerüchten zufolge wird Cleffa oft gesehen
an Orten, an denen Sternschnuppen gefallen sind.
According to local rumors, Cleffa are of.es:
Según los rumores locales, a menudo se ve a Cleffa
en lugares donde han caído estrellas fugaces.
According to local rumors, Cleffa are of.pt-br:
De acordo com rumores locais, Cleffa é frequentemente visto
em lugares onde caíram estrelas cadentes.
According to local rumors, Cleffa are of.zh-tw:
據當地傳聞，Cleffa 經常出現
在流星墜落的地方。
According to local rumors, Cleffa are of.it:
Secondo voci locali, i Cleffa vengono visti spesso
nei luoghi dove sono cadute le stelle cadenti.

After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cher.en:
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes
this form. It's full of energy while it's like this,
and its liveliness will go on until sundown.
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cher.es:
Después de absorber mucha luz solar, Cherrim toma
este formulario. Está lleno de energía mientras está así,
y su vivacidad durará hasta la puesta del sol.
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cher.fr:
Après avoir absorbé beaucoup de soleil, Cherrim prend
cette forme. C'est plein d'énergie quand c'est comme ça,
et sa vivacité durera jusqu'au coucher du soleil.
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cher.zh-tw:
吸收充足的陽光後，Cherrim 採取
這種形式。這樣一來就充滿了能量，
它的熱鬧將會持續到日落。
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cher.pt-br:
Depois de absorver bastante luz solar, Cherrim leva
este formulário. Está cheio de energia enquanto está assim,
e sua vivacidade continuará até o pôr do sol.
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cher.de:
Nachdem Cherrim viel Sonnenlicht absorbiert hat, nimmt er es auf
dieses Formular. Es ist voller Energie, während es so ist,
und seine Lebendigkeit wird bis zum Sonnenuntergang anhalten.
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cher.it:
Dopo aver assorbito molta luce solare, Cherrim prende
questo modulo. È pieno di energia mentre è così,
e la sua vivacità durerà fino al tramonto.

After two Binacle find a suitably sized.en:
After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they
adhere themselves to it and live together.
They cooperate to gather food during high tide.
After two Binacle find a suitably sized.es:
Después de que dos Binacle encuentran una roca del tamaño adecuado,
adherirse a él y vivir juntos.
Cooperan para recolectar alimentos durante la marea alta.
After two Binacle find a suitably sized.fr:
Après que deux Binacle aient trouvé un rocher de taille appropriée, ils
s'y adhérer et vivre ensemble.
Ils coopèrent pour récolter de la nourriture à marée haute.
After two Binacle find a suitably sized.zh-tw:
兩隻 Binacle 找到一塊大小合適的岩石後，他們
堅持下去並生活在一起。
他們在漲潮時合作收集食物。
After two Binacle find a suitably sized.it:
Dopo che due Binacle trovano una roccia di dimensioni adeguate, loro
aderirvi e vivere insieme.
Collaborano per raccogliere cibo durante l'alta marea.
After two Binacle find a suitably sized.de:
Nachdem zwei Binacle einen Stein geeigneter Größe gefunden haben, gehen sie
halten sich daran und leben zusammen.
Sie arbeiten zusammen, um bei Flut Nahrung zu sammeln.
After two Binacle find a suitably sized.pt-br:
Depois que dois Binacle encontram uma pedra de tamanho adequado, eles
aderem a ele e vivem juntos.
Eles cooperam para coletar alimentos durante a maré alta.

Although it always pretends to be a tree.en:
Although it always pretends to be a tree,
its composition appears more similar to
rock than to vegetation.
Although it always pretends to be a tree.es:
Aunque siempre finge ser un árbol,
su composición parece más similar a
roca que a la vegetación.
Although it always pretends to be a tree.fr:
Même s'il prétend toujours être un arbre,
sa composition semble plus proche de
la roche qu'à la végétation.
Although it always pretends to be a tree.it:
Anche se finge sempre di essere un albero,
la sua composizione appare più simile a
roccia che alla vegetazione.
Although it always pretends to be a tree.pt-br:
Embora sempre finja ser uma árvore,
sua composição parece mais semelhante a
rocha do que à vegetação.
Although it always pretends to be a tree.zh-tw:
雖然它總是假裝是一棵樹，
它的組成看起來更類似於
岩石比植被更重要。
Although it always pretends to be a tree.de:
Obwohl es immer vorgibt, ein Baum zu sein,
seine Zusammensetzung scheint ähnlicher zu sein
Felsen als zur Vegetation.

Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.en:
Although it's carrying its baby in a pouch on
its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It
intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.
Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.fr:
Bien qu'il porte son bébé dans une pochette
son ventre, Kangaskhan est rapide sur ses pattes. Il
intimide ses adversaires avec des coups rapides.
Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.es:
Aunque lleva a su bebé en una bolsa
su vientre, Kangaskhan es veloz de pies. eso
intimida a sus oponentes con golpes rápidos.
Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.zh-tw:
雖然它把寶寶裝在育兒袋裡
坎加斯坎的腹部，腳步敏捷。它
用快速刺拳恐嚇對手。
Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.it:
Anche se porta il suo bambino in un marsupio
il suo ventre, Kangaskhan è veloce in piedi. Esso
intimidisce i suoi avversari con colpi rapidi.
Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.de:
Obwohl es sein Baby in einem Beutel trägt
Mit seinem Bauch ist Kangaskhan schnell auf den Beinen. Es
schüchtert seine Gegner mit schnellen Stößen ein.
Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.pt-br:
Embora esteja carregando seu bebê em uma bolsa
sua barriga, Kangaskhan é rápido. Isso
intimida seus oponentes com golpes rápidos.

An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.en:
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may
jump high on rare occasions but never more
than seven feet.
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.fr:
Un Pokémon pathétique et sous-alimenté. Il se peut
sauter haut en de rares occasions mais jamais plus
plus de sept pieds.
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.es:
Un Pokémon patético y con pocos poderes. puede
saltar alto en raras ocasiones pero nunca más
de siete pies.
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.de:
Ein schwaches, erbärmliches Pokémon. Es kann sein
Springe in seltenen Fällen hoch, aber nie öfter
als sieben Fuß.
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.zh-tw:
力量不足、可憐的神奇寶貝。它可能
偶爾會跳得很高，但絕不會更多
超過七英尺。
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.it:
Un Pokémon sottodimensionato e patetico. Potrebbe
saltare in alto in rare occasioni ma mai di più
più di sette piedi.
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.pt-br:
Um Pokémon patético e pouco poderoso. Pode
pular alto em raras ocasiões, mas nunca mais
do que sete pés.

Anyone who takes even one taste of Bliss.en:
Anyone who takes even one taste of Blissey's
egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant
to everyone.
Anyone who takes even one taste of Bliss.fr:
Quiconque prend ne serait-ce qu'un avant-goût de Blissey's
l'œuf devient toujours attentionné et agréable
à tout le monde.
Anyone who takes even one taste of Bliss.zh-tw:
任何嚐過 Blissey’s 味道的人
雞蛋變得始終如一的關懷和愉快
給大家。
Anyone who takes even one taste of Bliss.es:
Cualquiera que pruebe aunque sea una vez el Blissey's
el huevo se vuelve siempre cariñoso y agradable
a todos.
Anyone who takes even one taste of Bliss.pt-br:
Qualquer um que experimente o Blissey's
ovo torna-se infalivelmente carinhoso e agradável
para todos.
Anyone who takes even one taste of Bliss.it:
Chiunque prenda anche solo un assaggio di Blissey
l'uovo diventa immancabilmente premuroso e piacevole
a tutti.
Anyone who takes even one taste of Bliss.de:
Jeder, der Blissey's auch nur einmal probiert
Ei wird stets fürsorglich und angenehm
an alle.

As a result of storing too much electric.en:
As a result of storing too much electricity,
it developed patches where even downy
wool won't grow.
As a result of storing too much electric.es:
Como resultado de almacenar demasiada electricidad,
desarrolló parches donde incluso el vello
la lana no crecerá.
As a result of storing too much electric.fr:
En raison du stockage d'une trop grande quantité d'électricité,
il a développé des taches où même du duvet
la laine ne poussera pas.
As a result of storing too much electric.de:
Da zu viel Strom gespeichert wird,
Es entwickelten sich sogar flaumige Stellen
Wolle wächst nicht.
As a result of storing too much electric.it:
A causa dell’immagazzinamento di troppa elettricità,
ha sviluppato macchie anche lanuginose
la lana non crescerà.
As a result of storing too much electric.pt-br:
Como resultado de armazenar muita eletricidade,
desenvolveu manchas onde até mesmo felpudo
a lã não crescerá.
As a result of storing too much electric.zh-tw:
由於儲存過多的電力，
它甚至出現了絨毛狀的斑塊
羊毛不會生長。

As Emolga flutters through the air, it c.en:
As Emolga flutters through the air, it crackles
with electricity. This Pokémon is cute, but it can
cause a lot of trouble.
As Emolga flutters through the air, it c.es:
Mientras Emolga revolotea en el aire, crepita
con electricidad. Este Pokémon es lindo, pero puede
causar muchos problemas.
As Emolga flutters through the air, it c.fr:
Alors qu'Emolga flotte dans les airs, elle crépite
avec l'électricité. Ce Pokémon est mignon, mais il peut
causer beaucoup de problèmes.
As Emolga flutters through the air, it c.pt-br:
Enquanto Emolga flutua no ar, ela estala
com eletricidade. Este Pokémon é fofo, mas pode
causar muitos problemas.
As Emolga flutters through the air, it c.zh-tw:
當 Emolga 在空中飄動時，它會發出劈啪聲
用電。這個神奇寶貝很可愛，但它可以
造成很多麻煩。
As Emolga flutters through the air, it c.it:
Mentre Emolga svolazza nell'aria, crepita
con l'elettricità. Questo Pokémon è carino, ma può farlo
causare molti problemi.
As Emolga flutters through the air, it c.de:
Während Emolga durch die Luft flattert, knistert es
mit Strom. Dieses Pokémon ist süß, aber es kann
eine Menge Ärger bereiten.

As it did more and more with its tail, i.en:
As it did more and more with its tail, its hands
became clumsy. It makes its nest high in
the treetops.
As it did more and more with its tail, i.fr:
Comme il le faisait de plus en plus avec sa queue, ses mains
est devenu maladroit. Il fait son nid en hauteur
la cime des arbres.
As it did more and more with its tail, i.es:
Como lo hacía cada vez más con su cola, sus manos
se volvió torpe. Hace su nido en lo alto
las copas de los árboles.
As it did more and more with its tail, i.zh-tw:
當它越來越多地用尾巴做事時，它的雙手
變得笨拙。它把巢築在高處
樹梢。
As it did more and more with its tail, i.pt-br:
À medida que fazia mais e mais com a cauda, as mãos
ficou desajeitado. Faz seu ninho no alto
as copas das árvores.
As it did more and more with its tail, i.it:
Come faceva sempre di più con la coda, con le mani
è diventato goffo. Fa il suo nido in alto
le cime degli alberi.
As it did more and more with its tail, i.de:
Wie es immer mehr mit seinem Schwanz und seinen Händen tat
wurde ungeschickt. Es baut sein Nest hoch oben
die Baumwipfel.

As it digs through the ground, it absorb.en:
As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many
hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
As it digs through the ground, it absorb.es:
Mientras excava en el suelo, absorbe muchos
objetos duros. Esto es lo que hace que su cuerpo sea tan sólido.
As it digs through the ground, it absorb.fr:
En creusant le sol, il absorbe beaucoup
objets durs. C'est ce qui rend son corps si solide.
As it digs through the ground, it absorb.zh-tw:
當它挖掘地面時，它吸收了許多
堅硬的物體。這就是它的身體如此堅固的原因。
As it digs through the ground, it absorb.pt-br:
À medida que escava o solo, absorve muitos
objetos duros. É isso que torna seu corpo tão sólido.
As it digs through the ground, it absorb.de:
Während es sich durch den Boden gräbt, nimmt es viele auf
harte Gegenstände. Das macht seinen Körper so robust.
As it digs through the ground, it absorb.it:
Mentre scava nel terreno, ne assorbe molti
oggetti duri. Questo è ciò che rende il suo corpo così solido.

As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench.en: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, attacks used by your Pokémon that evolve from Poliwhirl do +40 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench.es: Mientras este Pokémon esté en tu Banca, los ataques utilizados por tus Pokémon que evolucionan de Poliwhirl hacen +40 de daño al Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench.fr: Tant que ce Pokémon est sur votre Banc, les attaques utilisées par votre Pokémon évoluant à partir de Poliwhirl infligent +40 dégâts au Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench.de: Solange sich dieses Pokémon auf deiner Bank befindet, fügen Angriffe deines Pokémon, die sich aus Poliwhirl entwickeln, dem Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners +40 Schaden zu.
As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench.zh-tw: 只要這只神奇寶貝在你的替補席上，從波利旋進化而來的你的神奇寶貝使用的攻擊就會對對手的活躍神奇寶貝造成 +40 點傷害。
As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench.pt-br: Enquanto este Pokémon estiver no seu Banco, os ataques usados ​​pelos seus Pokémon que evoluem de Poliwhirl causarão +40 de dano ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.
As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench.it: Fintanto che questo Pokémon è nella tua panchina, gli attacchi usati dai tuoi Pokémon che si evolvono da Poliwhirl infliggono +40 danni al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.

At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on th.en:
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on the shores
of lakes. They announce their territorial claims by
letting out cries that sound like shouting.
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on th.es:
Al caer la noche, estos Pokémon aparecen en las costas.
de lagos. Anuncian sus reivindicaciones territoriales por
soltando gritos que suenan como gritos.
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on th.fr:
A la tombée de la nuit, ces Pokémon apparaissent sur les rivages
des lacs. Ils annoncent leurs revendications territoriales en
poussant des cris qui ressemblent à des cris.
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on th.it:
Al calar della notte, questi Pokémon appaiono sulle rive
dei laghi. Annunciano le loro rivendicazioni territoriali
emettendo grida che sembrano grida.
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on th.de:
Bei Einbruch der Dunkelheit erscheinen diese Pokémon an den Ufern
von Seen. Sie kündigen ihre Gebietsansprüche an
Schreie ausstoßen, die wie Schreien klingen.
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on th.zh-tw:
夜幕降臨時，這些神奇寶貝會出現在海岸上
湖泊。他們通過以下方式宣布領土主張
發出聽起來像喊叫的叫聲。
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on th.pt-br:
Ao anoitecer, esses Pokémon aparecem na costa
de lagos. Eles anunciam suas reivindicações territoriais
soltando gritos que parecem gritos.

Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucki.en:
Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucking in
water—it will soon attack by scattering the toxic
spikes that grow all over its body.
Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucki.es:
Ten cuidado si este Pokémon comienza a succionar
agua: pronto atacará dispersando el tóxico
púas que crecen por todo su cuerpo.
Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucki.it:
Fai attenzione se questo Pokémon inizia ad aspirare
acqua: presto attaccherà disperdendo le sostanze tossiche
spine che crescono su tutto il corpo.
Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucki.fr:
Soyez prudent si ce Pokémon commence à aspirer
l'eau - elle attaquera bientôt en dispersant les substances toxiques
des pointes qui poussent sur tout son corps.
Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucki.zh-tw:
如果這只神奇寶貝開始吸入，請小心
水——它很快就會通過散佈有毒物質進行攻擊
全身長出尖刺。
Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucki.pt-br:
Tenha cuidado se este Pokémon começar a sugar
água - em breve atacará, espalhando o tóxico
espinhos que crescem por todo o seu corpo.
Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucki.de:
Seien Sie vorsichtig, wenn dieses Pokémon anfängt einzusaugen
Wasser – es wird bald angreifen, indem es das Gift verstreut
Stacheln, die über den ganzen Körper wachsen.

Before battle, it turns its back on its.en:
Before battle, it turns its back on its opponent to
demonstrate how ferociously its fire blazes.
Before battle, it turns its back on its.es:
Antes de la batalla, le da la espalda a su oponente para
demostrar cuán ferozmente arde su fuego.
Before battle, it turns its back on its.fr:
Avant le combat, il tourne le dos à son adversaire pour
démontrer avec quelle férocité son feu flambe.
Before battle, it turns its back on its.pt-br:
Antes da batalha, ele vira as costas ao oponente para
demonstrar quão ferozmente seu fogo arde.
Before battle, it turns its back on its.de:
Vor dem Kampf wendet es seinem Gegner den Rücken zu
demonstrieren, wie heftig sein Feuer lodert.
Before battle, it turns its back on its.it:
Prima della battaglia volta le spalle al suo avversario
dimostrare quanto ferocemente divampa il suo fuoco.
Before battle, it turns its back on its.zh-tw:
戰鬥前，它會背對對手
展示它的火焰有多麼猛烈。

Born deep underground, this Pokémon\nbec.en:
Born deep underground, this Pokémon
becomes a pupa after eating enough
dirt to make a mountain.
Born deep underground, this Pokémon\nbec.es:
Nacido en las profundidades de la tierra, este Pokémon
se convierte en pupa después de comer lo suficiente
tierra para hacer una montaña.
Born deep underground, this Pokémon\nbec.it:
Nato nelle profondità del sottosuolo, questo Pokémon
diventa una pupa dopo aver mangiato abbastanza
terra per fare una montagna.
Born deep underground, this Pokémon\nbec.fr:
Né profondément sous terre, ce Pokémon
devient une pupe après avoir mangé suffisamment
terre pour faire une montagne.
Born deep underground, this Pokémon\nbec.de:
Dieses Pokémon wurde tief unter der Erde geboren
Wird nach ausreichender Nahrungsaufnahme zur Puppe
Dreck, um einen Berg zu machen.
Born deep underground, this Pokémon\nbec.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝出生在地下深處
吃飽後變成蛹
泥土可以造山。
Born deep underground, this Pokémon\nbec.pt-br:
Nascido nas profundezas do subsolo, este Pokémon
vira uma pupa depois de comer o suficiente
sujeira para fazer uma montanha.

Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep..en: Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep.
Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep..es: Ambos Pokémon Activos ahora están Dormidos.
Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep..fr: Les deux Pokémon actifs sont désormais endormis.
Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep..pt-br: Ambos os Pokémon ativos agora estão dormindo.
Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep..zh-tw: 兩隻活躍的神奇寶貝現在都睡著了。
Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep..it: Entrambi i Pokémon attivi ora sono addormentati.

Carrying food through Fearow's territory.en:
Carrying food through Fearow's territory is
dangerous. It will snatch the food away from
you in a flash!
Carrying food through Fearow's territory.fr:
Transporter de la nourriture à travers le territoire de Fearow est
dangereux. Il arrachera la nourriture des
vous en un éclair !
Carrying food through Fearow's territory.es:
Llevar comida a través del territorio de Fearow es
peligroso. Le arrebatará la comida
¡tú en un instante!
Carrying food through Fearow's territory.zh-tw:
通過費羅領地運送食物是
危險的。它會搶走食物
你在一瞬間！
Carrying food through Fearow's territory.it:
Trasportare il cibo attraverso il territorio di Fearow lo è
pericoloso. Strapperà via il cibo
tu in un lampo!
Carrying food through Fearow's territory.de:
Das Tragen von Lebensmitteln durch Fearows Territorium ist
gefährlich. Es wird das Essen wegreißen
Du im Handumdrehen!
Carrying food through Fearow's territory.pt-br:
Transportar comida pelo território de Fearow é
perigoso. Isso vai roubar a comida
você em um piscar de olhos!

Change the type of a random Energy attac.en: Change the type of a random Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon to 1 of the following at random: {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D}, or {M}.
Change the type of a random Energy attac.fr: Remplacez aléatoirement le type d'Énergie attachée au Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire par l'un des types suivants : {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D} ou {M}.
Change the type of a random Energy attac.de: Ändere den Typ einer zufälligen Energie, die an das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners angelegt ist, zufällig zu einem der folgenden: {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D} oder {M}.
Change the type of a random Energy attac.es: Cambia el tipo de Energía aleatoria unida al Pokémon Activo de tu rival a 1 de los siguientes al azar: {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D} o {M}.
Change the type of a random Energy attac.it: Cambia il tipo di un'Energia casuale assegnata al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario con una delle seguenti Energia casuale: {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D} o {M}.
Change the type of a random Energy attac.zh-tw: 將對手的活躍神奇寶貝所附帶的隨機能量類型隨機更改為以下其中一種：{G}、{R}、{W}、{L}、{P}、{F}、{D}或{M}。
Change the type of a random Energy attac.pt-br: Mude o tipo de Energia aleatória ligada ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente para 1 dos seguintes aleatoriamente: {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D} ou {M}.

Despite their elegant appearance, they c.en:
Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap
their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
Despite their elegant appearance, they c.fr:
Malgré leur aspect élégant, ils peuvent battre
leurs ailes sont fortes et volent sur des milliers de kilomètres.
Despite their elegant appearance, they c.es:
A pesar de su aspecto elegante, pueden aletear
sus alas con fuerza y vuelan miles de millas.
Despite their elegant appearance, they c.pt-br:
Apesar de sua aparência elegante, eles podem bater
suas asas fortemente e voam por milhares de quilômetros.
Despite their elegant appearance, they c.zh-tw:
儘管它們外表優雅，但它們可以拍打
它們的翅膀有力，飛翔千里。
Despite their elegant appearance, they c.it:
Nonostante il loro aspetto elegante, possono sbattere le ali
le loro ali fortemente e volano per migliaia di miglia.
Despite their elegant appearance, they c.de:
Trotz ihres eleganten Aussehens können sie flattern
Ihre Flügel sind stark und fliegen Tausende von Kilometern.

Discard a {R} Energy from your opponent'.en: Discard a {R} Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Discard a {R} Energy from your opponent'.fr: Défaussez une Énergie {R} du Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
Discard a {R} Energy from your opponent'.es: Descarta una Energía {R} del Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
Discard a {R} Energy from your opponent'.pt-br: Descarte uma Energia {R} do Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.
Discard a {R} Energy from your opponent'.zh-tw: 丟棄對手的活躍神奇寶貝的 {R} 能量。
Discard a {R} Energy from your opponent'.it: Scarta un'Energia {R} dal Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.
Discard a {R} Energy from your opponent'.de: Wirf eine {R}-Energie vom Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners ab.

Discard a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from.en: Discard a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from this Pokémon.
Discard a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from.es: Descarta una Energía {R}, {W} y {L} de este Pokémon.
Discard a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from.fr: Défaussez une Énergie {R}, {W} et {L} de ce Pokémon.
Discard a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from.zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的 {R}、{W} 和 {L} 能量。
Discard a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from.pt-br: Descarte uma energia {R}, {W} e {L} deste Pokémon.
Discard a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from.it: Scarta un'Energia {R}, {W} e {L} da questo Pokémon.
Discard a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from.de: Lege eine {R}-, {W}- und {L}-Energie von diesem Pokémon ab.

Discard a random Energy from among the E.en: Discard a random Energy from among the Energy attached to all Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).
Discard a random Energy from among the E.es: Descarta una Energía aleatoria de entre las Energías unidas a todos los Pokémon (tanto los tuyos como los de tu rival).
Discard a random Energy from among the E.fr: Défaussez une Énergie aléatoire parmi les Énergies attachées à tous les Pokémon (le vôtre et celui de votre adversaire).
Discard a random Energy from among the E.it: Scarta un'Energia casuale tra quelle assegnate a tutti i Pokémon (sia i tuoi che quelli del tuo avversario).
Discard a random Energy from among the E.zh-tw: 從所有神奇寶貝（你的和對手的）所附帶的能量中隨機丟棄一個能量。
Discard a random Energy from among the E.de: Lege eine zufällige Energie von der Energie ab, die an alle Pokémon (sowohl deines als auch die deines Gegners) angelegt ist.
Discard a random Energy from among the E.pt-br: Descarte uma Energia aleatória dentre as Energias ligadas a todos os Pokémon (seus e do seu oponente).

Draw cards until you have the same numbe.en: Draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent.
Draw cards until you have the same numbe.fr: Piochez des cartes jusqu'à ce que vous ayez le même nombre de cartes en main que votre adversaire.
Draw cards until you have the same numbe.zh-tw: 抽牌直到你的手牌數量與對手相同。
Draw cards until you have the same numbe.pt-br: Compre cartas até ter o mesmo número de cartas na mão que seu oponente.
Draw cards until you have the same numbe.es: Roba cartas hasta que tengas la misma cantidad de cartas en tu mano que tu oponente.
Draw cards until you have the same numbe.it: Pesca carte finché non hai lo stesso numero di carte in mano del tuo avversario.
Draw cards until you have the same numbe.de: Ziehe Karten, bis du die gleiche Anzahl Karten auf der Hand hast wie dein Gegner.

During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ge.en: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Gear Spinner attack does +70 damage.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ge.es: Durante tu próximo turno, el ataque Gear Spinner de este Pokémon hace +70 de daño.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ge.fr: Lors de votre prochain tour, l'attaque Gear Spinner de ce Pokémon inflige +70 dégâts.

During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ge.de: Während deines nächsten Zuges verursacht der Gear-Spinner-Angriff dieses Pokémon +70 Schaden.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ge.pt-br: Durante o seu próximo turno, o ataque Gear Spinner deste Pokémon causa +70 de dano.

During your opponent's next turn, all of.en: During your opponent's next turn, all of your Steelix and Skarmory ex take −50 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.
During your opponent's next turn, all of.fr: Lors du prochain tour de votre adversaire, tous vos ex Steelix et Airmure subissent -50 dégâts des attaques des Pokémon de votre adversaire.
During your opponent's next turn, all of.zh-tw: 在你對手的下一個回合中，你所有的鋼力克斯和斯卡莫里前體都會因對手神奇寶貝的攻擊而受到−50點傷害。
During your opponent's next turn, all of.de: Während des nächsten Zuges deines Gegners erleiden alle deine Steelix- und Skarmory-Ex-Spieler −50 Schaden durch Angriffe der Pokémon deines Gegners.
During your opponent's next turn, all of.es: Durante el próximo turno de tu oponente, todos tus Steelix y Skarmory ex reciben -50 de daño por ataques de los Pokémon de tu oponente.
During your opponent's next turn, all of.pt-br: Durante o próximo turno do seu oponente, todos os seus ex Steelix e Skarmory sofrem -50 de dano de ataques dos Pokémon do seu oponente.
During your opponent's next turn, all of.it: Durante il prossimo turno del tuo avversario, tutti i tuoi Steelix e Skarmory ex subiscono -50 danni dagli attacchi dei Pokémon del tuo avversario.

During your opponent's next turn, attack.it: Durante il prossimo turno del tuo avversario, gli attacchi usati dal Pokémon difensore costano 1 {C} in più.
During your opponent's next turn, attack.pt-br: Durante o próximo turno do seu oponente, os ataques usados ​​pelo Pokémon Defensor custarão 1 {C} a mais.
During your opponent's next turn, attack.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，防御神奇寶貝使用的攻擊額外花費 1 {C} 點。

During your opponent's next turn, attack.es: Durante el próximo turno de tu rival, los ataques utilizados por el Pokémon Defensor causan −20 de daño.
During your opponent's next turn, attack.fr: Lors du prochain tour de votre adversaire, les attaques utilisées par le Pokémon Défenseur infligent -20 dégâts.

Every night, it wanders around in search.en:
Every night, it wanders around in search of
prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing
threads before it bites into them with its fangs.
Every night, it wanders around in search.fr:
Chaque nuit, il erre à la recherche de
proie dont il retient les mouvements en vomissant
fils avant de les mordre avec ses crocs.
Every night, it wanders around in search.es:
Cada noche deambula en busca de
presa, cuyos movimientos restringe escupiendo
hilos antes de morderlos con sus colmillos.
Every night, it wanders around in search.zh-tw:
每天晚上，它都會四處遊蕩，尋找
獵物，通過噴吐來限制其行動
在它用尖牙咬住它們之前。
Every night, it wanders around in search.de:
Jede Nacht wandert es auf der Suche umher
Beute, deren Bewegungen es durch Ausstoßen einschränkt
Fäden, bevor es mit seinen Reißzähnen hineinbeißt.
Every night, it wanders around in search.it:
Ogni notte va in giro alla ricerca
preda, di cui frena i movimenti vomitando
fili prima di morderli con le zanne.
Every night, it wanders around in search.pt-br:
Todas as noites ele vagueia em busca de
presa, cujos movimentos ela restringe vomitando
fios antes de mordê-los com suas presas.

Evolution made it even more devious.\nIt.en:
Evolution made it even more devious.
It communicates by clawing signs in boulders.
Evolution made it even more devious.\nIt.es:
La evolución lo hizo aún más tortuoso.
Se comunica mediante señales de arañas en las rocas.
Evolution made it even more devious.\nIt.zh-tw:
進化使它變得更加狡猾。
它通過抓撓巨石上的標誌進行交流。
Evolution made it even more devious.\nIt.pt-br:
A evolução tornou tudo ainda mais tortuoso.
Ele se comunica arranhando sinais em pedras.
Evolution made it even more devious.\nIt.fr:
L'évolution l'a rendu encore plus sournois.
Il communique en griffant des signes dans les rochers.
Evolution made it even more devious.\nIt.it:
L'evoluzione lo ha reso ancora più subdolo.
Comunica artigliando segni nei massi.
Evolution made it even more devious.\nIt.de:
Die Evolution hat es noch verschlagener gemacht.
Es kommuniziert, indem es Zeichen in Felsbrocken kratzt.

Extremely strong, it can change the land.en:
Extremely strong, it can change the landscape.
It is so insolent that it doesn't care about others.
Extremely strong, it can change the land.fr:
Extrêmement puissant, il peut changer le paysage.
Il est tellement insolent qu'il ne se soucie pas des autres.
Extremely strong, it can change the land.es:
Extremadamente fuerte, puede cambiar el paisaje.
Es tan insolente que no le importan los demás.
Extremely strong, it can change the land.it:
Estremamente forte, può cambiare il paesaggio.
È così insolente che non si preoccupa degli altri.
Extremely strong, it can change the land.de:
Es ist extrem stark und kann die Landschaft verändern.
Es ist so unverschämt, dass es sich nicht um andere kümmert.
Extremely strong, it can change the land.zh-tw:
極其強大，可以改變地貌。
它太囂張了，根本不關心別人。
Extremely strong, it can change the land.pt-br:
Extremamente forte, pode mudar a paisagem.
É tão insolente que não se importa com os outros.

Feared and loathed by many, it is believ.en:
Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to
bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
Feared and loathed by many, it is believ.es:
Temido y odiado por muchos, se cree que
trae desgracia a todos los que la ven de noche.
Feared and loathed by many, it is believ.de:
Es wird angenommen, dass es von vielen gefürchtet und verabscheut wird
Bring Unglück über alle, die es nachts sehen.
Feared and loathed by many, it is believ.fr:
Craint et détesté par beaucoup, on pense qu'il
apportez le malheur à tous ceux qui le voient la nuit.
Feared and loathed by many, it is believ.it:
Si ritiene che sia temuto e odiato da molti
portare sfortuna a tutti coloro che lo vedono di notte.
Feared and loathed by many, it is believ.zh-tw:
人們相信它受到許多人的恐懼和厭惡
給夜間看到它的人帶來不幸。
Feared and loathed by many, it is believ.pt-br:
Temido e odiado por muitos, acredita-se que
traga infortúnio a todos aqueles que o vêem à noite.

Females are more sensitive to smells tha.en:
Females are more sensitive to smells than males.
While foraging, they'll use their whiskers to check
wind direction and stay downwind of predators.
Females are more sensitive to smells tha.es:
Las hembras son más sensibles a los olores que los machos.
Mientras buscan comida, usarán sus bigotes para comprobar
dirección del viento y mantenerse a favor del viento de los depredadores.
Females are more sensitive to smells tha.fr:
Les femelles sont plus sensibles aux odeurs que les mâles.
En cherchant de la nourriture, ils utiliseront leurs moustaches pour vérifier
direction du vent et rester sous le vent des prédateurs.
Females are more sensitive to smells tha.it:
Le femmine sono più sensibili agli odori rispetto ai maschi.
Mentre vanno in cerca di cibo, usano i baffi per controllare
direzione del vento e rimanere sottovento rispetto ai predatori.
Females are more sensitive to smells tha.zh-tw:
女性比男性對氣味更敏感。
覓食時，它們會用鬍鬚檢查
風向並保持捕食者的下風向。
Females are more sensitive to smells tha.pt-br:
As mulheres são mais sensíveis aos cheiros do que os homens.
Enquanto procuram alimentos, eles usam os bigodes para verificar
direção do vento e fique na direção do vento dos predadores.
Females are more sensitive to smells tha.de:
Weibchen reagieren empfindlicher auf Gerüche als Männchen.
Bei der Nahrungssuche nutzen sie ihre Schnurrhaare zur Kontrolle
Achten Sie auf die Windrichtung und bleiben Sie windabgewandt von Raubtieren.

Flip 3 coins. For each heads, a {W} Poké.es: Lanza 3 monedas. Por cada cara, se elige al azar un Pokémon {W} de tu pila de descartes y se pone en tu mano.

Flip 3 coins. For each heads, a {W} Poké.pt-br: Jogue 3 moedas. Para cada cara, um Pokémon {W} é escolhido aleatoriamente da sua pilha de descarte e colocado na sua mão.

Flip a coin until you get tails. This at.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda até obter coroa. Este ataque causa mais 40 danos para cada cabeça.

Flip a coin until you get tails. This at.de: Wirf eine Münze, bis du „Zahl“ erhältst. Dieser Angriff verursacht 40 weitere Schadenspunkte pro Kopf.

Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.en: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c'est face, lors du prochain tour de votre adversaire, prévenez tous les dégâts infligés à ce Pokémon par les attaques.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, durante el próximo turno de tu rival, evita todo el daño que los ataques le hagan a este Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se sair cara, durante o próximo turno do seu oponente, evite todos os danos causados ​​a este Pokémon por ataques.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面，則在對手的下一個回合中，阻止攻擊對該神奇寶貝造成的所有傷害。
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ verhindere im nächsten Zug deines Gegners jeglichen Schaden, der diesem Pokémon durch Angriffe zugefügt wird.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, durante il prossimo turno del tuo avversario, previeni tutti i danni inflitti a questo Pokémon dagli attacchi.

Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.en: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, durante il prossimo turno del tuo avversario, previeni tutti i danni e gli effetti degli attacchi inflitti a questo Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c'est face, lors du prochain tour de votre adversaire, prévenez tous les dégâts et effets des attaques infligées à ce Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, durante el próximo turno de tu rival, evita todo el daño y los efectos de los ataques realizados a este Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se sair cara, durante o próximo turno do seu oponente, evite todos os danos e efeitos de ataques feitos a este Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面朝上，則在對手的下一回合中，阻止對該神奇寶貝造成的所有攻擊傷害及其效果。
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ verhindere im nächsten Zug deines Gegners jeglichen Schaden und alle Auswirkungen von Angriffen, die diesem Pokémon zugefügt werden.

Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.en: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c'est face, le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Paralysé. Si c'est pile, le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Confus.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, el Pokémon Activo de tu rival pasa a estar Paralizado. Si sale cruz, el Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora está Confundido.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面，則對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在處於麻痺狀態。如果出現反面，則對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在處於混亂狀態。
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, o Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente ficará Paralisado. Se sair coroa, o Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente ficará Confuso.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è paralizzato. Se esce croce, il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è confuso.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ ist das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners jetzt gelähmt. Bei „Zahl“ ist das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners jetzt verwirrt.

Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.en: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon's remaining HP is now 10.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, los HP restantes del Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora son 10.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c'est face, les PV restants du Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire sont désormais de 10.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果出現正面，則對手的活躍神奇寶貝的剩餘生命值現在為 10。
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, i PS rimanenti del Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario diventano 10.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ betragen die verbleibenden HP des Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners jetzt 10.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, o HP restante do Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente será agora 10.
