Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 random.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c'est pile, défaussez 2 Énergies aléatoires de ce Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 random.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Zahl“ wirf 2 zufällige Energien von diesem Pokémon ab.
Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 random.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果出現反面，則丟棄該神奇寶貝的 2 個隨機能量。
Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 random.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cruz, descarta 2 Energías aleatorias de este Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 random.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se sair coroa, descarte 2 Energias aleatórias deste Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 random.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce croce, scarta due Energie casuali assegnate a questo Pokémon.

Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does.en: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c’est pile, cette attaque ne fait rien. Si c'est face, lors du prochain tour de votre adversaire, prévenez tous les dégâts et effets des attaques infligées à ce Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cruz, este ataque no hace nada. Si sale cara, durante el próximo turno de tu rival, evita todo el daño y los efectos de los ataques realizados a este Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Zahl“ bewirkt dieser Angriff nichts. Bei „Kopf“ verhindere im nächsten Zug deines Gegners jeglichen Schaden und alle Auswirkungen von Angriffen, die diesem Pokémon zugefügt werden.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se der coroa, este ataque não faz nada. Se sair cara, durante o próximo turno do seu oponente, evite todos os danos e efeitos de ataques feitos a este Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce croce, questo attacco non ha alcun effetto. Se esce testa, durante il prossimo turno del tuo avversario, previeni tutti i danni e gli effetti degli attacchi inflitti a questo Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果是反面，則此攻擊不會執行任何操作。如果正面朝上，則在對手的下一回合中，阻止對該神奇寶貝造成的所有攻擊傷害及其效果。

For each of your {F} Pokémon in play, lo.en: For each of your {F} Pokémon in play, look at that many cards from the top of your deck and put them back in any order.
For each of your {F} Pokémon in play, lo.fr: Pour chacun de vos {F} Pokémon en jeu, regardez autant de cartes du dessus de votre deck et remettez-les dans n'importe quel ordre.
For each of your {F} Pokémon in play, lo.it: Per ciascuno dei tuoi Pokémon {F} in gioco, guarda quel numero di carte dalla cima del tuo mazzo e rimettile a posto nell'ordine che preferisci.
For each of your {F} Pokémon in play, lo.es: Para cada uno de tus Pokémon {F} en juego, mira esa cantidad de cartas de la parte superior de tu mazo y colócalas de nuevo en cualquier orden.
For each of your {F} Pokémon in play, lo.zh-tw: 對於場上的每隻 {F} 神奇寶貝，查看牌組頂部的相應數量的卡牌，然後將它們按任意順序放回原處。
For each of your {F} Pokémon in play, lo.de: Sieh dir für jedes deiner {F} Pokémon im Spiel die entsprechende Anzahl an Karten oben in deinem Deck an und lege sie in beliebiger Reihenfolge zurück.
For each of your {F} Pokémon in play, lo.pt-br: Para cada um dos seus {F} Pokémon em jogo, olhe aquela quantidade de cartas do topo do seu baralho e coloque-as de volta em qualquer ordem.

From its spikes, it launches powerful bl.en:
From its spikes, it launches powerful blasts of
electricity. Its red core contains an enormous
amount of energy.
From its spikes, it launches powerful bl.es:
Desde sus púas, lanza poderosas ráfagas de
electricidad. Su núcleo rojo contiene una enorme
cantidad de energía.
From its spikes, it launches powerful bl.fr:
Depuis ses pointes, il lance de puissantes explosions de
électricité. Son noyau rouge contient un énorme
quantité d'énergie.
From its spikes, it launches powerful bl.zh-tw:
它從它的尖刺中發射出強大的爆炸
電力。它的紅色核心含有巨大的
能量量。
From its spikes, it launches powerful bl.it:
Dalle sue punte lancia potenti esplosioni di
elettricità. Il suo nucleo rosso contiene un enorme
quantità di energia.
From its spikes, it launches powerful bl.de:
Von seinen Stacheln aus feuert es mächtige Schüsse ab
Strom. Sein roter Kern enthält eine enorme Menge
Menge an Energie.
From its spikes, it launches powerful bl.pt-br:
Dos seus espinhos, ele lança rajadas poderosas de
eletricidade. Seu núcleo vermelho contém uma enorme
quantidade de energia.

Girafarig's tail has a small head. It in.en:
Girafarig's tail has a small head. It instinctively
bites at any foe that approaches the Pokémon
from behind.
Girafarig's tail has a small head. It in.fr:
La queue de Girafarig a une petite tête. C'est instinctivement
mord tout ennemi qui s'approche du Pokémon
par derrière.
Girafarig's tail has a small head. It in.es:
La cola de Girafarig tiene una cabeza pequeña. Instintivamente
muerde a cualquier enemigo que se acerque al Pokémon
desde atrás.
Girafarig's tail has a small head. It in.it:
La coda di Girafarig ha una testa piccola. È istintivo
morde qualsiasi nemico che si avvicina al Pokémon
da dietro.
Girafarig's tail has a small head. It in.de:
Girafarigs Schwanz hat einen kleinen Kopf. Es instinktiv
beißt jeden Gegner an, der sich dem Pokémon nähert
von hinten.
Girafarig's tail has a small head. It in.zh-tw:
吉拉法里格的尾巴有一個小頭。它本能地
咬住任何接近神奇寶貝的敵人
從後面。
Girafarig's tail has a small head. It in.pt-br:
A cauda do Girafarig tem uma cabeça pequena. Instintivamente
morde qualquer inimigo que se aproxime do Pokémon
por trás.

Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.en: Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.
Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.de: Heile 20 Schadenspunkte bei jedem deiner Pokémon.
Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.es: Cura 20 daños de cada uno de tus Pokémon.
Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.fr: Soignez 20 dégâts de chacun de vos Pokémon.
Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.zh-tw: 治療每隻神奇寶貝造成的 20 點傷害。
Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.it: Cura 20 danni da ciascuno dei tuoi Pokémon.
Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.pt-br: Cure 20 pontos de dano de cada um dos seus Pokémon.

Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that gr.en:
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows
nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this
Pokémon's true appearance remains a mystery.
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that gr.es:
Escondido debajo de una maraña de enredaderas que crece
sin parar incluso si las enredaderas son arrancadas, esto
La verdadera apariencia de Pokémon sigue siendo un misterio.
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that gr.fr:
Caché sous un enchevêtrement de vignes qui poussent
non-stop même si les vignes sont arrachées, cela
La véritable apparence de Pokémon reste un mystère.
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that gr.de:
Versteckt unter einem Gewirr von Weinreben, das wächst
ununterbrochen, auch wenn die Reben abgerissen werden
Das wahre Aussehen des Pokémon bleibt ein Rätsel.
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that gr.it:
Nascosto sotto un groviglio di viti che cresce
senza sosta anche se le viti vengono strappate, questo
Il vero aspetto dei Pokémon rimane un mistero.
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that gr.pt-br:
Escondido sob um emaranhado de vinhas que cresce
sem parar, mesmo que as vinhas sejam arrancadas, isso
A verdadeira aparência do Pokémon permanece um mistério.
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that gr.zh-tw:
隱藏在生長的藤蔓下面
即使藤蔓被扯斷也不停歇，這
神奇寶貝的真實面貌仍然是個謎。

Horsea makes its home in oceans with gen.en:
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle
currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits
out pitch-black ink and escapes.
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gen.fr:
Horsea s'installe dans les océans avec la douceur
courants. Si ce Pokémon est attaqué, il crache
sort de l'encre noire et s'échappe.
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gen.es:
Horsea hace su hogar en los océanos con suave
corrientes. Si este Pokémon está siendo atacado, escupe
Sale tinta negra como boca de lobo y se escapa.
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gen.it:
Horsea vive negli oceani con delicatezza
correnti. Se questo Pokémon è sotto attacco, sputa
esce inchiostro nero come la pece e fugge.
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gen.de:
Horsea ist sanft in den Ozeanen zu Hause
Strömungen. Wenn dieses Pokémon angegriffen wird, spuckt es
pechschwarze Tinte und Fluchten ausstoßen.
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gen.pt-br:
Horsea faz seu lar nos oceanos com suaves
correntes. Se este Pokémon estiver sob ataque, ele cospe
tinta preta como breu e escapa.
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gen.zh-tw:
Horsea 以溫和的方式在海洋中安家
電流。如果這只神奇寶貝受到攻擊，它會吐口水
流出漆黑的墨水並逃脫。

If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay d.en: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.
If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay d.es: Si 1 de tus Pokémon usó Sweets Relay durante tu último turno, este ataque hace 20 daños más.
If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay d.zh-tw: 如果你的 1 個神奇寶貝在你的最後回合中使用了糖果接力，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 20 點。
If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay d.de: Wenn eines deiner Pokémon in deinem letzten Zug „Sweet Relay“ verwendet hat, fügt dieser Angriff 20 weitere Schadenspunkte zu.
If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay d.fr: Si 1 de vos Pokémon a utilisé Relais Bonbons lors de votre dernier tour, cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts supplémentaires.
If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay d.it: Se 1 dei tuoi Pokémon ha utilizzato Sweets Relay durante il tuo ultimo turno, questo attacco infligge 20 danni in più.
If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay d.pt-br: Se 1 dos seus Pokémon usou Sweets Relay durante seu último turno, este ataque causará 20 danos a mais.

If any damage is done to this Pokémon by.en: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.
If any damage is done to this Pokémon by.es: Si los ataques le hacen algún daño a este Pokémon, lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, evite ese daño.
If any damage is done to this Pokémon by.fr: Si des dégâts sont infligés à ce Pokémon par des attaques, lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c’est face, évitez ces dégâts.
If any damage is done to this Pokémon by.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝受到攻擊造成的傷害，則擲硬幣。如果是正面，請防止損壞。
If any damage is done to this Pokémon by.pt-br: Se algum dano for causado a este Pokémon por ataques, jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, evite esse dano.
If any damage is done to this Pokémon by.it: Se gli attacchi infliggono danni a questo Pokémon, lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, previeni il danno.
If any damage is done to this Pokémon by.de: Wenn diesem Pokémon durch Angriffe Schaden zugefügt wird, wirf eine Münze. Wenn Köpfe, verhindern Sie diesen Schaden.

If exposed to moonlight, it starts to mo.en:
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move.
It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to mo.es:
Si se expone a la luz de la luna, comienza a moverse.
De noche deambula por todas partes para esparcir sus semillas.
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to mo.fr:
S'il est exposé au clair de lune, il commence à bouger.
Il se promène la nuit pour disperser ses graines.
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to mo.it:
Se esposto alla luce lunare, inizia a muoversi.
Vaga in lungo e in largo di notte per spargere i suoi semi.
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to mo.zh-tw:
如果暴露在月光下，它就會開始移動。
它在夜間四處遊蕩以傳播種子。
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to mo.pt-br:
Se exposto ao luar, ele começa a se mover.
Ele vagueia por toda parte à noite para espalhar suas sementes.
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to mo.de:
Wenn es dem Mondlicht ausgesetzt wird, beginnt es sich zu bewegen.
Nachts zieht es weit und breit umher, um seine Samen zu verteilen.

If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on.en:
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back
stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on.es:
Si carga contra un enemigo, los pelos de su espalda
párate derecho. Es muy sensible al sonido.
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on.fr:
S'il charge un ennemi, les poils sur son dos
tenez-vous droit. Il est très sensible au son.
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on.it:
Se carica un nemico, i peli sulla sua schiena
stare dritto. È molto sensibile al suono.
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on.de:
Wenn es auf einen Feind zustürmt, fallen ihm die Haare auf dem Rücken weg
steh aufrecht. Es ist sehr geräuschempfindlich.
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on.pt-br:
Se atacar um inimigo, os pelos das costas
fique em pé. É muito sensível ao som.
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on.zh-tw:
如果它沖向敵人，它背上的毛
站直。它對聲音非常敏感。

If it loses a fang, a new one grows back.en:
If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its
place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.
If it loses a fang, a new one grows back.es:
Si pierde un colmillo, le vuelve a crecer uno nuevo.
lugar. Siempre hay 48 colmillos recubriendo su boca.
If it loses a fang, a new one grows back.fr:
S'il perd un croc, un nouveau repousse dans son
lieu. Il y a toujours 48 crocs qui bordent sa bouche.
If it loses a fang, a new one grows back.it:
Se perde una zanna, ne ricresce una nuova
posto. Ci sono sempre 48 zanne nella sua bocca.
If it loses a fang, a new one grows back.zh-tw:
如果它失去了一顆獠牙，新的獠牙就會長出來
地方。它的嘴裡總是有48顆尖牙。
If it loses a fang, a new one grows back.de:
Verliert es einen Fangzahn, wächst ein neuer nach
Ort. In seinem Maul sind immer 48 Reißzähne zu sehen.
If it loses a fang, a new one grows back.pt-br:
Se perder uma presa, uma nova crescerá novamente em seu
lugar. Sempre há 48 presas em sua boca.

If its face gets even slightly dirty, Sm.en:
If its face gets even slightly dirty, Smoochum will
bathe immediately. But if its body gets dirty,
Smoochum doesn't really seem to care.
If its face gets even slightly dirty, Sm.es:
Si su cara se ensucia aunque sea un poco, Smoochum
bañarse inmediatamente. Pero si su cuerpo se ensucia,
A Smoochum realmente no parece importarle.
If its face gets even slightly dirty, Sm.fr:
Si son visage devient ne serait-ce que légèrement sale, Smoochum le fera
baignez-vous immédiatement. Mais si son corps se salit,
Smoochum ne semble pas vraiment s'en soucier.
If its face gets even slightly dirty, Sm.it:
Se la sua faccia si sporca anche leggermente, Smoochum lo farà
fare subito il bagno. Ma se il suo corpo si sporca,
A Smoochum non sembra importare davvero.
If its face gets even slightly dirty, Sm.zh-tw:
如果它的臉稍微臟一點，Smoochum 就會
立即洗澡。但如果它的身體髒了，
Smoochum 似乎並不真正關心。
If its face gets even slightly dirty, Sm.pt-br:
Se seu rosto ficar um pouco sujo, Smoochum irá
tome banho imediatamente. Mas se o seu corpo ficar sujo,
Smoochum realmente não parece se importar.
If its face gets even slightly dirty, Sm.de:
Wenn sein Gesicht auch nur ein wenig schmutzig wird, wird Knutschfleck das tun
sofort baden. Aber wenn sein Körper schmutzig wird,
Smoochum scheint das eigentlich egal zu sein.

If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot tha.en:
If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything
that touches it will instantly go up in flames.
If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot tha.es:
Si su furia alcanza su punto máximo, se vuelve tan caliente que cualquier cosa
que lo toque arderá instantáneamente en llamas.
If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot tha.fr:
Si sa rage atteint son paroxysme, il devient si chaud que tout
qui le touche s’enflammera instantanément.
If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot tha.zh-tw:
如果它的憤怒達到頂峰，它會變得如此灼熱，以至於任何東西
觸碰到它就會立刻燃燒起來。
If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot tha.it:
Se la sua rabbia raggiunge il picco, diventa così caldo che qualsiasi cosa
chi lo tocca andrà immediatamente in fiamme.
If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot tha.de:
Wenn seine Wut ihren Höhepunkt erreicht, wird es so heiß, dass nichts mehr passiert
Wer es berührt, geht sofort in Flammen auf.
If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot tha.pt-br:
Se a sua raiva atingir o pico, fica tão quente que qualquer coisa
que o tocar irá pegar fogo instantaneamente.

If static electricity builds in its body.en:
If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece
doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.
If static electricity builds in its body.fr:
Si de l'électricité statique s'accumule dans son corps, sa toison
double de volume. Le toucher vous choquera.
If static electricity builds in its body.es:
Si se acumula electricidad estática en su cuerpo, su vellón
duplica su volumen. Tocarlo te sorprenderá.
If static electricity builds in its body.it:
Se l'elettricità statica si accumula nel suo corpo, il suo vello
raddoppia di volume. Toccarlo ti sconvolgerà.
If static electricity builds in its body.de:
Wenn sich in seinem Körper statische Elektrizität aufbaut, entsteht ein Fell
verdoppelt sich das Volumen. Wenn Sie es berühren, werden Sie schockiert sein.
If static electricity builds in its body.pt-br:
Se a eletricidade estática se acumular em seu corpo, seu velo
dobra de volume. Tocá-lo irá chocá-lo.
If static electricity builds in its body.zh-tw:
如果靜電在它的體內積聚，它的羊毛
體積加倍。觸摸它會讓你震驚。

If the {D} Pokémon this card is attached.en: If the {D} Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.
If the {D} Pokémon this card is attached.fr: Si le Pokémon {D} auquel cette carte est attachée se trouve dans le Point Actif et est endommagé par une attaque du Pokémon de votre adversaire, votre adversaire révèle une carte aléatoire de sa main et la mélange dans son deck.
If the {D} Pokémon this card is attached.es: Si el Pokémon {D} al que está unida esta carta está en el Punto Activo y es dañado por un ataque del Pokémon de tu oponente, tu oponente muestra una carta aleatoria de su mano y la baraja en su mazo.
If the {D} Pokémon this card is attached.pt-br: Se o Pokémon {D} ao qual esta carta está ligada estiver no Ponto Ativo e for danificado por um ataque dos Pokémon do seu oponente, seu oponente revela uma carta aleatória da própria mão e a embaralha no próprio baralho.
If the {D} Pokémon this card is attached.zh-tw: 這張卡所附著的 {D} 寶可夢在活躍區並因對手寶可夢的攻擊而受到傷害時，對手從手牌中隨機展示 1 張卡，並將其洗入卡組。
If the {D} Pokémon this card is attached.de: Wenn sich das {D}-Pokémon, an das diese Karte angelegt ist, an der aktiven Stelle befindet und durch einen Angriff des Pokémon deines Gegners beschädigt wird, deckt dein Gegner eine zufällige Karte aus seiner Hand auf und mischt sie in sein Deck.
If the {D} Pokémon this card is attached.it: Se il Pokémon {D} a cui è assegnata questa carta è in posizione attiva e viene danneggiato da un attacco dei Pokémon del tuo avversario, il tuo avversario rivela una carta a caso dalla sua mano e la mischia nel suo mazzo.

If the Defending Pokémon tries to use an.en: If the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen. This effect lasts until the Defending Pokémon leaves the Active Spot, and it doesn't stack.
If the Defending Pokémon tries to use an.es: Si el Pokémon Defensor intenta usar un ataque, tu oponente lanza una moneda. Si sale cruz, ese ataque no ocurre. Este efecto dura hasta que el Pokémon Defensor abandona el Punto Activo y no se acumula.
If the Defending Pokémon tries to use an.fr: Si le Pokémon défenseur tente d'utiliser une attaque, votre adversaire lance une pièce. Si c'est pile, cette attaque n'a pas lieu. Cet effet dure jusqu'à ce que le Pokémon défenseur quitte le point actif, et il ne se cumule pas.
If the Defending Pokémon tries to use an.it: Se il Pokémon difensore tenta di usare un attacco, il tuo avversario lancia una moneta. Se esce croce, l'attacco non avviene. Questo effetto dura finché il Pokémon difensore non lascia il punto attivo e non si accumula.
If the Defending Pokémon tries to use an.de: Wenn das verteidigende Pokémon versucht, einen Angriff auszuführen, wirft dein Gegner eine Münze. Bei „Zahl“ findet dieser Angriff nicht statt. Dieser Effekt hält an, bis das verteidigende Pokémon die aktive Position verlässt, und ist nicht stapelbar.
If the Defending Pokémon tries to use an.zh-tw: 如果防守的神奇寶貝嘗試使用攻擊，你的對手會擲硬幣。如果是反面，則不會發生該攻擊。該效果會持續到防御寶可夢離開活動區域為止，並且不會疊加。
If the Defending Pokémon tries to use an.pt-br: Se o Pokémon Defensor tentar usar um ataque, seu oponente jogará uma moeda. Se der coroa, esse ataque não acontece. Este efeito dura até o Pokémon Defensor sair do Ponto Ativo e não se acumula.

If the Pokémon this card is attached to.en: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, put it into your hand instead of the discard pile.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.es: Si el Pokémon al que está unida esta carta queda fuera de combate por el daño de un ataque del Pokémon de tu rival, ponlo en tu mano en lugar de en la pila de descarte.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.zh-tw: 這張卡所附著的寶可夢因對方寶可夢的攻擊而被擊倒的場合，將其放入手牌而不是棄牌堆。
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.fr: Si le Pokémon auquel cette carte est attachée est mis KO par les dégâts d'une attaque du Pokémon de votre adversaire, mettez-le dans votre main au lieu de la pile de défausse.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.it: Se il Pokémon a cui è assegnata questa carta viene messo KO dai danni di un attacco dei Pokémon del tuo avversario, aggiungilo alla tua mano invece che alla pila degli scarti.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.de: Wenn das Pokémon, an das diese Karte angelegt ist, durch den Schaden eines Angriffs des Pokémon deines Gegners kampfunfähig gemacht wird, nimm es auf deine Hand und nicht auf den Ablagestapel.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.pt-br: Se o Pokémon ao qual esta carta está ligada for Nocauteado pelo dano de um ataque dos Pokémon do seu oponente, coloque-o na sua mão em vez de na pilha de descarte.

If this Pokémon evolved during this turn.en: If this Pokémon evolved during this turn, this attack does 20 more damage.
If this Pokémon evolved during this turn.fr: Si ce Pokémon a évolué durant ce tour, cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts supplémentaires.
If this Pokémon evolved during this turn.it: Se questo Pokémon si è evoluto durante questo turno, questo attacco infligge 20 danni in più.
If this Pokémon evolved during this turn.es: Si este Pokémon evolucionó durante este turno, este ataque hace 20 puntos de daño más.
If this Pokémon evolved during this turn.de: Wenn sich dieses Pokémon in diesem Zug weiterentwickelt hat, fügt dieser Angriff 20 weitere Schadenspunkte zu.
If this Pokémon evolved during this turn.zh-tw: 如果這只寶可夢在本回合中進化，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 20 點。
If this Pokémon evolved during this turn.pt-br: Se este Pokémon evoluiu durante este turno, este ataque causará 20 danos a mais.

If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attac.en: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, attacks used by this Pokémon cost 1 less {G} Energy.
If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attac.fr: Si ce Pokémon est équipé d'un Outil Pokémon, les attaques utilisées par ce Pokémon coûtent 1 {G} Énergie de moins.
If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attac.de: Wenn an dieses Pokémon ein Pokémon-Werkzeug angelegt ist, kosten Angriffe dieses Pokémon 1 {G}-Energie weniger.
If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attac.es: Si este Pokémon tiene una Herramienta Pokémon adjunta, los ataques utilizados por este Pokémon cuestan 1 {G} de Energía menos.

you don't clean it off, an intense itch will set in.
The itch won't go away, either.

Si la saliva pegajosa de este Pokémon te toca y
Si no lo limpias, aparecerá una picazón intensa.

si vous ne le nettoyez pas, une démangeaison intense s'installera.
Les démangeaisons ne disparaîtront pas non plus.

如果這只神奇寶貝的粘稠唾液沾到你身上
如果你不把它清理乾淨，就會出現劇烈的瘙癢。

Wenn Sie es nicht reinigen, stellt sich ein starker Juckreiz ein.
Auch der Juckreiz wird nicht verschwinden.

A coceira também não vai embora.

boca, a dor nunca irá embora.

manner, but it comes to a complete stop when

Durante el día, corre de un modo frenético.
manera, pero se detiene por completo cuando

Le jour, il se précipite de manière trépidante
manière, mais il s'arrête complètement lorsque

白天，它忙碌地奔波
方式，但當它完全停止時

Durante o dia, ele corre em uma agitação

modo, ma si ferma completamente quando

Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,.en:
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated,
and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000
degrees Fahrenheit.
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,.es:
El aire inhalado es llevado a su saco de llamas, calentado,
y exhala como fuego que alcanza más de 3.000
grados Fahrenheit.
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,.fr:
L'air inhalé est transporté vers son sac de flamme, chauffé,
et exhalé comme un feu qui atteint plus de 3 000
degrés Fahrenheit.
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,.it:

ed esalato come un fuoco che arriva a oltre 3.000
gradi Fahrenheit.
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,.zh-tw:

呼出的火焰達到3000多
華氏度。
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,.pt-br:

Grad Fahrenheit.

It always stands on one foot. It changes.en:
It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so
fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
It always stands on one foot. It changes.de:
Es steht immer auf einem Bein. Es verändert die Füße so
schnell, die Bewegung ist selten zu sehen.
It always stands on one foot. It changes.es:
Siempre se apoya en un pie. Cambia de pie así
rápido, el movimiento rara vez se puede ver.
It always stands on one foot. It changes.fr:
Il se tient toujours sur un pied. Ça change de pied donc
rapide, le mouvement est rarement visible.
It always stands on one foot. It changes.it:
Sta sempre su un piede. Cambia piede così
veloce, il movimento raramente può essere visto.
It always stands on one foot. It changes.zh-tw:
它總是用一隻腳站立。它改變腳所以
速度很快，很難看到動靜。
It always stands on one foot. It changes.pt-br:
Ele sempre fica em um pé só. Ele muda os pés então
rápido, o movimento raramente pode ser visto.

It becomes wildly furious if it even sen.en:
It becomes wildly furious if it even senses
someone looking at it. It chases anyone
that meets its glare.
It becomes wildly furious if it even sen.es:
Se vuelve salvajemente furioso si siquiera siente
alguien mirándolo. persigue a cualquiera
que se encuentra con su resplandor.
It becomes wildly furious if it even sen.fr:
Il devient extrêmement furieux s'il sent seulement
quelqu'un qui le regarde. Il poursuit n'importe qui
qui rencontre son éclat.
It becomes wildly furious if it even sen.pt-br:
Fica extremamente furioso se sentir
alguém olhando para isso. Ele persegue qualquer um
que encontra seu brilho.
It becomes wildly furious if it even sen.it:
Diventa selvaggiamente furioso anche solo se percepisce
qualcuno lo guarda. Insegue chiunque
che incontra il suo splendore.
It becomes wildly furious if it even sen.zh-tw:
如果它感覺到的話，它就會變得非常憤怒
有人看著它。它追趕任何人
遇到它的眩光。
It becomes wildly furious if it even sen.de:
Es wird wild wütend, wenn es überhaupt etwas spürt
jemand, der es betrachtet. Es jagt jeden

It carries food all day long. There are.en:
It carries food all day long. There are tales about
lost people who were saved by the food it had.
It carries food all day long. There are.fr:
Il transporte de la nourriture toute la journée. Il y a des histoires sur
des personnes perdues qui ont été sauvées grâce à la nourriture dont elle disposait.

Lleva comida todo el día. Hay cuentos sobre
personas perdidas que fueron salvadas por la comida que tenía.
It carries food all day long. There are.it:
Trasporta cibo tutto il giorno. Ci sono storie su
persone perse che furono salvate dal cibo che aveva.

它整天攜帶食物。有一些關於

Es trägt den ganzen Tag über Nahrung. Es gibt Geschichten darüber

It concentrates the weak electric charge.en:
It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted
by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.
It concentrates the weak electric charge.it:
Concentra le deboli cariche elettriche emesse
dalle sue cellule e lancia fulmini malvagi.
It concentrates the weak electric charge.fr:
Il concentre les faibles charges électriques émises
par ses cellules et lance de méchants éclairs.
It concentrates the weak electric charge.es:
Concentra las débiles cargas eléctricas emitidas.
por sus células y lanza malvados relámpagos.
It concentrates the weak electric charge.zh-tw:
它集中發射的微弱電荷
通過它的細胞並發射邪惡的閃電。
It concentrates the weak electric charge.pt-br:
Ele concentra as cargas elétricas fracas emitidas
por suas células e lança relâmpagos perversos.
It concentrates the weak electric charge.de:
Es konzentriert die emittierten schwachen elektrischen Ladungen
durch seine Zellen und feuert böse Blitze ab.

It creates mazes in dark locations. When.en:
It creates mazes in dark locations. When spotted,
it flees into the ground by digging with its tail.
It creates mazes in dark locations. When.fr:
Cela crée des labyrinthes dans des endroits sombres. Une fois repéré,
il s'enfuit dans le sol en creusant avec sa queue.
It creates mazes in dark locations. When.it:
Crea labirinti in luoghi bui. Quando avvistato,
fugge nel terreno scavando con la coda.
It creates mazes in dark locations. When.es:
Crea laberintos en lugares oscuros. Cuando se ve,
huye al suelo cavando con la cola.
It creates mazes in dark locations. When.de:
Es schafft Labyrinthe an dunklen Orten. Wenn entdeckt,
Es flüchtet in den Boden, indem es mit seinem Schwanz gräbt.
It creates mazes in dark locations. When.zh-tw:
它在黑暗的地方創造迷宮。當被發現時，
它用尾巴挖洞逃入地下。
It creates mazes in dark locations. When.pt-br:

ele foge para o chão cavando com a cauda.

It derives its power from fire burning i.en:
It derives its power from fire burning inside
its body. If the fire dwindles, this Pokémon will
immediately fall asleep.
It derives its power from fire burning i.es:
Obtiene su poder del fuego que arde en su interior.
su cuerpo. Si el fuego disminuye, este Pokémon
quedarse dormido inmediatamente.
It derives its power from fire burning i.fr:
Il tire son pouvoir du feu qui brûle à l'intérieur
son corps. Si le feu diminue, ce Pokémon
s'endormir immédiatement.
It derives its power from fire burning i.it:
Deriva il suo potere dal fuoco che brucia all'interno
il suo corpo. Se il fuoco diminuisce, questo Pokémon lo farà
addormentarsi immediatamente.
It derives its power from fire burning i.de:
Seine Kraft bezieht es aus dem Feuer, das im Inneren brennt
sein Körper. Wenn das Feuer nachlässt, wird dieses Pokémon es tun
sofort einschlafen.
It derives its power from fire burning i.pt-br:
Seu poder deriva do fogo queimando dentro
seu corpo. Se o fogo diminuir, este Pokémon irá
adormecer imediatamente.
It derives its power from fire burning i.zh-tw:
它的力量來自於內部燃燒的火焰
它的身體。如果火勢減弱，這只神奇寶貝將會
立即入睡。

It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth.en:
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check
its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies
around with skill.
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth.fr:
Il émet des ondes ultrasonores depuis sa bouche pour vérifier
ses environs. Même dans les grottes étroites, Zubat vole
autour avec habileté.
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth.es:
Emite ondas ultrasónicas desde su boca para comprobar
sus alrededores. Incluso en cuevas estrechas, Zubat vuela
alrededor con habilidad.
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth.it:
Emette onde ultrasoniche dalla bocca per controllare
i suoi dintorni. Anche nelle caverne strette, Zubat vola
in giro con abilità.
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth.de:
Zur Überprüfung sendet es Ultraschallwellen aus seinem Mund aus
seine Umgebung. Selbst in engen Höhlen fliegt Zubat
mit Geschick herumlaufen.
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth.zh-tw:
它從嘴裡發射超聲波來檢查
它的周圍環境。即使在狹窄的洞穴中，祖巴特也會飛翔
周圍有技巧。
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth.pt-br:
Ele emite ondas ultrassônicas de sua boca para verificar
seu entorno. Mesmo em cavernas apertadas, Zubat voa
por aí com habilidade.

It grows close to others easily and is a.en:
It grows close to others easily and is also easily
spoiled. The disparity between its face and its
actions makes many young people wild about it.
It grows close to others easily and is a.es:
Se acerca fácilmente a los demás y también es fácilmente
estropeado. La disparidad entre su rostro y su
acciones enloquecen a muchos jóvenes.
It grows close to others easily and is a.fr:
Il se rapproche facilement des autres et est également facilement
gâté. La disparité entre son visage et son
ces actions rendent de nombreux jeunes fous.
It grows close to others easily and is a.de:
Es wächst leicht in die Nähe anderer und wächst auch leicht
verwöhnt. Die Ungleichheit zwischen seinem Gesicht und seinem
Aktionen machen viele junge Leute wild.
It grows close to others easily and is a.zh-tw:
它很容易與他人親近，也很容易
被寵壞了。臉和身材的差距
行動讓不少年輕人為之瘋狂。
It grows close to others easily and is a.it:
Cresce facilmente vicino agli altri ed è anche facile
viziato. La disparità tra il suo volto e il suo
azioni fanno impazzire molti giovani.
It grows close to others easily and is a.pt-br:
Ele se aproxima facilmente dos outros e também é facilmente
estragado. A disparidade entre seu rosto e seu
ações deixam muitos jovens loucos por isso.

It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't c.en:
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't care if it
bumps its head on boats and boulders
while swimming.
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't c.fr:
Il a un caractère décontracté. Cela s'en fiche si c'est
se cogne la tête sur des bateaux et des rochers
en nageant.
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't c.zh-tw:
它有一種隨和的性格。它不在乎是否
頭撞到船隻和巨石上
游泳時。
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't c.es:
Tiene un carácter tranquilo. No importa si
se golpea la cabeza con barcos y rocas
mientras nada.
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't c.de:
Es hat eine lockere Natur. Es ist egal, ob es so ist
stößt mit dem Kopf gegen Boote und Felsbrocken
beim Schwimmen.
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't c.it:
Ha un carattere accomodante. Non importa se lo è
sbatte la testa contro barche e massi
mentre nuotava.
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't c.pt-br:
Tem uma natureza descontraída. Não importa se
bate a cabeça em barcos e pedras
enquanto nadava.

It hates light and shock. If attacked, i.en:
It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its
body to pump up its counterstrike.
It hates light and shock. If attacked, i.es:
Odia la luz y el shock. Si es atacado, infla su
cuerpo para impulsar su contraataque.
It hates light and shock. If attacked, i.zh-tw:
它討厭光和震動。如果受到攻擊，它會膨脹
身體來發動反擊。
It hates light and shock. If attacked, i.fr:
Il déteste la lumière et les chocs. S'il est attaqué, il gonfle son
corps pour intensifier sa contre-attaque.
It hates light and shock. If attacked, i.pt-br:
Ele odeia luz e choque. Se atacado, ele infla seu
corpo para bombear seu contra-ataque.
It hates light and shock. If attacked, i.it:
Odia la luce e lo shock. Se attaccato, si gonfia
corpo per potenziare il suo contrattacco.
It hates light and shock. If attacked, i.de:
Es hasst Licht und Schock. Wenn es angegriffen wird, bläht es sich auf
Körper, um seinen Gegenschlag zu verstärken.

It is always bursting with energy. To ma.en:
It is always bursting with energy. To make itself
stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
It is always bursting with energy. To ma.es:
Siempre está lleno de energía. para hacerse a si mismo
Más fuerte, sigue luchando incluso si pierde.
It is always bursting with energy. To ma.fr:
C’est toujours débordant d’énergie. Se faire
plus fort, il continue à se battre même s'il perd.
It is always bursting with energy. To ma.de:
Es strotzt immer vor Energie. Sich selbst machen
stärker, es kämpft weiter, auch wenn es verliert.
It is always bursting with energy. To ma.it:
È sempre pieno di energia. Per farsi
più forte, continua a combattere anche se perde.
It is always bursting with energy. To ma.zh-tw:
它總是充滿能量。為了讓自己
越強大，即使輸了，也會繼續戰鬥。
It is always bursting with energy. To ma.pt-br:
Está sempre cheio de energia. Para se fazer
mais forte, continua lutando mesmo que perca.

It is extremely good at climbing tree tr.en:
It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and
likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.
It is extremely good at climbing tree tr.fr:
Il est extrêmement doué pour grimper aux troncs d'arbres et
aime manger les nouvelles pousses des arbres.
It is extremely good at climbing tree tr.es:
Es extremadamente bueno trepando por los troncos de los árboles y
Le gusta comerse los nuevos brotes de los árboles.
It is extremely good at climbing tree tr.de:
Es ist sehr gut darin, auf Baumstämme zu klettern
frisst gerne die neuen Triebe an den Bäumen.
It is extremely good at climbing tree tr.zh-tw:
它非常擅長攀爬樹幹
喜歡吃樹上新芽。
It is extremely good at climbing tree tr.it:
È estremamente bravo ad arrampicarsi sui tronchi degli alberi e
gli piace mangiare i nuovi germogli sugli alberi.
It is extremely good at climbing tree tr.pt-br:
É extremamente bom para subir em troncos de árvores e
gosta de comer os novos brotos das árvores.

It is incredibly slow and dopey. It take.en:
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It takes five
seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It take.fr:
C'est incroyablement lent et stupide. Il en faut cinq
secondes pour qu'il ressente de la douleur lorsqu'il est attaqué.
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It take.es:
Es increíblemente lento y tonto. se necesitan cinco
segundos para que sienta dolor cuando está siendo atacado.
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It take.zh-tw:
它非常緩慢且愚蠢。需要五個
受到攻擊時它會感到疼痛幾秒鐘。
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It take.it:
È incredibilmente lento e stupido. Ce ne vogliono cinque
secondi perché senta dolore quando è sotto attacco.
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It take.pt-br:
É incrivelmente lento e estúpido. Leva cinco
segundos para sentir dor quando estiver sob ataque.
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It take.de:
Es ist unglaublich langsam und blöd. Es dauert fünf
Es dauert mehrere Sekunden, bis es bei einem Angriff Schmerzen verspürt.

It is merciless by nature. It is said th.en:
It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never
forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.
It is merciless by nature. It is said th.fr:
C'est impitoyable par nature. On dit que ce n'est jamais
pardonne les erreurs de ses adeptes de Murkrow.
It is merciless by nature. It is said th.es:
Es despiadado por naturaleza. Se dice que nunca
perdona los errores de sus seguidores de Murkrow.
It is merciless by nature. It is said th.it:
È spietato per natura. Si dice che non accada mai
perdona gli errori dei suoi seguaci Murkrow.
It is merciless by nature. It is said th.de:
Es ist von Natur aus gnadenlos. Es wird gesagt, dass es nie so ist
verzeiht die Fehler seiner Murkrow-Anhänger.
It is merciless by nature. It is said th.pt-br:
É impiedoso por natureza. Diz-se que nunca
perdoa os erros de seus seguidores de Murkrow.
It is merciless by nature. It is said th.zh-tw:
它本質上是無情的。據說從來沒有
原諒其暗鴉追隨者的錯誤。

It is said that if an Onix lives for ove.en:
It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years,
its composition changes to become diamond-like.
It is said that if an Onix lives for ove.de:
Es heißt, wenn ein Onix über 100 Jahre lebt,
seine Zusammensetzung ändert sich und wird diamantenartig.
It is said that if an Onix lives for ove.es:
Se dice que si un Onix vive más de 100 años,
su composición cambia para volverse parecida a un diamante.
It is said that if an Onix lives for ove.zh-tw:
據說，如果Onix能活100歲以上，
它的成分發生變化，變得像鑽石一樣。
It is said that if an Onix lives for ove.it:
Si dice che se un Onix vive per più di 100 anni,
la sua composizione cambia per diventare simile al diamante.
It is said that if an Onix lives for ove.fr:
On dit que si un Onix vit plus de 100 ans,
sa composition change pour ressembler à un diamant.
It is said that if an Onix lives for ove.pt-br:
Diz-se que se um Onix viver mais de 100 anos,
sua composição muda para se tornar semelhante a um diamante.

It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.en:
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails
is loaded with supernatural powers.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.es:
Se dice que vive 1.000 años, y cada una de sus colas
está cargado de poderes sobrenaturales.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.fr:
On dit qu'il vit 1 000 ans et que chacune de ses queues
est chargé de pouvoirs surnaturels.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.it:
Si dice che viva 1.000 anni e ciascuna delle sue code
è carico di poteri soprannaturali.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.pt-br:
Diz-se que vive 1.000 anos, e cada uma de suas caudas
está carregado de poderes sobrenaturais.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.zh-tw:
據說它的壽命是1000歲，它的每條尾巴
充滿了超自然的力量。
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.de:
Es wird gesagt, dass jeder seiner Schwänze 1.000 Jahre alt wird
ist voller übernatürlicher Kräfte.

It is small but rough and tough. It won'.en:
It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to
take a bite out of anything that moves.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.es:
Es pequeño pero áspero y resistente. No dudará en
Dale un mordisco a todo lo que se mueva.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.fr:
Il est petit mais rude et résistant. Il n'hésitera pas à
mordez tout ce qui bouge.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.it:
È piccolo ma ruvido e resistente. Non esiterà a farlo
dai un morso a tutto ciò che si muove.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.pt-br:
É pequeno, mas áspero e resistente. Não hesitará em
dê uma mordida em qualquer coisa que se mova.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.zh-tw:
它雖小，但粗糙而堅韌。它會毫不猶豫地
咬一口任何會動的東西。
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.de:
Es ist klein, aber rau und robust. Es wird nicht zögern
Beißen Sie in alles, was sich bewegt.

It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.en:
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a
variety of cries for communicating with others.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.fr:
Il est assez intelligent pour chasser en meute. Il utilise un
variété de cris pour communiquer avec les autres.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.pt-br:
É inteligente o suficiente para caçar em matilhas. Ele usa um
variedade de gritos para se comunicar com outras pessoas.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.it:
È abbastanza intelligente da cacciare in branco. Utilizza a
varietà di grida per comunicare con gli altri.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.es:
Es lo suficientemente inteligente como para cazar en manadas. Utiliza un
Variedad de gritos para comunicarse con los demás.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.de:
Es ist klug genug, in Rudeln zu jagen. Es verwendet a
Vielzahl von Schreien für die Kommunikation mit anderen.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.zh-tw:
它足夠聰明，可以成群狩獵。它使用一個
與他人交流的各種哭聲。

It is timid and always curls itself up i.en:
It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball.
If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.es:
Es tímido y siempre se hace un ovillo.
Si es atacado, ensancha su espalda para protegerse.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.fr:
Il est timide et se met toujours en boule.
S’il est attaqué, il flambe le dos pour se protéger.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.de:
Er ist schüchtern und rollt sich immer zu einer Kugel zusammen.
Wenn es angegriffen wird, breitet es zum Schutz seinen Rücken aus.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.zh-tw:
它膽小，總是把自己蜷縮成一團。
如果受到攻擊，它會張開背部進行保護。
It is timid and always curls itself up i.pt-br:
É tímido e sempre se enrola como uma bola.
Se atacado, ele ergue as costas para proteção.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.it:
È timido e si raggomitola sempre.
Se attaccato, alza la schiena per proteggersi.

It is unskilled at storing electric powe.en:
It is unskilled at storing electric power.
Any kind of shock causes it to discharge
energy spontaneously.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.it:
Non è abile nell’immagazzinare energia elettrica.
Qualsiasi tipo di shock ne provoca la scarica
energia spontaneamente.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.fr:
Il n’est pas doué pour stocker l’énergie électrique.
Tout type de choc provoque sa décharge
l'énergie spontanément.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.es:
No está capacitado para almacenar energía eléctrica.
Cualquier tipo de shock hace que se descargue.
energía de forma espontánea.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.zh-tw:
它不擅長儲存電力。
任何形式的衝擊都會導致其放電
自發的能量。
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.de:
Es ist nicht in der Lage, elektrische Energie zu speichern.
Jede Art von Erschütterung führt zur Entladung
Energie spontan.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.pt-br:
Não é qualificado para armazenar energia elétrica.
Qualquer tipo de choque faz com que ele descarregue
energia espontaneamente.

It launches kicks while spinning. If it.en:
It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high
speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.es:
Lanza patadas mientras gira. Si gira en alto
velocidad, puede perforar el suelo.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.fr:
Il lance des coups de pied en tournant. S'il tourne à haute vitesse
vitesse, il peut s'enfoncer dans le sol.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.zh-tw:
它在旋轉時發射踢腿。如果它高速旋轉
速度，它可能會鑽入地下。
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.pt-br:
Ele lança chutes enquanto gira. Se girar alto
velocidade, ele pode penetrar no solo.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.it:
Lancia i calci mentre gira. Se gira in alto
velocità, potrebbe penetrare nel terreno.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.de:
Beim Drehen werden Tritte ausgelöst. Wenn es auf Hochtouren läuft
Geschwindigkeit, kann es sich in den Boden bohren.

It lies still in the same pose for days.en:
It lies still in the same pose for days in its web,
waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
It lies still in the same pose for days.fr:
Il reste dans la même pose pendant des jours dans sa toile,
attendant que sa proie sans méfiance s'approche.
It lies still in the same pose for days.es:
Sigue en la misma postura durante días en su red,
esperando que su presa desprevenida se acerque.
It lies still in the same pose for days.it:
Giace ancora per giorni nella stessa posa nella sua rete,
aspettando che la sua ignara preda si avvicini.
It lies still in the same pose for days.zh-tw:
它在網上好幾天都保持同樣的姿勢，
等待毫無戒心的獵物靠近。
It lies still in the same pose for days.pt-br:
Ele permanece na mesma posição por dias em sua teia,
esperando que sua presa desavisada se aproxime.
It lies still in the same pose for days.de:
Es liegt tagelang still in der gleichen Pose in seinem Netz,
Er wartet darauf, dass seine ahnungslose Beute näherkommt.

It lives close to water. Its long tail i.en:
It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with
a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.fr:
Il vit près de l'eau. Sa longue queue est striée de
une nageoire, qui est souvent confondue avec celle d'une sirène.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.it:
Vive vicino all'acqua. La sua lunga coda è increspata
una pinna, che spesso viene scambiata per quella di una sirena.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.zh-tw:
它生活在靠近水的地方。它的長尾巴上佈滿了脊狀的
鰭，經常被誤認為是美人魚的鰭。
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.de:
Es lebt in der Nähe von Wasser. Sein langer Schwanz ist gerippt
eine Flosse, die oft mit der einer Meerjungfrau verwechselt wird.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.es:
Vive cerca del agua. Su larga cola está surcada por
una aleta, que a menudo se confunde con la de una sirena.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.pt-br:
Vive perto da água. Sua longa cauda é estriada
uma barbatana, que muitas vezes é confundida com a de uma sereia.

It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.en:
It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of
its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.fr:
Il vit en groupe à la cime des arbres. S'il perd de vue
son groupe, il devient furieux de sa solitude.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.es:
Vive en grupos en las copas de los árboles. Si pierde de vista
su grupo, se enfurece por su soledad.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.de:
Er lebt in Gruppen in den Baumwipfeln. Wenn es aus den Augen verliert
seiner Gruppe wird es wütend über seine Einsamkeit.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.it:
Vive in gruppi sulle cime degli alberi. Se lo perde di vista
suo gruppo, si infuria per la sua solitudine.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.zh-tw:
它成群生活在樹頂。如果它失去了視線
它的群體，它因孤獨而變得憤怒。
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.pt-br:
Vive em grupos nas copas das árvores. Se perder de vista
seu grupo, fica furioso com sua solidão.

It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.en:
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it
from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.es:
Parece una piña. Su caparazón lo protege
de Pokémon pájaro que lo picotean por error.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.fr:
Cela ressemble à une pomme de pin. Sa coque le protège
des Pokémon oiseaux qui le picorent par erreur.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.zh-tw:
它看起來就像一個松果。它的外殼保護著它
來自誤啄它的鳥神奇寶貝。
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.de:
Es sieht aus wie ein Tannenzapfen. Seine Hülle schützt es
von Vogel-Pokémon, die es versehentlich picken.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.it:
Sembra proprio una pigna. Il suo guscio lo protegge
dai Pokémon uccello che lo beccano per errore.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.pt-br:
Parece uma pinha. Sua casca o protege
de Pokémon pássaros que o bicam por engano.

It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.en:
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the nectar to
itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.es:
Le encanta el néctar dulce. Para conservar todo el néctar
mismo, arroja a sus rivales con su preciado cuerno.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.fr:
Il aime le nectar sucré. Pour garder tout le nectar
lui-même, il repousse ses rivaux avec sa corne précieuse.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.it:
Ama il nettare dolce. Per conservare tutto il nettare
stesso, scaglia via i rivali con il suo prezioso corno.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.de:
Es liebt süßen Nektar. Um den ganzen Nektar zu behalten
selbst, schleudert es Rivalen mit seinem wertvollen Horn weg.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.zh-tw:
牠喜歡甜甜的花蜜。為了保留所有的花蜜
它本身也用它珍貴的角把對手趕走。
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.pt-br:
Adora néctar doce. Para manter todo o néctar
por si só, ele afasta os rivais com seu valioso chifre.

It loves to drink other creatures' blood.en:
It loves to drink other creatures' blood. It's said
that if it finds others of its kind going hungry,
it sometimes shares the blood it's gathered.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.fr:
Il adore boire le sang des autres créatures. On dit
que s'il en trouve d'autres de son espèce affamés,
il partage parfois le sang qu'il a recueilli.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.it:
Ama bere il sangue di altre creature. E' detto
che se trova altri suoi simili affamati,
a volte condivide il sangue raccolto.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.es:
Le encanta beber la sangre de otras criaturas. se dice
que si encuentra a otros de su especie pasando hambre,
a veces comparte la sangre que recoge.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.pt-br:
Ele adora beber o sangue de outras criaturas. Está dito
que se encontrar outros da sua espécie passando fome,
às vezes compartilha o sangue que reuniu.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.de:
Es liebt es, das Blut anderer Lebewesen zu trinken. Es heißt
dass, wenn es andere seiner Art hungrig vorfindet,
Manchmal teilt es das Blut, das es gesammelt hat.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.zh-tw:
牠喜歡喝其他生物的血。據說
如果它發現其他同類正在挨餓，
它有時會分享它所收集的血液。

It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.en:
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked
by bird Pokémon that would love to make off
with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.es:
Corre ágilmente para evitar ser picoteado.
por Pokémon pájaro al que le encantaría escapar
con su pequeña bola de almacenamiento rica en nutrientes.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.fr:
Il se précipite agilement pour éviter de se faire picorer
par des Pokémon oiseaux qui adoreraient s'enfuir
avec sa petite boule de stockage riche en nutriments.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.zh-tw:
它敏捷地奔跑以避免被啄
喜歡偷走的鳥神奇寶貝
其小而營養豐富的存儲球。
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.it:
Si lancia agilmente per evitare di essere beccato
da Pokémon uccello che vorrebbero scappare
con la sua piccola sfera di stoccaggio ricca di sostanze nutritive.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.pt-br:
Ele corre agilmente para evitar ser bicado
por Pokémon pássaros que adorariam fugir
com sua pequena bola de armazenamento rica em nutrientes.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.de:
Es rennt flink umher, um nicht gepickt zu werden
von Vogel-Pokémon, die sich gerne aus dem Staub machen würden
mit seiner kleinen, nährstoffreichen Speicherkugel.

It observes prey while hanging inverted.en:
It observes prey while hanging inverted from
branches. When the chance presents itself,
it swoops!
It observes prey while hanging inverted.fr:
Il observe ses proies en étant suspendu à l'envers.
branches. Quand l'occasion se présente,
ça fonce !
It observes prey while hanging inverted.es:
Observa a sus presas mientras cuelga invertido.
ramas. Cuando se presenta la oportunidad,
¡se lanza en picado!
It observes prey while hanging inverted.it:
Osserva la preda mentre pende capovolto
rami. Quando si presenta l'occasione,
piomba!
It observes prey while hanging inverted.zh-tw:
它倒掛在空中觀察獵物
分支機構。當機會出現時，
它猛撲！
It observes prey while hanging inverted.de:
Es beobachtet Beute, während es kopfüber hängt
Zweige. Wenn sich die Chance bietet,
es schwappt!
It observes prey while hanging inverted.pt-br:
Ele observa a presa enquanto está pendurado invertido
filiais. Quando a oportunidade se apresenta,
ele desce!

Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey..en:
Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey. When
nervous, Teddiursa will lick its paws and soon
have a smile back on its face.
Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey..fr:
Ses pattes sont trempées dans une gorgée de miel. Quand
nerveux, Teddiursa va se lécher les pattes et bientôt
retrouver le sourire.

Sus patas están empapadas en montones de miel. cuando
nervioso, Teddiursa se lamerá las patas y pronto

Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey..it:
Le sue zampe sono inzuppate in una gran quantità di miele. Quando
nervoso, Teddiursa si leccherà le zampe e presto
avere di nuovo il sorriso sulle labbra.
Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey..pt-br:
Suas patas estão encharcadas de muito mel. Quando
nervoso, Teddiursa lamberá as patas e logo
tenha um sorriso de volta no rosto.
Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey..zh-tw:
它的爪子浸滿了蜂蜜。當
緊張時，泰迪烏薩會舔它的爪子，很快

Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey..de:
Seine Pfoten sind in Unmengen Honig getränkt. Wann
nervös, Teddiursa wird sich bald die Pfoten lecken

Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odo.en:
Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor.
The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance
of 1.25 miles.
Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odo.fr:
Ses pistils dégagent une odeur incroyablement nauséabonde.

de 1,25 milles.

de 1,25 millas.

可怕的惡臭會導致遠處暈厥
1.25 英里。
Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odo.de:

Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odo.it:
I suoi pistilli emanano un odore incredibilmente disgustoso.

Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odo.pt-br:

de 1,25 milhas.

Its reckless nature leads it to stand up.en:
Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to
others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect
its territory.
Its reckless nature leads it to stand up.fr:
Sa nature imprudente l'amène à tenir tête
d'autres, même les gros Pokémon, s'il doit protéger
son territoire.
Its reckless nature leads it to stand up.es:
Su carácter imprudente le lleva a hacer frente a
otros, incluso Pokémon grandes, si tiene que protegerlos.
su territorio.

andere – sogar große Pokémon – wenn es schützen muss
sein Territorium.
Its reckless nature leads it to stand up.pt-br:

outros – até mesmo Pokémon grandes – se for necessário proteger

altri, anche Pokémon di grandi dimensioni, se deve proteggere

Its reckless nature leads it to stand up.zh-tw:
它魯莽的本性使它能夠挺身而出
其他——甚至是大型神奇寶貝——如果它必須保護的話
它的領土。

Its strange cries sound like human langu.en:
Its strange cries sound like human language.
There are some musicians who compose songs
for Jynx to sing.
Its strange cries sound like human langu.es:
Sus extraños gritos suenan como lenguaje humano.
Hay algunos músicos que componen canciones.
para que Jynx cante.
Its strange cries sound like human langu.it:

Ci sono alcuni musicisti che compongono canzoni

Il y a des musiciens qui composent des chansons

Its strange cries sound like human langu.pt-br:

Its strange cries sound like human langu.zh-tw:

Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once.en:
Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once its
cotton spores run out, its journey ends, as does
its life.
Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once.es:
Jumpluff viaja con vientos estacionales. Una vez que su
las esporas del algodón se agotan, su viaje termina, al igual que
su vida.
Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once.fr:
Jumpluff voyage grâce aux vents saisonniers. Une fois que c'est
les spores du coton s'épuisent, son voyage se termine, tout comme
sa vie.
Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once.zh-tw:
Jumpluff 依靠季風行駛。一旦它
棉花孢子用完，它的旅程也結束了
它的生命。
Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once.pt-br:
Jumpluff viaja com ventos sazonais. Uma vez que é
os esporos do algodão acabam, sua jornada termina, assim como
sua vida.
Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once.it:
Jumpluff viaggia grazie ai venti stagionali. Una volta che è
se le spore del cotone si esauriscono, il suo viaggio termina, così come
la sua vita.
Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once.de:
Jumpluff reist mit saisonalen Winden. Sobald es
Wenn die Sporen der Baumwolle erschöpft sind, endet auch ihre Reise
sein Leben.

Late at night, it appears beside people'.en:
Late at night, it appears beside people's pillows.
As it feeds on dreams, the patterns on its body
give off a faint glow.
Late at night, it appears beside people'.fr:
Tard dans la nuit, il apparaît à côté des oreillers des gens.
Alors qu'il se nourrit de rêves, les motifs sur son corps
dégage une faible lueur.
Late at night, it appears beside people'.de:
Spät in der Nacht erscheint es neben den Kissen der Menschen.
Während es sich von Träumen ernährt, werden die Muster auf seinem Körper sichtbar
geben ein schwaches Leuchten ab.
Late at night, it appears beside people'.it:
A tarda notte appare accanto ai cuscini delle persone.
Mentre si nutre di sogni, degli schemi sul suo corpo
emettere un debole bagliore.
Late at night, it appears beside people'.es:
A altas horas de la noche aparece junto a las almohadas de la gente.
Mientras se alimenta de sueños, los patrones de su cuerpo
desprende un tenue brillo.
Late at night, it appears beside people'.zh-tw:
深夜，它出現在人們的枕頭邊。
當它以夢為食時，它身上的圖案
發出微弱的光芒。
Late at night, it appears beside people'.pt-br:
Tarde da noite, aparece ao lado dos travesseiros das pessoas.
À medida que se alimenta de sonhos, os padrões do seu corpo
emite um leve brilho.

Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.en:
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense.
With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield
its children from any kind of attack.
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.fr:
Nidoqueen est meilleur en défense qu'en attaque.
Avec des écailles comme une armure, ce Pokémon fera bouclier

Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.pt-br:
Nidoqueen é melhor na defesa do que no ataque.
Com escamas como armadura, este Pokémon irá proteger
seus filhos de qualquer tipo de ataque.
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.de:
Nidoqueen ist besser in der Verteidigung als im Angriff.
Mit schuppenähnlichen Rüstungen schützt dieses Pokémon

Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.es:

Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.zh-tw:

它的孩子免受任何形式的攻擊。

No matter how dirty the water in the riv.en:
No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will
adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.fr:
Peu importe à quel point l'eau de la rivière est sale, elle

No matter how dirty the water in the riv.es:
No importa cuán sucia esté el agua del río,
adaptarse y prosperar. Tiene una fuerte voluntad de sobrevivir.
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.it:
Non importa quanto sia sporca l'acqua del fiume, lo farà
adattarsi e prosperare. Ha una forte volontà di sopravvivere.
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.zh-tw:
不管河裡的水有多髒，它都會
適應並茁壯成長。它有強烈的求生意志。
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.de:
Egal wie schmutzig das Wasser im Fluss ist, es wird es tun

No matter how dirty the water in the riv.pt-br:
Não importa quão suja seja a água do rio, ela irá
adaptar e prosperar. Tem uma forte vontade de sobreviver.

Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.en:
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.
It remains enraged until it demolishes
everything around it.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.fr:
Une fois apparu, il se déchaîne.
Il reste enragé jusqu'à ce qu'il démolisse
tout autour.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.es:
Una vez que aparece, se enfurece.
Sigue enfurecido hasta derribar
todo lo que lo rodea.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.it:
Una volta apparso, va su tutte le furie.
Rimane infuriato finché non demolisce
tutto ciò che lo circonda.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.de:
Sobald es auftaucht, tobt es.
Es bleibt wütend, bis es zerstört wird
alles drumherum.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.zh-tw:
一旦出現，就會橫衝直撞。
它仍然憤怒，直到它被摧毀
它周圍的一切。
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.pt-br:
Uma vez que aparece, ele fica furioso.
Ele permanece enfurecido até destruir
tudo ao seu redor.

Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be found

carries this species all over the world.
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.fr:
En dehors des régions froides, Hoppip peut être trouvé
pratiquement partout. C'est parce que le vent
transporte cette espèce partout dans le monde.
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.es:
Fuera de las regiones frías, se puede encontrar Hoppip.
prácticamente en todas partes. Esto se debe a que el viento
lleva esta especie por todo el mundo.

在寒冷地區之外，也可以找到 Hoppip
幾乎無處不在。這是因為風
該物種遍布世界各地。

Al di fuori delle regioni fredde, è possibile trovare Hoppip
praticamente ovunque. Questo perché il vento
trasporta questa specie in tutto il mondo.
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.pt-br:
Fora das regiões frias, o Hoppip pode ser encontrado
praticamente em todos os lugares. Isto acontece porque o vento

Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.de:
Außerhalb kalter Regionen ist Hoppip zu finden

Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.en:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals
rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.es:
Abundante en los trópicos. Cuando baila, sus pétalos
se frotan y emiten un agradable sonido de timbre.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.de:
In den Tropen reichlich vorhanden. Wenn es tanzt, sind seine Blütenblätter
aneinander reiben und einen angenehmen Klang erzeugen.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.zh-tw:
熱帶地區資源豐富。當它跳舞時，它的花瓣
相互摩擦並發出悅耳的鈴聲。
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.it:
Abbondante ai tropici. Quando balla, i suoi petali

Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.fr:
Abondant sous les tropiques. Quand il danse, ses pétales
frottez ensemble et faites une sonnerie agréable.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.pt-br:
Abundante nos trópicos. Quando dança, suas pétalas
esfregue e faça um som de toque agradável.

Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.en:
Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to
move between dimensions, but the program also
caused instability in Porygon-Z's behavior.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.fr:
Porygon-Z avait un programme installé pour lui permettre de
se déplacer entre les dimensions, mais le programme aussi
a provoqué une instabilité dans le comportement de Porygon-Z.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.zh-tw:
Porygon-Z 安裝了一個程序，允許它
在維度之間移動，但程序也
導致 Porygon-Z 行為不穩定。
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.pt-br:
Porygon-Z tinha um programa instalado para permitir
mover-se entre dimensões, mas o programa também
causou instabilidade no comportamento de Porygon-Z.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.es:
Porygon-Z tenía un programa instalado que le permitía
moverse entre dimensiones, pero el programa también
causó inestabilidad en el comportamiento de Porygon-Z.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.de:
Porygon-Z hatte ein Programm installiert, um dies zu ermöglichen
Bewegen Sie sich zwischen den Dimensionen, aber auch das Programm

Porygon-Z aveva un programma installato che glielo permetteva
spostarsi tra le dimensioni, ma anche il programma
ha causato instabilità nel comportamento di Porygon-Z.

Put a random Pokémon from your deck into.en: Put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.
Put a random Pokémon from your deck into.es: Pon un Pokémon aleatorio de tu mazo en tu mano.
Put a random Pokémon from your deck into.it: Metti nella tua mano un Pokémon casuale dal tuo mazzo.
Put a random Pokémon from your deck into.fr: Mettez un Pokémon aléatoire de votre deck dans votre main.
Put a random Pokémon from your deck into.de: Nimm ein zufälliges Pokémon aus deinem Deck auf deine Hand.
Put a random Pokémon from your deck into.pt-br: Coloque um Pokémon aleatório do seu baralho na sua mão.
Put a random Pokémon from your deck into.zh-tw: 從你的牌組中隨機將一隻神奇寶貝放入你的手牌。

Seven Binacle come together to form one\.en:
Seven Binacle come together to form one
Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head
gives orders to those serving as the limbs.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.de:
Sieben Binakel vereinen sich zu einem
Barbaracle. Das Binakel, das als Kopf dient
gibt denen, die als Gliedmaßen dienen, Befehle.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.it:
Sette Binacle si uniscono per formarne uno solo
Barbaracolo. Il Binacolo che funge da testa
dà ordini a coloro che fanno da membra.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.fr:
Sept Binacle se réunissent pour n'en former qu'un
Barbaracle. Le Binacle qui sert de tête
donne des ordres à ceux qui servent de membres.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.es:
Siete Binacle se unen para formar uno
Bárbaracle. El Binacle que sirve de cabecera.
da órdenes a quienes sirven como miembros.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.pt-br:
Sete Binacle se unem para formar um
Bárbara. O Bináculo que serve como cabeça
dá ordens àqueles que servem como membros.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.zh-tw:
七個 Binacle 合而為一
野蠻人。作為頭部的 Binacle
對那些充當肢體的人發出命令。

Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.en:
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell where a
Skiploom was born by the scent drifting from the
flower on the Pokémon's head.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.fr:
Les amateurs de Skiploom peuvent apparemment dire où se trouve un
Skiploom est né du parfum qui s'échappe du
fleur sur la tête du Pokémon.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.es:
Los entusiastas de Skiploom aparentemente pueden saber dónde
Skiploom nació del aroma que emanaba del
flor en la cabeza del Pokémon.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.it:
Gli appassionati di Skiploom possono apparentemente dire dove a
Skiploom è nato dal profumo che deriva dal
fiore sulla testa del Pokémon.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.zh-tw:
Skiploom 愛好者顯然可以分辨出
Skiploom 的誕生是由飄來的香味所決定的。
神奇寶貝頭上的花。
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.pt-br:
Os entusiastas do Skiploom aparentemente podem dizer onde um
Skiploom nasceu do perfume que vem do
flor na cabeça do Pokémon.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.de:
Skiploom-Enthusiasten können offenbar erkennen, wo a
Skiploom wurde durch den Duft geboren, der von dort wehte
Blume auf dem Kopf des Pokémon.

State-of-the-art technology was used to.en:
State-of-the-art technology was used to create
Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be
created via computer programming.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.fr:
Une technologie de pointe a été utilisée pour créer
Porygon. C'était le premier Pokémon artificiel à être
créé via la programmation informatique.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.it:
Per creare è stata utilizzata la tecnologia più avanzata
Porygon. È stato il primo Pokémon artificiale ad esserlo
creato tramite la programmazione del computer.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.es:
Se utilizó tecnología de punta para crear
Porygón. Fue el primer Pokémon artificial en ser
creado mediante programación informática.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.de:
Bei der Erstellung kam modernste Technik zum Einsatz
Porygon. Es war das erste künstliche Pokémon überhaupt
durch Computerprogrammierung erstellt.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.zh-tw:
採用最先進的技術來創造
多邊形。這是第一個人造神奇寶貝
通過計算機編程創建。
State-of-the-art technology was used to.pt-br:
Tecnologia de ponta foi usada para criar
Porígon. Foi o primeiro Pokémon artificial a ser
criado através de programação de computador.

Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.en:
Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and
mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely
sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.fr:
Rapide comme le vent, Absol court à travers champs et
montagnes. Sa corne courbée en forme d'arc est extrêmement
sensibles aux signes avant-coureurs des catastrophes naturelles.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.es:
Rápido como el viento, Absol corre por los campos y
montañas. Su cuerno curvo, en forma de arco, es agudamente
sensibles a las señales de alerta de desastres naturales.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.pt-br:
Rápido como o vento, Absol corre pelos campos e
montanhas. Seu chifre curvo em forma de arco é agudamente
sensíveis aos sinais de alerta de desastres naturais.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.it:
Veloce come il vento, Absol corre attraverso i campi e
montagne. Il suo corno ricurvo, a forma di arco, è acuto
sensibile ai segnali premonitori dei disastri naturali.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.zh-tw:
阿勃索爾疾馳如風，穿過田野，
山。它彎曲的弓狀角非常鋒利
對自然災害的警告信號敏感。
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.de:
Schnell wie der Wind rast Absol durch Felder und
Berge. Sein gebogenes, bogenförmiges Horn ist spitz
sensibel auf die Warnsignale von Naturkatastrophen reagieren.

Switch your Active Pokémon that has dama.en: Switch your Active Pokémon that has damage on it with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Switch your Active Pokémon that has dama.fr: Échangez votre Pokémon Actif qui subit des dégâts avec 1 de vos Pokémon de Banc.
Switch your Active Pokémon that has dama.es: Cambia tu Pokémon Activo que tiene daño con 1 de tus Pokémon en Banca.
Switch your Active Pokémon that has dama.it: Scambia il tuo Pokémon attivo che ha danni con 1 dei tuoi Pokémon in panchina.
Switch your Active Pokémon that has dama.pt-br: Troque o seu Pokémon Ativo que apresenta dano por 1 dos seus Pokémon no Banco.
Switch your Active Pokémon that has dama.zh-tw: 將受到傷害的活躍寶可夢與 1 只後備寶可夢交換。
Switch your Active Pokémon that has dama.de: Tausche dein Aktives Pokémon, das Schaden hat, gegen eines deiner Bank-Pokémon aus.

Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.fr: Prenez une Énergie {R} de votre Zone d'Énergie et attachez-la à l'un de vos Pokémon de Banc.
