Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.en: Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach them to your Benched Basic Pokémon in any way you like.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.fr: Prenez une énergie {R}, {W} et {L} de votre zone d'énergie et attachez-les à votre Pokémon de base de banc comme vous le souhaitez.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.de: Nimm eine {R}-, {W}- und {L}-Energie aus deiner Energiezone und lege sie auf beliebige Weise an dein Basis-Pokémon auf deiner Bank an.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.zh-tw: 從你的能量區取出 {R}、{W} 和 {L} 能量，並以你喜歡的任何方式將它們附加到你的後備基礎神奇寶貝上。
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.es: Toma una Energía {R}, {W} y {L} de tu Zona de Energía y únelas a tus Pokémon Básicos en Banca de la forma que quieras.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.pt-br: Pegue uma energia {R}, {W} e {L} da sua zona de energia e ligue-as aos seus Pokémon Básicos no Banco da maneira que desejar.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.it: Prendi un'Energia {R}, {W} e {L} dalla tua Zona Energetica e assegnale ai tuoi Pokémon Base in panchina nel modo che preferisci.

Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.en:
Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it
pleases. Recent research has shown that these
arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.es:
Tangrowth tiene dos brazos que puede extender a medida que
agrada. Investigaciones recientes han demostrado que estos
Las armas son, de hecho, haces de enredaderas.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.pt-br:
Tangrowth tem dois braços que pode estender conforme
agrada. Pesquisas recentes mostraram que estes
os braços são, na verdade, feixes de videiras.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.fr:
Tangrowth a deux bras qu'il peut étendre à mesure qu'il
plaît. Des recherches récentes ont montré que ces
les bras sont en fait des fagots de vigne.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.zh-tw:
Tangrowth 有兩條手臂，可以隨心所欲地伸展
請。最近的研究表明，這些
事實上，手臂是一捆捆的藤蔓。
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.de:
Tangrowth hat zwei Arme, die es ausstrecken kann
gefällt. Neuere Untersuchungen haben gezeigt, dass diese
Arme sind in Wirklichkeit Weinrebenbündel.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.it:
Tangrowth ha due braccia che può estendere man mano
piace. Recenti ricerche hanno dimostrato che questi
le braccia sono, infatti, fasci di viti.

The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.en: The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to takes −10 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon, recovers from all Special Conditions, and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.fr: Le Pokémon {M} auquel cette carte est attachée subit -10 dégâts des attaques du Pokémon de votre adversaire, récupère de toutes les Conditions Spéciales et ne peut être affecté par aucune Conditions Spéciales.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.zh-tw: 這張卡所附著的 {M} 只神奇寶貝因對手神奇寶貝的攻擊而受到 -10 傷害，從所有特殊狀態中恢復，並且不會受到任何特殊狀態的影響。
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.es: El Pokémon {M} al que está unida esta carta recibe -10 de daño de los ataques de los Pokémon de tu rival, se recupera de todas las Condiciones Especiales y no puede verse afectado por ninguna Condición Especial.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.it: Il Pokémon {M} a cui è assegnata questa carta subisce -10 danni dagli attacchi dei Pokémon del tuo avversario, si riprende da tutte le condizioni speciali e non può essere influenzato da alcuna condizione speciale.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.de: Das {M}-Pokémon, an das diese Karte angelegt ist, erleidet −10 Schaden durch Angriffe der Pokémon deines Gegners, erholt sich von allen Sonderzuständen und kann von keinem Sonderzustand betroffen sein.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.pt-br: O Pokémon {M} ao qual este card está anexado sofre -10 de dano de ataques dos Pokémon do seu oponente, se recupera de todas as Condições Especiais e não pode ser afetado por nenhuma Condições Especiais.

The aroma that rises from its petals con.en:
The aroma that rises from its petals contains a
substance that calms aggressive feelings.
The aroma that rises from its petals con.es:
El aroma que surge de sus pétalos contiene una
Sustancia que calma los sentimientos agresivos.
The aroma that rises from its petals con.fr:
L'arôme qui s'échappe de ses pétales contient un
substance qui calme les sentiments agressifs.
The aroma that rises from its petals con.it:
L'aroma che sale dai suoi petali contiene a
sostanza che calma i sentimenti aggressivi.
The aroma that rises from its petals con.zh-tw:
從花瓣中升起的香氣含有
平息攻擊性情緒的物質。
The aroma that rises from its petals con.de:
Das Aroma, das aus seinen Blütenblättern aufsteigt, enthält u. a
Substanz, die aggressive Gefühle beruhigt.
The aroma that rises from its petals con.pt-br:
O aroma que sobe de suas pétalas contém uma
substância que acalma sentimentos agressivos.

The bright light on its tail can be seen.en:
The bright light on its tail can be seen far
away. It has been treasured since ancient
times as a beacon.
The bright light on its tail can be seen.fr:
La lumière vive sur sa queue est visible de loin
loin. Il est précieux depuis l’Antiquité
fois comme un phare.
The bright light on its tail can be seen.es:
La luz brillante de su cola se puede ver a lo lejos.
lejos. Ha sido atesorado desde la antigüedad.
veces como un faro.
The bright light on its tail can be seen.de:
Das helle Licht an seinem Schwanz ist weithin sichtbar
weg. Es wird seit der Antike geschätzt
Mal als Leuchtturm.
The bright light on its tail can be seen.it:
La luce brillante sulla sua coda può essere vista da lontano
lontano. È stato apprezzato fin dall'antichità
volte come un faro.
The bright light on its tail can be seen.pt-br:
A luz brilhante em sua cauda pode ser vista de longe
embora. É valorizado desde a antiguidade
vezes como um farol.
The bright light on its tail can be seen.zh-tw:
尾巴上的亮光遠遠就能看見
離開。自古以來就被人們珍藏
時代如燈塔。

The electromagnetic waves emitted by the.en:
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units
at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which
allows it to float.
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the.es:
Las ondas electromagnéticas emitidas por las unidades.
a los lados de su cabeza expulsan antigravedad, que
le permite flotar.
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the.fr:
Les ondes électromagnétiques émises par les unités
sur les côtés de sa tête expulsent l'antigravité, qui
lui permet de flotter.
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the.de:
Die von den Einheiten ausgesendeten elektromagnetischen Wellen
an den Seiten seines Kopfes stoßen Antigravitation aus, die
lässt es schweben.
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the.it:
Le onde elettromagnetiche emesse dalle unità
ai lati della sua testa espellono l'antigravità, che
gli permette di galleggiare.
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the.pt-br:
As ondas eletromagnéticas emitidas pelas unidades
nas laterais de sua cabeça expelem antigravidade, que
permite que ele flutue.
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the.zh-tw:
各裝置發射的電磁波
在其頭部的兩側驅逐反重力，這
讓它漂浮。

The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions.en:
The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions changes
in the intensity of its hue as the Pokémon's
emotions change.
The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions.fr:
Le liquide des sécrétions de la queue de Smeargle change
dans l'intensité de sa teinte comme celle du Pokémon
les émotions changent.
The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions.it:
Il fluido delle secrezioni della coda di Smeargle cambia
nell'intensità della sua tonalità come quella del Pokémon
le emozioni cambiano.
The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions.zh-tw:
Smeargle尾部分泌物的液體發生變化
其色調的強度與神奇寶貝的顏色一樣
情緒發生變化。
The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions.pt-br:
O fluido das secreções da cauda de Smeargle muda
na intensidade de sua tonalidade como a do Pokémon
as emoções mudam.
The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions.de:
Die Flüssigkeit der Schwanzsekrete von Smeargle verändert sich
in der Intensität seines Farbtons wie der des Pokémon
Emotionen verändern sich.
The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions.es:
El líquido de las secreciones de la cola de Smeargle cambia.
en la intensidad de su tono como el del Pokémon
las emociones cambian.

The fur on its body naturally repels wat.en:
The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can
stay dry even when it plays in the water.
The fur on its body naturally repels wat.es:
The fur on its body naturally repels water. puede
stay dry even when it plays in the water.
The fur on its body naturally repels wat.fr:
La fourrure de son corps repousse naturellement l'eau. Cela peut
reste au sec même lorsqu'il joue dans l'eau.
The fur on its body naturally repels wat.de:
Das Fell seines Körpers weist von Natur aus Wasser ab. Es kann
Bleiben Sie trocken, auch wenn es im Wasser spielt.
The fur on its body naturally repels wat.pt-br:
A pelagem do seu corpo repele naturalmente a água. Pode
fique seco mesmo quando brinca na água.
The fur on its body naturally repels wat.zh-tw:
它身上的皮毛天然具有防水功能。它可以
即使在水中玩耍時也能保持乾燥。
The fur on its body naturally repels wat.it:
La pelliccia sul suo corpo respinge naturalmente l'acqua. Può
resta asciutto anche quando gioca nell'acqua.

The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.en:
The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead contains
a powerful poison. This is a very cautious
Pokémon, always straining its large ears.
The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.fr:
La corne sur le front d'un Nidoran mâle contient
un poison puissant. C'est une démarche très prudente
Pokémon, tendant toujours ses grandes oreilles.
The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.de:
Das Horn auf der Stirn eines männlichen Nidoraners enthält
ein starkes Gift. Das ist sehr vorsichtig
Pokémon, das immer seine großen Ohren anstrengt.
The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.it:
Il corno sulla fronte di un Nidoran maschio contiene
un potente veleno. Questo è molto cauto
Pokémon, tendendo sempre le sue grandi orecchie.
The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.es:
El cuerno en la frente de un macho Nidoran contiene
un veneno poderoso. Esto es muy cauteloso.
Pokémon, siempre forzando sus grandes orejas.
The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.pt-br:
O chifre na testa de um Nidoran masculino contém
um veneno poderoso. Esta é uma atitude muito cautelosa
Pokémon, sempre esticando suas orelhas grandes.
The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.zh-tw:
雄性尼多蘭額頭上的角含有
一種強力的毒藥。這是一個非常謹慎的
總是豎起大耳朵的神奇寶貝。

The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.en:
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's thought
that this happens so Nidorina's children won't get
poked while their mother is feeding them.
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.fr:
La corne sur sa tête s'est atrophiée. On pense
que cela se produit pour que les enfants de Nidorina n'aient pas
piqué pendant que leur mère les nourrit.
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.zh-tw:
它頭上的角已經萎縮了。是以為
發生這種情況是為了讓尼多麗娜的孩子們不會受到
當他們的母親餵他們的時候被戳了。
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.de:
Das Horn auf seinem Kopf ist verkümmert. Es ist gedacht
dass dies geschieht, damit Nidorinas Kinder es nicht bekommen
stocherte, während ihre Mutter sie fütterte.
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.it:
Il corno sulla sua testa si è atrofizzato. È pensato
che questo accade in modo che i figli di Nidorina non capiscano
punzecchiati mentre la madre li dava da mangiare.
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.pt-br:
O chifre em sua cabeça atrofiou. É pensado
que isso aconteça para que os filhos de Nidorina não recebam
cutucados enquanto a mãe os alimenta.
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.es:
El cuerno de su cabeza se ha atrofiado. es pensamiento
que esto pase para que los hijos de Nidorina no se enfermen
pinchados mientras su madre les da de comer.

The mother puts its offspring to sleep b.en:
The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up
around them. It corners foes with speed.
The mother puts its offspring to sleep b.fr:
La mère endort sa progéniture en se recroquevillant
autour d'eux. Il coince les ennemis avec rapidité.
The mother puts its offspring to sleep b.es:
La madre pone a dormir a sus crías acurrucándose
alrededor de ellos. Acorrala a los enemigos con velocidad.
The mother puts its offspring to sleep b.it:
La madre addormenta il piccolo rannicchiandosi
intorno a loro. Mette all'angolo i nemici con velocità.
The mother puts its offspring to sleep b.de:
Die Mutter schläft ihren Nachwuchs ein, indem sie sich zusammenrollt
um sie herum. Es treibt Gegner schnell in die Enge.
The mother puts its offspring to sleep b.pt-br:
A mãe coloca seu filho para dormir enrolando-se
ao redor deles. Ele encurrala os inimigos com velocidade.
The mother puts its offspring to sleep b.zh-tw:
母親會蜷縮起來讓孩子入睡
他們周圍。它以速度將敵人逼入絕境。

The next time you flip any number of coi.en: The next time you flip any number of coins for the effect of an attack, Ability, or Trainer card after using this card on this turn, the first coin flip will definitely be heads.
The next time you flip any number of coi.es: La próxima vez que lances cualquier cantidad de monedas para obtener el efecto de una carta de ataque, habilidad o entrenador después de usar esta carta en este turno, el primer lanzamiento de moneda definitivamente será cara.
The next time you flip any number of coi.fr: La prochaine fois que vous lancerez un nombre quelconque de pièces pour obtenir l'effet d'une carte d'attaque, de capacité ou de dresseur après avoir utilisé cette carte ce tour-ci, le premier tirage au sort sera définitivement face.
The next time you flip any number of coi.zh-tw: 在本回合使用這張卡後，下次為攻擊、能力或訓練卡的效果而翻轉任意數量的硬幣時，第一個硬幣翻轉肯定是正面。
The next time you flip any number of coi.it: La prossima volta che lanci un qualsiasi numero di monete per l'effetto di un attacco, di un'abilità o di una carta Allenatore dopo aver usato questa carta in questo turno, il primo lancio di moneta darà sicuramente testa.
The next time you flip any number of coi.pt-br: Na próxima vez que você lançar qualquer número de moedas para o efeito de uma carta de ataque, habilidade ou treinador depois de usar esta carta neste turno, o primeiro lançamento de moeda será definitivamente cara.
The next time you flip any number of coi.de: Wenn Sie das nächste Mal eine beliebige Anzahl von Münzen für den Effekt einer Angriffs-, Fähigkeits- oder Trainerkarte werfen, nachdem Sie diese Karte in diesem Zug verwendet haben, wird der erste Münzwurf definitiv „Kopf“ sein.

The rain clouds it carries let it fire t.en:
The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts
at will. They say that it descended with lightning.
The rain clouds it carries let it fire t.fr:
Les nuages de pluie qu'il transporte lui permettent de déclencher des éclairs
à volonté. On dit qu'il est tombé avec la foudre.
The rain clouds it carries let it fire t.es:
Las nubes de lluvia que lleva le permiten disparar rayos.
a voluntad. Dicen que descendió con un rayo.
The rain clouds it carries let it fire t.zh-tw:
它攜帶的雨雲讓它發射雷霆
隨意。他們說它是隨著閃電降臨的。
The rain clouds it carries let it fire t.pt-br:
As nuvens de chuva que ele carrega deixam disparar raios
à vontade. Dizem que desceu com um raio.
The rain clouds it carries let it fire t.it:
Le nuvole di pioggia che trasporta gli fanno scagliare fulmini
a volontà. Dicono che sia sceso con un fulmine.
The rain clouds it carries let it fire t.de:
Die Regenwolken, die es trägt, lassen es Blitze abfeuern
nach Belieben. Sie sagen, dass es mit einem Blitz herabkam.

The shell seems to be filled with joy. I.en:
The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said
that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
The shell seems to be filled with joy. I.fr:
La coquille semble remplie de joie. On dit
qu'il partagera la chance s'il est traité avec gentillesse.
The shell seems to be filled with joy. I.es:
El caparazón parece estar lleno de alegría. se dice
que compartirá buena suerte si se le trata con amabilidad.
The shell seems to be filled with joy. I.pt-br:
A concha parece estar cheia de alegria. É dito
que compartilhará boa sorte quando tratado com gentileza.
The shell seems to be filled with joy. I.de:
Die Hülle scheint voller Freude zu sein. Es heißt
dass es viel Glück bringt, wenn es freundlich behandelt wird.
The shell seems to be filled with joy. I.zh-tw:
貝殼裡似乎充滿了喜悅。據說
如果受到善待，它會分享好運。
The shell seems to be filled with joy. I.it:
Il guscio sembra pieno di gioia. Si dice
che condividerà la buona fortuna se trattato con gentilezza.

The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokém.en:
The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokémon
can deliver punches capable of obliterating a
dump truck.
The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokém.es:
Los gruesos brazos de este Pokémon de sangre caliente
Puede dar golpes capaces de destruir a un
camión volquete.
The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokém.fr:
Les bras épais de ce Pokémon au sang chaud
peut délivrer des coups de poing capables d'effacer un
camion à benne basculante.
The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokém.it:
Le braccia spesse di questo Pokémon dal sangue caldo
può sferrare pugni capaci di annientare a
autocarro con cassone ribaltabile.
The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokém.zh-tw:
熱血神奇寶貝的粗壯手臂
可以打出能夠消滅敵人的拳頭
自卸車。
The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokém.de:
Die dicken Arme dieses heißblütigen Pokémon
kann Schläge ausführen, die einen auslöschen können
Muldenkipper.
The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokém.pt-br:
Os braços grossos deste Pokémon de sangue quente
pode desferir socos capazes de obliterar um
caminhão basculante.

The two minigears that compose this Poké.en:
The two minigears that compose this Pokémon
are closer than twins. They mesh well only with
each other.
The two minigears that compose this Poké.fr:
Les deux minigears qui composent ce Pokémon
sont plus proches que des jumeaux. Ils ne s'accordent bien qu'avec
les uns les autres.
The two minigears that compose this Poké.de:
Die beiden Minigears, aus denen dieses Pokémon besteht
sind näher als Zwillinge. Sie passen nur gut zusammen
einander.
The two minigears that compose this Poké.es:
Los dos minigears que componen este Pokémon
están más cerca que los gemelos. Combinan bien sólo con
unos a otros.
The two minigears that compose this Poké.it:
I due miniingranaggi che compongono questo Pokémon
sono più vicini dei gemelli. Si adattano bene solo con
l'un l'altro.
The two minigears that compose this Poké.pt-br:
Os dois minigears que compõem este Pokémon
são mais próximos que gêmeos. Eles combinam bem apenas com
um ao outro.
The two minigears that compose this Poké.zh-tw:
組成這只神奇寶貝的兩個迷你齒輪
比雙胞胎還要親密。他們只與
彼此。

The water they shoot from their mouths c.en:
The water they shoot from their mouths can hit
moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
The water they shoot from their mouths c.fr:
L'eau qu'ils tirent de leur bouche peut frapper
déplacer ses proies à plus de 300 pieds de distance.
The water they shoot from their mouths c.es:
El agua que disparan por la boca puede alcanzar
moviendo presas desde más de 300 pies de distancia.
The water they shoot from their mouths c.zh-tw:
它們從嘴裡噴出的水可以擊中
將獵物從 300 英尺以外移動。
The water they shoot from their mouths c.it:
L'acqua che sparano dalla bocca può colpire
spostare la preda a più di 300 piedi di distanza.
The water they shoot from their mouths c.pt-br:
A água que eles expelem da boca pode atingir
mover presas a mais de 300 pés de distância.
The water they shoot from their mouths c.de:
Das Wasser, das ihnen aus dem Mund spritzt, kann treffen
Bewegen von Beute aus mehr als 300 Fuß Entfernung.

There's a hole in its tail that allows i.en:
There's a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in
the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the
hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.
There's a hole in its tail that allows i.fr:
Il y a un trou dans sa queue qui lui permet de rentrer
l'air dont il a besoin pour entretenir son feu. Si le
Si le trou est bouché, ce Pokémon tombera malade.
There's a hole in its tail that allows i.pt-br:
Há um buraco na cauda que permite que ele puxe
o ar de que necessita para manter o fogo aceso. Se o
buraco for bloqueado, este Pokémon ficará doente.
There's a hole in its tail that allows i.es:
Hay un agujero en su cola que le permite atraer
el aire que necesita para mantener encendido su fuego. si el
El agujero se bloquea, este Pokémon enfermará.
There's a hole in its tail that allows i.de:
In seinem Schwanz befindet sich ein Loch, durch das er einziehen kann
die Luft, die es braucht, um sein Feuer am Brennen zu halten. Wenn die
Wenn das Loch blockiert wird, wird dieses Pokémon krank.
There's a hole in its tail that allows i.zh-tw:
它的尾巴上有一個洞，可以讓它吸入
保持火焰燃燒所需的空氣。如果
洞被堵住了，這只神奇寶貝就會生病。
There's a hole in its tail that allows i.it:
C'è un buco nella coda che gli permette di entrare
l'aria di cui ha bisogno per mantenere acceso il fuoco. Se il
buco viene bloccato, questo Pokémon si ammalerà.

These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.en:
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near
conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they've hardly
been seen at all.
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.fr:
Ces Pokémon ne sont jamais vus à proximité
conflit ou troubles. Ces derniers temps, ils ont à peine
été vu du tout.
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.es:
Estos Pokémon nunca se ven cerca
conflicto o agitación. En los últimos tiempos apenas han
sido visto en absoluto.
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.de:
Diese Pokémon werden nie in der Nähe gesehen
Konflikt oder Aufruhr. In letzter Zeit haben sie kaum noch
überhaupt gesehen worden.
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.it:
Questi Pokémon non vengono mai visti da nessuna parte
conflitto o tumulto. Negli ultimi tempi, difficilmente lo hanno fatto
stato visto affatto.
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.zh-tw:
這些神奇寶貝在附近從未見過
衝突或動亂。最近一段時間，他們幾乎沒有
完全被看見了。
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.pt-br:
Esses Pokémon nunca são vistos por perto
conflito ou turbulência. Nos últimos tempos, eles dificilmente
sido visto.

These Pokémon can crush a car with no mo.en:
These Pokémon can crush a car with no more
than a headbutt. Bouffalant with more hair on
their heads hold higher positions within the herd.
These Pokémon can crush a car with no mo.es:
Estos Pokémon pueden aplastar un coche sin más
que un cabezazo. Bouffalant con más pelo
sus cabezas ocupan posiciones más altas dentro de la manada.
These Pokémon can crush a car with no mo.fr:
Ces Pokémon peuvent écraser une voiture sans plus
qu'un coup de tête. Bouffalant avec plus de cheveux
leurs chefs occupent des positions plus élevées au sein du troupeau.
These Pokémon can crush a car with no mo.it:
Questi Pokémon possono schiacciare un'auto senza altro
più di una testata. Bouffalant con più peli
le loro teste occupano posizioni più alte all'interno della mandria.
These Pokémon can crush a car with no mo.zh-tw:
這些神奇寶貝可以壓碎一輛汽車
比用頭撞。蓬鬆的頭髮更多
他們的頭部在牛群中佔據較高的位置。
These Pokémon can crush a car with no mo.pt-br:
Esses Pokémon podem esmagar um carro sem mais
do que uma cabeçada. Bouffalant com mais cabelo
suas cabeças ocupam posições mais altas dentro do rebanho.
These Pokémon can crush a car with no mo.de:
Diese Pokémon können ohne weiteres ein Auto zerquetschen
als ein Kopfstoß. Bouffalant mit mehr Haaren
Ihre Köpfe nehmen innerhalb der Herde eine höhere Position ein.

These Pokémon judge one another based on.en:
These Pokémon judge one another based on
pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make
for more popularity with the opposite gender.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.es:
Estos Pokémon se juzgan entre sí basándose en
pinzas. Unas pinzas más gruesas e impresionantes hacen
para obtener más popularidad entre el sexo opuesto.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.fr:
Ces Pokémon se jugent mutuellement en fonction de
pinces. Des pinces plus épaisses et plus impressionnantes font
pour plus de popularité auprès du sexe opposé.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.it:
Questi Pokémon si giudicano a vicenda in base a
tenaglie. Le tenaglie sono più spesse e più impressionanti
per una maggiore popolarità con il sesso opposto.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.de:
Diese Pokémon beurteilen sich gegenseitig anhand
Zangen. Dickere, eindrucksvollere Zangen ergeben
für mehr Beliebtheit beim anderen Geschlecht.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.zh-tw:
這些神奇寶貝根據以下標準相互評判
鉗子。更厚、更令人印象深刻的鉗子
為了更受異性歡迎。
These Pokémon judge one another based on.pt-br:
Esses Pokémon julgam uns aos outros com base em
pinças. Pinças mais grossas e impressionantes fazem
para mais popularidade com o sexo oposto.

These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.en:
These very cowardly Pokémon join together and
use Reflect to protect their nest.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.fr:
Ces Pokémon très lâches se réunissent et
utilisez Reflect pour protéger leur nid.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.es:
Estos Pokémon muy cobardes se unen y
usa Reflect para proteger su nido.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.it:
Questi Pokémon molto codardi si uniscono e
usa Reflect per proteggere il loro nido.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.zh-tw:
這些非常膽小的神奇寶貝聯合起來，
使用反射來保護它們的巢穴。
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.pt-br:
Esses Pokémon muito covardes se unem e
use Reflect para proteger seu ninho.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.de:
Diese sehr feigen Pokémon schließen sich zusammen und
Verwenden Sie Reflect, um ihr Nest zu schützen.

They say that it stays still and quiet b.en:
They say that it stays still and quiet because it is
seeing both the past and future at the same time.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.fr:
On dit qu'il reste immobile et silencieux parce qu'il est
voir à la fois le passé et le futur.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.de:
Sie sagen, dass es still und still bleibt, weil es so ist
Vergangenheit und Zukunft gleichzeitig sehen.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.zh-tw:
他們說它保持靜止和安靜，因為它是
同時看到過去和未來。
They say that it stays still and quiet b.it:
Dicono che sta fermo e tranquillo perché è così
vedere il passato e il futuro allo stesso tempo.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.pt-br:
Dizem que fica quieto e quieto porque é
vendo o passado e o futuro ao mesmo tempo.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.es:
Dicen que se queda quieto y en silencio porque es
viendo el pasado y el futuro al mismo tiempo.

They say that it will appear before kind.en:
They say that it will appear before kindhearted,
caring people and shower them with happiness.
They say that it will appear before kind.fr:
Ils disent qu'il apparaîtra devant un bon cœur,
des gens attentionnés et les comble de bonheur.
They say that it will appear before kind.es:
Dicen que aparecerá ante los bondadosos,
cuidar a las personas y colmarlas de felicidad.
They say that it will appear before kind.zh-tw:
都說它會出現在善良的人面前，
關愛人們並為他們帶來幸福。
They say that it will appear before kind.de:
Sie sagen, dass es vor gutherzigen Menschen erscheinen wird,
Fürsorgliche Menschen und überschütte sie mit Glück.
They say that it will appear before kind.it:
Dicono che apparirà prima di buon cuore,
prendersi cura delle persone e inondarle di felicità.
They say that it will appear before kind.pt-br:
Dizem que aparecerá diante de pessoas de bom coração,
cuidar das pessoas e regá-las de felicidade.

This Ability works if you have any Unown.en: This Ability works if you have any Unown in play with an Ability other than . All of your Pokémon take −10 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.es: Esta habilidad funciona si tienes algún Unown en juego con una habilidad distinta a . Todos tus Pokémon reciben -10 de daño de los ataques de los Pokémon de tu oponente.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.it: Questa abilità funziona se hai in gioco degli Unown con un'abilità diversa da . Tutti i tuoi Pokémon subiscono -10 danni dagli attacchi dei Pokémon del tuo avversario.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.fr: Cette capacité fonctionne si vous avez un Zarbi en jeu avec une capacité autre que . Tous vos Pokémon subissent -10 dégâts des attaques des Pokémon de votre adversaire.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.de: Diese Fähigkeit funktioniert, wenn Sie einen Unbekannten mit einer anderen Fähigkeit als im Spiel haben. Alle deine Pokémon erleiden −10 Schaden durch Angriffe der Pokémon deines Gegners.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.zh-tw: 如果您有任何未知的技能與 以外的技能一起使用，則此技能有效。你的所有神奇寶貝因對手神奇寶貝的攻擊而受到−10點傷害。
This Ability works if you have any Unown.pt-br: Esta habilidade funciona se você tiver algum Unown em jogo com uma habilidade diferente de . Todos os seus Pokémon sofrem -10 de dano de ataques dos Pokémon do seu oponente.

This Ability works if you have any Unown.en: This Ability works if you have any Unown in play with an Ability other than . Attacks used by your Pokémon do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.fr: Cette capacité fonctionne si vous avez un Zarbi en jeu avec une capacité autre que . Les attaques utilisées par votre Pokémon infligent +10 dégâts au Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.es: Esta habilidad funciona si tienes algún Unown en juego con una habilidad distinta a . Los ataques utilizados por tus Pokémon causan +10 de daño al Pokémon Activo de tu oponente.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.it: Questa abilità funziona se hai in gioco degli Unown con un'abilità diversa da . Gli attacchi usati dai tuoi Pokémon infliggono +10 danni al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.de: Diese Fähigkeit funktioniert, wenn Sie einen Unbekannten mit einer anderen Fähigkeit als im Spiel haben. Angriffe deines Pokémon fügen dem aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners +10 Schaden zu.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.zh-tw: 如果您有任何未知的技能與 以外的技能一起使用，則此技能有效。你的神奇寶貝使用的攻擊對對手的活躍神奇寶貝造成+10傷害。
This Ability works if you have any Unown.pt-br: Esta habilidade funciona se você tiver algum Unown em jogo com uma habilidade diferente de . Os ataques usados ​​pelos seus Pokémon causam +10 de dano ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.

This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of.en: This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of.es: Este ataque también hace 10 puntos de daño a 1 de tus Pokémon en Banca.
This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of.de: Dieser Angriff fügt außerdem einem Pokémon auf deiner Bank 10 Schadenspunkte zu.
This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of.fr: Cette attaque inflige également 10 dégâts à 1 de vos Pokémon de Banc.
This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of.it: Questo attacco infligge anche 10 danni a 1 dei tuoi Pokémon in panchina.
This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of.zh-tw: 這次攻擊還會對你的 1 只後備神奇寶貝造成 10 點傷害。
This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of.pt-br: Este ataque também causa 10 de dano a 1 dos seus Pokémon no Banco.

This attack also does 20 damage to each.en: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon.
This attack also does 20 damage to each.es: Este ataque también hace 20 puntos de daño a cada uno de tus Pokémon en Banca.
This attack also does 20 damage to each.fr: Cette attaque inflige également 20 dégâts à chacun de vos Pokémon de Banc.
This attack also does 20 damage to each.zh-tw: 這次攻擊還會對你的每隻後備神奇寶貝造成 20 點傷害。
This attack also does 20 damage to each.it: Questo attacco infligge anche 20 danni a ciascuno dei tuoi Pokémon in panchina.
This attack also does 20 damage to each.pt-br: Este ataque também causa 20 de dano a cada um dos seus Pokémon no Banco.
This attack also does 20 damage to each.de: Dieser Angriff fügt außerdem jedem Pokémon auf deiner Bank 20 Schadenspunkte zu.

This attack does 20 damage for each Ener.en: This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
This attack does 20 damage for each Ener.fr: Cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts pour chaque Énergie attachée au Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
This attack does 20 damage for each Ener.es: Este ataque hace 20 puntos de daño por cada Energía unida al Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
This attack does 20 damage for each Ener.de: Dieser Angriff fügt 20 Schadenspunkte für jede Energie zu, die an das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners angelegt ist.
This attack does 20 damage for each Ener.pt-br: Este ataque causa 20 pontos de dano para cada Energia ligada ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.
This attack does 20 damage for each Ener.zh-tw: 對手的活躍寶可夢身上附加的每一個能量都會造成 20 點傷害。
This attack does 20 damage for each Ener.it: Questo attacco infligge 20 danni per ogni Energia assegnata al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.

This attack does 40 more damage for each.en: This attack does 40 more damage for each Energy in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.
This attack does 40 more damage for each.fr: Cette attaque inflige 40 dégâts supplémentaires pour chaque Énergie du Coût de Retraite du Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
This attack does 40 more damage for each.es: Este ataque hace 40 puntos de daño más por cada Energía en el Coste de Retirada del Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
This attack does 40 more damage for each.zh-tw: 對手的現役寶可夢的撤退費用中每有一個能量，該攻擊就會造成 40 點額外傷害。
This attack does 40 more damage for each.de: Dieser Angriff verursacht 40 weitere Schadenspunkte für jede Energie in den Rückzugskosten des Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners.
This attack does 40 more damage for each.it: Questo attacco infligge 40 danni in più per ogni Energia nel costo di ritirata del Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.
This attack does 40 more damage for each.pt-br: Este ataque causa 40 pontos de dano a mais para cada Energia no Custo de Recuo do Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.

This cunning Pokémon hides under the cov.en:
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of
darkness, waiting to attack its prey.
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cov.it:
Questo Pokémon astuto si nasconde sotto la copertura di
oscurità, in attesa di attaccare la sua preda.
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cov.fr:
Ce Pokémon rusé se cache sous le couvert de
l'obscurité, attendant d'attaquer sa proie.
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cov.es:
Este astuto Pokémon se esconde al amparo de
oscuridad, esperando atacar a su presa.
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cov.zh-tw:
這個狡猾的神奇寶貝隱藏在
黑暗，等待著攻擊它的獵物。
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cov.pt-br:
Este Pokémon astuto se esconde sob a capa de
escuridão, esperando para atacar sua presa.
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cov.de:
Dieses schlaue Pokémon versteckt sich unter dem Deckmantel von
Dunkelheit, die darauf wartet, ihre Beute anzugreifen.

This is a Porygon that was updated with.en:
This is a Porygon that was updated with special
data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about
many different subjects all on its own.
This is a Porygon that was updated with.es:
Este es un Porygon que fue actualizado con características especiales.
datos. Porygon2 se desarrolla aprendiendo sobre
muchos temas diferentes por sí solo.
This is a Porygon that was updated with.fr:
Il s'agit d'un Porygon qui a été mis à jour avec des fonctionnalités spéciales.
données. Porygon2 se développe en apprenant

dati. Porygon2 si sviluppa imparando a conoscere

Dies ist ein Porygon, der mit etwas Besonderem aktualisiert wurde
Daten. Porygon2 entwickelt sich durch Lernen

This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.en:
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs
and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.fr:
Ce gentil Pokémon pond des œufs très nutritifs
et les partage avec des Pokémon ou des personnes blessés.
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.zh-tw:
這只善良的神奇寶貝會產下營養豐富的蛋
並與受傷的神奇寶貝或人分享。
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.es:
Este amable Pokémon pone huevos muy nutritivos
y los comparte con Pokémon o personas heridas.
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.de:
Dieses freundliche Pokémon legt sehr nahrhafte Eier
und teilt sie mit verletzten Pokémon oder Menschen.
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.pt-br:
Este gentil Pokémon põe ovos altamente nutritivos
e os compartilha com Pokémon ou pessoas feridas.
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.it:
Questo Pokémon gentile depone uova altamente nutrienti
e li condivide con Pokémon o persone feriti.

This Pokémon apparently used to live in.en:
This Pokémon apparently used to live in much
harsher environments, and thus it once had
stronger psychic powers than it does now.
This Pokémon apparently used to live in.fr:
Ce Pokémon vivait apparemment dans de nombreux
des environnements plus difficiles, et donc il avait autrefois
des pouvoirs psychiques plus forts qu'aujourd'hui.
This Pokémon apparently used to live in.pt-br:
Este Pokémon aparentemente vivia em muito
ambientes mais severos e, portanto, já teve
poderes psíquicos mais fortes do que agora.
This Pokémon apparently used to live in.de:
Dieses Pokémon lebte offenbar früher in vielen Gegenden
raueren Umgebungen, und so war es auch einmal
stärkere psychische Kräfte als jetzt.
This Pokémon apparently used to live in.es:
Al parecer, este Pokémon solía vivir en muchas
entornos más duros y, por lo tanto, alguna vez tuvo
poderes psíquicos más fuertes que los que tiene ahora.
This Pokémon apparently used to live in.it:
Sembra che questo Pokémon vivesse in molte zone
ambienti più difficili, come accadeva una volta
poteri psichici più forti di quelli attuali.
This Pokémon apparently used to live in.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝顯然曾經生活在很多地方
環境更加惡劣，因此它曾經有過
比現在更強的精神力量。

This Pokémon can be spotted in wall pain.en:
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings
from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a
while, it was thought to have gone extinct.
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall pain.es:
Este Pokémon se puede ver en pinturas murales.
desde hace 10.000 años. por un
mientras, se pensaba que se había extinguido.
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall pain.fr:
Ce Pokémon peut être repéré sur les peintures murales
datant d'il y a 10 000 ans. Pour un
alors que l'on pensait qu'il avait disparu.
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall pain.zh-tw:
這種神奇寶貝可以在壁畫中看到
追溯到一萬年前。對於一個
同時，人們認為它已經滅絕了。
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall pain.de:
Dieses Pokémon kann auf Wandgemälden entdeckt werden
bereits vor 10.000 Jahren. Für einen
Währenddessen galt es als ausgestorben.
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall pain.it:
Questo Pokémon può essere visto nei dipinti murali
risalenti a 10.000 anni fa. Per un
mentre si pensava si fosse estinto.
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall pain.pt-br:
Este Pokémon pode ser visto em pinturas de parede
desde há 10.000 anos. Por um
enquanto, pensava-se que estava extinto.

This Pokémon can't be Asleep..pt-br: Este Pokémon não pode estar dormindo.

This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.en:
This Pokémon is still small and timid.
Whenever Magby gets excited or surprised,
flames leak from its mouth and its nose.
This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.es:
Este Pokémon todavía es pequeño y tímido.
Cada vez que Magby se emociona o se sorprende,
Las llamas se escapan de su boca y su nariz.
This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.fr:
Ce Pokémon est encore petit et timide.
Chaque fois que Magby est excitée ou surprise,
des flammes s'échappent de sa bouche et de son nez.
This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝還很小，而且膽怯。
每當瑪格比感到興奮或驚訝時，
火焰從它的嘴和鼻子中洩漏出來。
This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.de:
Dieses Pokémon ist noch klein und schüchtern.
Immer wenn Magby aufgeregt oder überrascht ist,
Aus seinem Mund und seiner Nase strömen Flammen.
This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.it:
Questo Pokémon è ancora piccolo e timido.
Ogni volta che Magby si emoziona o si sorprende,
fiamme fuoriescono dalla sua bocca e dal suo naso.
This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.pt-br:
Este Pokémon ainda é pequeno e tímido.
Sempre que Magby fica animado ou surpreso,
chamas vazam de sua boca e nariz.

This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverb.en:
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank.
After playing in the mud, it won't be able to
settle down unless it washes its body.
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverb.fr:
Ce Pokémon vit et niche au bord d'une rivière.
Après avoir joué dans la boue, il ne pourra plus
s'installer à moins qu'il ne lave son corps.
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverb.es:
Este Pokémon vive y anida en la orilla de un río.
Después de jugar en el barro, no podrá
calmarse a menos que se lave el cuerpo.
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverb.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝在河岸上生活和築巢。
玩泥巴之後就不行了
除非它清洗身體，否則就安定下來。
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverb.it:
Questo Pokémon vive e nidifica sulla riva di un fiume.
Dopo aver giocato nel fango, non sarà in grado di farlo
sistemarsi a meno che non si lavi il corpo.
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverb.de:
Dieses Pokémon lebt und nistet an einem Flussufer.
Nach dem Spielen im Schlamm wird es nicht mehr möglich sein
Beruhige dich, es sei denn, es wäscht seinen Körper.
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverb.pt-br:
Este Pokémon vive e nidifica nas margens de um rio.
Depois de brincar na lama, não conseguirá
acalme-se a menos que lave seu corpo.

This Pokémon lives in cold water. It wil.en:

This Pokémon lives in cold water. It wil.es:
Este Pokémon vive en agua fría. Dejará el

acqua per cercare il cibo quando fuori fa freddo.

當外面變冷時，可以用水來尋找食物。
This Pokémon lives in cold water. It wil.fr:
Ce Pokémon vit dans l'eau froide. Il quittera le
de l'eau pour chercher de la nourriture quand il fait froid dehors.
This Pokémon lives in cold water. It wil.de:

This Pokémon lives in cold water. It wil.pt-br:

This Pokémon startles people in the midd.en:

This Pokémon startles people in the midd.es:
Este Pokémon asusta a la gente en medio de

This Pokémon startles people in the midd.pt-br:

a noite. Ele reúne o medo como sua energia.
This Pokémon startles people in the midd.zh-tw:

Ce Pokémon surprend les gens en plein milieu de
la nuit. Il rassemble la peur comme énergie.
This Pokémon startles people in the midd.it:

This Pokémon startles people in the midd.de:

die Nacht. Es sammelt Angst als seine Energie.

This Pokémon's pincers, which contain st.en:

This pupa flies around wildly by venting.en:
This pupa flies around wildly by venting with
great force the gas pressurized inside its body.
This pupa flies around wildly by venting.it:

grande forza il gas pressurizzato all'interno del suo corpo.

Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic

Tres magnemita están unidas por un fuerte imán.
fuerza. Se producirán dolores de oído si te acercas demasiado.

forcer. Des maux d’oreilles surviendront si vous vous approchez trop près.

三個磁鐵礦通過強磁性連接在一起
力。如果距離太近，就會出現耳痛。

When a storm approaches, this Pokémon ge.en:
When a storm approaches, this Pokémon gets
restless. Once Elekid hears the sound of thunder,
it gets full-on rowdy.
When a storm approaches, this Pokémon ge.es:
Cuando se acerca una tormenta, este Pokémon obtiene
inquieto. Una vez que Elekid escucha el sonido del trueno,
se vuelve muy ruidoso.
When a storm approaches, this Pokémon ge.fr:
Lorsqu'une tempête approche, ce Pokémon devient
agité. Une fois qu'Elekid entend le bruit du tonnerre,
ça devient complètement tapageur.
When a storm approaches, this Pokémon ge.pt-br:
Quando uma tempestade se aproxima, este Pokémon fica
inquieto. Assim que Elekid ouve o som do trovão,
fica totalmente turbulento.
When a storm approaches, this Pokémon ge.de:
Wenn ein Sturm naht, bekommt dieses Pokémon
unruhig. Sobald Elekid das Geräusch des Donners hört,

When a storm approaches, this Pokémon ge.it:
Quando si avvicina una tempesta, questo Pokémon ottiene
irrequieto. Una volta che Elekid sente il suono del tuono,

When a storm approaches, this Pokémon ge.zh-tw:

焦躁不安。一旦埃萊克德聽到雷聲，

When acting as a lookout, it warns other.en:
When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger

When acting as a lookout, it warns other.es:
Cuando actúa como vigía, advierte a los demás del peligro.

When acting as a lookout, it warns other.fr:

When acting as a lookout, it warns other.zh-tw:

When acting as a lookout, it warns other.it:
Quando funge da vedetta, avverte gli altri del pericolo
strillando e colpendo il suolo con la coda.
When acting as a lookout, it warns other.pt-br:

When acting as a lookout, it warns other.de:

indem er kreischte und mit dem Schwanz auf den Boden schlug.

When attacked, it uses its feathers to s.en:

escaping under cover of the spray.
When attacked, it uses its feathers to s.es:
Cuando es atacado, utiliza sus plumas para salpicar agua,
escapando al amparo del spray.
When attacked, it uses its feathers to s.fr:
Lorsqu'il est attaqué, il utilise ses plumes pour projeter de l'eau,
s'échappant sous le couvert des embruns.
When attacked, it uses its feathers to s.it:

scappare sotto la copertura degli spruzzi.
When attacked, it uses its feathers to s.zh-tw:

When attacked, it uses its feathers to s.pt-br:

escapando sob a cobertura do spray.
When attacked, it uses its feathers to s.de:

When dark mists emanate from its body, d.en:
When dark mists emanate from its body, don't
get too near. If you do, your nightmares will
become reality.
When dark mists emanate from its body, d.es:
Cuando nieblas oscuras emanen de su cuerpo, no
acercarse demasiado. Si lo haces, tus pesadillas desaparecerán.
convertirse en realidad.
When dark mists emanate from its body, d.fr:
Lorsque des brumes sombres émanent de son corps, ne le faites pas
approchez-vous trop. Si vous le faites, vos cauchemars
devenir réalité.
When dark mists emanate from its body, d.pt-br:
Quando névoas escuras emanam de seu corpo, não
chegar muito perto. Se você fizer isso, seus pesadelos irão

When dark mists emanate from its body, d.it:
Quando dal suo corpo fuoriescono nebbie oscure, non farlo
avvicinarsi troppo. Se lo fai, lo faranno i tuoi incubi
diventare realtà.
When dark mists emanate from its body, d.zh-tw:
當它的身體散發出黑霧時，不要
太近了。如果你這樣做，你的噩夢就會

When dark mists emanate from its body, d.de:
Wenn dunkle Nebel von seinem Körper ausgehen, tun Sie es nicht

Wirklichkeit werden.

When it goes on a rampage, it's impossib.en:
When it goes on a rampage, it's impossible to
control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it's
lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.
When it goes on a rampage, it's impossib.fr:
Quand il se déchaîne, il est impossible de
contrôle. Mais en présence d'une Nidoqueen c'est
vécu longtemps, Nidoking se calme.
When it goes on a rampage, it's impossib.es:
Cuando se desboca, es imposible
controlar. Pero en presencia de una Nidoqueen es
vivido durante mucho tiempo, Nidoking se calma.
When it goes on a rampage, it's impossib.pt-br:
Quando fica furioso, é impossível
controle. Mas na presença de uma Nidoqueen é
conviveu por muito tempo, Nidoking se acalma.
When it goes on a rampage, it's impossib.zh-tw:
當它狂暴起來時，就不可能了
控制。但在尼多女王面前

When it goes on a rampage, it's impossib.it:

controllo. Ma in presenza di una Nidoqueen lo è
con cui convive da molto tempo, Nidoking si calma.
When it goes on a rampage, it's impossib.de:
Wenn es tobt, ist das unmöglich
Kontrolle. Aber in der Gegenwart einer Nidoqueen ist es so
Nidoking, mit dem er lange zusammenlebte, beruhigt sich.

tête et a débloqué un pouvoir extraordinaire.

cabeza y desbloqueó un poder extraordinario.

When its head was bitten, toxins entered.pt-br:

cabeça e desbloqueou um poder extraordinário.
When its head was bitten, toxins entered.de:

Cuando Klang hace todo lo posible, el miniequipo se conecta
perfectamente con la parte exterior del engranaje grande, y

When Klang goes all out, the minigear li.de:
Wenn der Klang aufs Ganze geht, schaltet sich das Mini-Getriebe ein

perfeitamente com a parte externa da engrenagem grande, e
a velocidade de rotação deste Pokémon aumenta drasticamente.

Whenever you attach an Energy from your.en: Whenever you attach an Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, put a random card from your deck that evolves from this Pokémon onto this Pokémon to evolve it.
Whenever you attach an Energy from your.fr: À chaque fois que vous attachez une Énergie de votre Zone d'Énergie à ce Pokémon, placez une carte aléatoire de votre deck qui évolue de ce Pokémon sur ce Pokémon pour le faire évoluer.
Whenever you attach an Energy from your.es: Siempre que unes una Energía de tu Zona de Energía a este Pokémon, coloca una carta aleatoria de tu mazo que evolucione de este Pokémon en este Pokémon para evolucionarlo.
Whenever you attach an Energy from your.zh-tw: 每當你將能量區中的能量附加到該神奇寶貝上時，從你的牌組中隨機放置一張由該神奇寶貝進化的卡牌到該神奇寶貝上以使其進化。
Whenever you attach an Energy from your.de: Immer wenn du eine Energie aus deiner Energiezone an dieses Pokémon anlegst, lege eine zufällige Karte aus deinem Deck, die sich aus diesem Pokémon entwickelt, auf dieses Pokémon, um es weiterzuentwickeln.
Whenever you attach an Energy from your.pt-br: Sempre que você associar uma Energia da sua Zona de Energia a este Pokémon, coloque uma carta aleatória do seu baralho que evolui deste Pokémon neste Pokémon para evoluí-lo.
Whenever you attach an Energy from your.it: Ogni volta che assegni un'Energia dalla tua Zona d'Energia a questo Pokémon, metti una carta a caso dal tuo mazzo che si evolve da questo Pokémon a questo Pokémon per farlo evolvere.

While elegantly swimming in the sea, it.en:
While elegantly swimming in the sea, it ignores
Remoraid that cling to its fins seeking food scraps.
While elegantly swimming in the sea, it.fr:
Tout en nageant élégamment dans la mer, il ignore
Rémoraide qui s'accroche à ses nageoires à la recherche de restes de nourriture.
While elegantly swimming in the sea, it.es:
Mientras nada elegantemente en el mar, ignora
Remoraide que se aferra a sus aletas en busca de restos de comida.
While elegantly swimming in the sea, it.zh-tw:
它在海裡優雅地游泳的同時，卻忽略了
粘魚會緊貼鰭尋找食物殘渣。
While elegantly swimming in the sea, it.de:
Während es elegant im Meer schwimmt, ignoriert es es
Remoraid, das sich an seinen Flossen festklammert und nach Essensresten sucht.
While elegantly swimming in the sea, it.pt-br:
Enquanto nada elegantemente no mar, ignora
Remoraid que se agarra às barbatanas em busca de restos de comida.
While elegantly swimming in the sea, it.it:
Mentre nuota elegantemente nel mare, ignora
Remoraid che si aggrappa alle sue pinne alla ricerca di avanzi di cibo.

While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't c.en:
While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't care for
disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display
their might.
While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't c.fr:
Bien qu'il ait des mâchoires puissantes, il ne se soucie pas
différends, il a donc rarement l'occasion d'afficher
leur puissance.
While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't c.es:
Si bien tiene poderosas mandíbulas, no le importa
disputas, por lo que rara vez tiene la oportunidad de mostrarse
su poder.
While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't c.zh-tw:
雖然它有強大的下巴，但它並不關心
爭議，所以很少有機會展示
他們的力量。
While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't c.de:
Obwohl es kräftige Kiefer hat, ist es ihm egal
Streitigkeiten, daher hat es selten eine Chance zur Anzeige
ihre Macht.
While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't c.it:
Sebbene abbia mascelle potenti, non gli importa
controversie, quindi raramente ha la possibilità di essere esposto
la loro potenza.
While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't c.pt-br:
Embora tenha mandíbulas poderosas, não se importa com
disputas, por isso raramente tem a chance de exibir
seu poder.

While young, it has six gorgeous tails..en:
While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it
grows, several new tails are sprouted.
While young, it has six gorgeous tails..fr:
Lorsqu'il est jeune, il possède six magnifiques queues. Quand il
grandit, plusieurs nouvelles queues poussent.
While young, it has six gorgeous tails..es:
Cuando es joven, tiene seis hermosas colas. cuando
crece, brotan varias colas nuevas.
While young, it has six gorgeous tails..de:
Als junges Tier hat es sechs wunderschöne Schwänze. Wenn es
wächst, mehrere neue Schwänze sprießen.
While young, it has six gorgeous tails..zh-tw:
年輕時，它有六條華麗的尾巴。當它
長大了，又長出了幾條新的尾巴。
While young, it has six gorgeous tails..it:
Da giovane ha sei splendide code. Quando
cresce, spuntano diverse nuove code.
While young, it has six gorgeous tails..pt-br:
Enquanto jovem, tem seis lindas caudas. Quando
cresce, várias novas caudas brotam.

With a horn that's harder than diamond,.en:
With a horn that's harder than diamond, this
Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it
searches for a moon stone.
With a horn that's harder than diamond,.fr:
Avec une corne plus dure que le diamant, ce
Pokémon contourne les rochers en brisant
cherche une pierre de lune.
With a horn that's harder than diamond,.es:
Con un cuerno que es más duro que el diamante, este
Pokémon anda rompiendo rocas mientras
busca una piedra lunar.
With a horn that's harder than diamond,.zh-tw:
擁有比鑽石還硬的號角，這
神奇寶貝四處走動，粉碎巨石
尋找月光石。
With a horn that's harder than diamond,.pt-br:
Com um chifre mais duro que o diamante, este
Pokémon anda quebrando pedras enquanto
procura por uma pedra da lua.
With a horn that's harder than diamond,.it:
Con un corno più duro del diamante, questo
I Pokémon vanno in giro frantumando i massi
cerca una pietra di luna.
With a horn that's harder than diamond,.de:
Mit einem Horn, das härter als Diamant ist
Pokémon geht umher und zerschmettert dabei Felsbrocken
sucht nach einem Mondstein.

You may discard any number of your Bench.en: You may discard any number of your Benched {W} Pokémon. This attack does 40 more damage for each Benched Pokémon you discarded in this way.
You may discard any number of your Bench.fr: Vous pouvez défausser n'importe quel nombre de vos Pokémon {W} de Banc. Cette attaque inflige 40 dégâts supplémentaires pour chaque Pokémon de Banc que vous avez défaussé de cette manière.
You may discard any number of your Bench.es: Puedes descartar cualquier cantidad de tus Pokémon {W} en Banca. Este ataque hace 40 daños más por cada Pokémon en Banca que descartes de esta forma.
You may discard any number of your Bench.de: Du kannst eine beliebige Anzahl deiner {W}-Pokémon auf deiner Bank abwerfen. Dieser Angriff verursacht 40 weitere Schadenspunkte für jedes Bank-Pokémon, das du auf diese Weise abgeworfen hast.
You may discard any number of your Bench.zh-tw: 您可以丟棄任意數量的替補 {W} 神奇寶貝。你以這種方式丟棄的每個後備神奇寶貝都會額外受到 40 點傷害。
You may discard any number of your Bench.it: Puoi scartare un qualsiasi numero dei tuoi Pokémon {W} in panchina. Questo attacco infligge 40 danni in più per ogni Pokémon in panchina che hai scartato in questo modo.
You may discard any number of your Bench.pt-br: Você pode descartar qualquer número dos seus Pokémon {W} no Banco. Este ataque causa 40 pontos de dano a mais para cada Pokémon no Banco que você descartou dessa forma.

Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost..en: Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.
Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost..fr: Votre Pokémon Actif n'a pas de Coût de Retraite.
Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost..it: Il tuo Pokémon attivo non ha alcun costo di ritirata.
Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost..de: Dein aktives Pokémon hat keine Rückzugskosten.
Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost..zh-tw: 你的活躍神奇寶貝沒有撤退成本。
Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost..pt-br: Seu Pokémon Ativo não tem Custo de Recuo.
Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost..es: Tu Pokémon Activo no tiene Costo de Retirada.

Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.en: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a Supporter card you find there and shuffle it into your opponent's deck.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.fr: Votre adversaire révèle sa main. Choisissez une carte Supporter que vous y trouvez et mélangez-la dans le deck de votre adversaire.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.de: Ihr Gegner deckt seine Hand auf. Wähle eine Unterstützerkarte, die du dort findest, und mische sie in das Deck deines Gegners.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.pt-br: Seu oponente revela sua mão. Escolha uma carta de Apoiador que encontrar lá e embaralhe-a no baralho do seu oponente.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.es: Tu oponente revela su mano. Elige una carta de Partidario que encuentres allí y mézclala en el mazo de tu oponente.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.zh-tw: 你的對手亮出了他們的牌。選擇在那裡找到的一張支持者卡並將其洗入對手的牌庫中。
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.it: Il tuo avversario rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta Aiuto che trovi lì e mischiala nel mazzo del tuo avversario.
